name: Connie Sison
text:
Ask for Debbie McKay.  She cuts hair really well. Been in service for over 25 yrs.
As Asian I'm very particular when someone cuts my hair  because that's the first thing you'll get recognized by people.

name: Jessica Gemnell
text: They are super nice and friendly although I don't understand why a child s cut and two braids cost me $50!!!!!! The braids was $15 a piece! If I had known that before hand I wouldn't have got the braids cause that's outrageous!

name: Brittany
text:
Edit: Reece gives an excellent haircut every time!! Definitely ask for her. (Thanks for the pixie cut, Reece, it's amazing!)

Don't know what's going on with the bad reviews, my boyfriend and I had a lovely experience here. We both got exactly what we wanted. I have short, shoulder-length, thick hair that's curly in some spots, wavy in others, and stick-straight in other spors. I've had SO many salons butcher it. I got a great haircut here and loved it! They weren't overly pushy about selling their products, either, like some salons can be. I was shocked at how cheap the cut was ($36 for shampoo, cut, and style), because I felt it was really good quality. Definitely give them a try!

name: Ethan Sharp
text: I’ve been going here for a haircut for several months! Kym is the greatest ever! I go on my lunch break and am in and out in 15 minutes. She always does a great job. Highly recommend!!!!

name: God won't Let me fall
text: Everyone at the Decatur beltline location was friendly and professional ! My stylist did a very clean cut . Best fade I've had in a long time... Thank u so much! I will def be back ! The girls here def onow what they are doing👍 I was very pleased with my experience there

name: Chiclet Reynolds
text: If you want a haircut steer clear of here, unless that is you want whatever they decide to cut.  Not even pictures will help, you are going to get the back stacked extremely short where nothing else can be done to fix it.

name: cinda shields
text: The rating must have something to do with Who  you get assigned  to cut your hair, I walked in  with  my hair in a pony tail  and  Fully had in mind a  cut I had gotten off the internet, shoulder-length  bob, But I was assigned  the lady who was  back in the shampoo area  cleaning up, <﻿gulp>  I showed her the picture, she told me That's a LOT of work, so I chickened out. It had been 3  years since I had a haircut.might be  3 more

name: Linda Brandon
text: Listened to what I wanted and did a great job.  Love my hair cut.

name: Janice Knighten
text: They have good hair stylist

name: destiny dial
text: Alanna Dutton made many remarks to me on Facebook simply because I ask for recommendations on French braiding mine & my daughters hair for six flags & she said $8 a braid . I then told her I was fine I wasn’t gonna spend that so she keeps on & on about it .. even posted talks pricing page online by photo she took . She said her clients pay more so I believe she shouldn’t be doing work outside of her workplace ? Maybe that isn’t y’alls rules but I’m just letting everyone know she is not professional in anyway & bashed me hard over me not wanting her to do them . I would never recommend such a person to do anyone’s hair .

name: Gary McConnell
text:
My first visit and I recommend this shop.
Quentin gave me a great haircut!

name: James McCutcheon
text: Fast-food cuts walking

name: Whitney Ellis
text: My boyfriend was upset with his haircut but was too nice to say anything while we were in the salon still. I'm just frustrated that I had to pay for the haircut that he didn't like.

name: Amber Man
text: Kym is an awesome stylist, she does great with my curly hair and is fantastic at a red color and did great with my ombre

name: Michael Fike
text: Ask for Reece she is tha bomb

name: Tina Smith
text: Kym is the best there is and always does an outstanding job at the cut and color.

name: Kelli Lovelace
text: Great value and Kim is really good at what she does.

name: Kym Dozier
text: I work here I just wanted to let everyone know we ARE open sundays!!!! From 1-6 and we would love to see you!!!

name: Juliana Sanchez
text: Hair stylist Stacie left the right side of my hair longer than the left , she cut it in sections and when she was done she didn’t even make sure it was even at all . very disappointed .

name: Branden Ritchie
text: Hair cut was really not good. Had to go get fixed. Could have just been the one hairstylist but unfortunately can not remember her name.

name: Donna Marotti
text: Very friendly.  Inexpensive.  Avoid for color

name: Deborah McKay
text: Great place to get your hair done.

name: Eric George
text: Great service and Reece is the best!  Only place I go to get my hair cut!

name: Adam Allen
text:
Teresa gives an okay cut, but there were many
details I had to go back and fix myself at home. If you want a very average, do-half-of-it-yourself-afterwards-in-the-mirror-at-home haircut, you found the right place.

name: Gay Campbell
text: Only place I go

name: Michael Ryan
text: They were very very

name: Larry wyenandt
text: Great job

name: Leslie Maxwell
text: Love

name: Jessica Haywald
text:
Tried to make our 18 month old wear a mask for a haircut. Absolutely insane. Mask mandate is over in 4 days, not required for children under 7 in our state.

Will never go to this location again.

Do not recommend

name: jeff lentz
text: This wonderful place refused to allow a 2 year old to get a haircut unless she kept a mask on.. a week before statewide mandate is over.. which doesnt include children..5 year old 8 year old and adult all masked.  Lovely, rotund hair stylist was rude as can be. Do not use.. youd think they'd cherish the few customers they do get.

name: Brian Brown
text: Nice girls. Quick and good prices. Been going there for 15 years

name: Amanda Reaves
text: This store is leading the way in social distancing and cleanliness.  I felt extremely safe with great customer service during my 2 hour hair foiling session. Caitlin dose an AMAZING job.

name: Ann Mccutcheon
text: Went to have my hair styled was not thrilled with the outcome and then it fell within an hour. Was told that there was plenty of product in it to hold. It absolutely did not hold. I paid for a service that might as well never had happened

name: Kevin Gardner
text: Great location! I was agonizing over how to change my hair up for the first time in 20 years. With professionalism I would normally reserve for a doctor's office, the stylists listened to what I was going for and suggested some styles. I went with their recommendation and have been a happy customer! They have been great at maintaining the style as well.

name: Danielle Dees
text: Went in today for a trim and I was in and out! Nice girls, very friendly, and fast!!

name: Wells Shelton
text: Worst hair cut of my life. I don’t know how you could not listen to a customer that bad. Leave it long and my head is basically buzzed

name: Bruce Nelson
text: Erin at Supercuts is the best in the area; great service and value!

name: Debra Ellis
text: My grandson got his hair cut here a few days ago.... The person that cut his hair did a awful, awful job!!!!  She obviously did not know what she was doing.  I asked my daughter if she paid the person that did such a botched up job on his head and she said yes mother... We just wanted to get out of there.  My grandson came to our Christmas Eve get to gether, 30 people present, wearing a baseball cap and feeling so embarrassed!!! I most definitely would not have given the so called stylist wanna be a penny for screwing up my grandsons hair!!! Take my advice,  before going to Super Cuts, you would probably be better off to just DIY!!!!

name: Sharon Jones
text: Not real happy with the service

name: MC
text: If you’re wanting to get your nails done and relax I wouldn’t recommend Nancy unfortunately, she is very nice but is very rough with your hands. She puts your hands in uncomfortable positions that I’ve never been through before and doesn’t seem to take her time but seems like she’s in a race to get finished. If you get anxious quickly she wouldn’t be the best nail tech for you. Just my personal experience!

name: myriah dishong
text: Nancy is my go too. I love her, she does amazing every time and won’t let me leave until my nails are perfect!

resp.text: It is awesome. Love to see you in love with our service. Come back to see us soon. We have many more fantastic services for you to try.

name: Carlie Guthrie
text: I made an appointment to get a manicure and pedicure. My “manicure” took a total of 7 minutes, gel and everything, she was in such a rush. My nails weren’t even and the gel polish started flaking 3 days later. However, the guy who did my pedicure took his time and did really well. I am overall disappointed with the service and I’m pretty sure the lady that was rushing everyone was the owner. Won’t go back.

name: Caitlyn Benefield
text: I went here for a gel mani and a regular pedi. My gel mani lasted 3 days before chipping and the polish on my toes lasted about 5 days before I had a huge chip on one of my toes. The mani was definitely rushed but the lady who did my pedi did a good job. The polish is a brand I’ve never seen before so I’m assuming it was a cheap quality polish because I’ve never had polish chip this fast before. I would have gone back to have them fix it but I have a very active toddler and the day I went was the first child free day I’ve had in over a year. Very disappointing.

name: Debra Harper
text: Hope always does a great job!  Everyone is so nice and professional.

resp.text: You are very nice. I appreciate your time leaving feedback for our store. See you soon.

name: Miranda Parish
text: I just love Polished and the staff who are amazing. Selena and others got my nails and toes in great shape for my upcoming Jamaica wedding. This place is so laid back and I always have a great time chatting and laughing with everyone there. Thank you all!!!!

name: Kathleen Hamsen
text: Very, very nice. Great service. . I will be back..

resp.text: I appreciate your time leaving a very kind feedback for our store. We are happy to make our customers happy. See you soon.

name: Yesenia Lane
text: Nancy did my pedicure as well as my toddler's. She did a great job and took her time. She even took time to help me select another nail polish color other than my norm. Really love the color. My biggest disappointment was the lady who did my manicure and nail polish on my hands. She painted half my nails and did a poor job. She was with me a maximum of maybe 5 mins. When I asked for it to be repainted all she gave was attitude. She did not want to repaint them. Even the repainting was not good. Nail polish is still on my skin, you can tell where the base coat is and the nail polish is. Her last comment to me was that I'm going to ruin them and if I do, then I as might as well never came into get a manicure. Very rude lady. Not sure how she is still employed there.

name: Taylor Goodrich
text: I scheduled an appointment for 3:00 and when I got there I was told I had to wait another 20 minutes to be serviced. The man that did my sns was very rude towards me when I asked him politely to cut my nails a little shorter. He rushed my nails and when he dried them a bunch of small bubbles formed in the polish. My nails look horrible. Will not be going back.

name: Maureen Henson
text: She rushed through my pedicure, did not file my nails at all, only clipped them. The nails were not  completely covered with the polish. Worst pedicure I’ve ever had.

name: Cintia Saez
text: So much fun! All 15 girls got their nails done, the staff was very friendly and patient with all of us.  Thank you, great job!!!

resp.text: You are very welcome here. Putting a smile on your face is our job. Glad to have you come back with us soon.

name: marissa hart
text: I would not recommend this salon to anyone ever. They rushed me in, hardly let me pick out a color then when I showed my nail tech a picture of what I wanted to achieve she did not pay attention, she drilled my nails so hard and fast that my fingers physically hurt and I had to tell her to just stop. She got frustrated with me because she could not perform what I wanted but did not want to admit that and then just passed me onto someone else who readily admitted they do not have the color I wanted and could not do what I was asking for. I had to take the current polish and tips that weren't finished, the first lady put on my nails off and make them look somewhat decent to go back out. I WILL NEVER GO HERE AGAIN!!!!! If I could give a -5 Stars I  most defiantly would.

name: Marty McArthur
text:
Someone checked my temperature (forehead) before I entered. Each manicurist's table is outfitted with a plexiglass shield between the manicurist and the customer. Everyone was masked.
I had another excellent gel manicure by Krista. She was professional, very attentive to detail, and pleasant to chat with. She didn't cut any corners or hurry but was still efficient. I always request either her or Ashley when I make an appointment!

resp.text: You are so sweet. It was great to have you as our customer. Hope to see you soon.

name: LaToya Powers
text: Enjoyed my visit here and my nail tech was on point i love my nails!!!!!

resp.text: You are so sweet. It was great to have you as our customer. Hope to see you soon.

name: Samantha Dishong
text: Hope rushed through my nails. Made an appointment that way I can actually enjoy my time. Noticed one of her clients came in to get her feet done, she realized she arrived and literally did my nails within 15 minutes. Didnt check if they all were the same lengh. 3 of them are not straight. Love this place but will not allow her to my nails again.

name: Ashley Wood
text: The pedicure was great. 😄

resp.text: WOW. So kind of you. Thank you for your feedback. Have a wonderful day. See you soon.

name: Anna James
text: Nails were rushed over and look awful! Not worth coming back!

name: Honna Baird
text: Amazing Experience!! Holly was fabulous! I've been to multiple nail salons up here, where my acrylics would chip or pop off. These are not only beautiful,  but solid! I will definitely be back for a fill-in , in the next few weeks!

name: Andrea Carr
text: Always receive great services.  Fernanda is the best.  Always listens to what I want and does an awesome job.

resp.text: It is awesome. Love to see you in love with our service. Come back to see us soon. We have many more fantastic services for you to try.

name: Claire D'Varga
text: Friendly and professional!  I highly recommend the Polished Nail Bar.

resp.text: Wonderful. I am smiling reading your feedback. Customers’ satisfaction is the energy for us to work better. Love to have you back soon.

name: Betty Thorn
text: I loved the atmosphere and my nails are beautiful.

resp.text: Thank you very much for your reviews. We always try our best to make you happy. Please come back soon.

text: As someone who performs nail services, I was very impressed with the service, and talent of the service providers. I Received a full set of pink and white dips and a deluxe pedicure. Worth the price anD very happy with the treatments and my nails.

resp.text: You are very nice. I appreciate your time leaving feedback for our store. See you soon.

The products they use are of highest quality too! I've been going there for years and will continue to! I really appreciate the kindness and attention to detail that they show😊

name: Hayley Shrider
text: Very rushed and had color all over my fingers around my nails when I left. Not worth the money. You can get better quality and better service for the same price (or less) anywhere else.

text: Only place I go to get my mani and pedi done. Love the color selection. Staff is always friendly and helpful! Thanks Polished 😁

Absolutely Thrilled being New to the area & finding this Gem! Kevin & Le were so inviting, warm & pleasant to meet.  My nails turned out Beautiful and The Salon is extremely neat and clean. I'm extremely happy,  I will visit again!
"True Southern Hospitality"

name: Erin T
text: Legit best nail salon experience I've ever had. Got a set with SMS powder, eyebrows waxed and pedicure. The guy who did my pedicure had the most gentle touch. Christy did my nails. I will for sure be back! Reasonably priced. Free mimosas. Self care to to the max!

resp.text: Wonderful. I am smiling reading your feedback. Customers’ satisfaction is the energy for us to work better. Love to have you back soon.

text: Thank you Holly and Krista. I love my toes and nails. Both of you ladies did a wonderful job.

resp.text: You are very welcome here. Putting a smile on your face is our job. Glad to have you come back with us soon.

name: Erica Brown
text: We love going to Polished and getting our nails done, for both me and my husband! Hope does an amazing job and is super professional. The facility is clean and well kept. If you're looking for a quality place to get your nails done, look no further!

name: morgan hollingsworth
text: my nails turned out amazing!!! i love the way my nails came out! the lady that did my nails did an amazing job!! i will definitely be coming back!! and also it is so clean and relaxing!!

name: Kadi Usry
text: Wrong nail bar

text: Absolutely amazing service! Loved the help decided on my color & they were so friendly!

text: Always polite and friendly techs. My favorite place for pampering!

resp.text: You are very welcome here. Putting a smile on your face is our job. Glad to have you come back with us soon.

name: Ginny Stopa
text: I love it!!! I will not go anywhere else.  I have never been one to go often to have my nails done, but now with the gel nails, I go all the time.  It is a wonderful relaxing experience, with complimentary drinks, and use of an mini Ipad at each station.  What a way to pamper yourself!  Once you go here, you won't go anywhere else.

name: Amy Makepeace Petri
text:
My friend and I came by with an hour before close. I called on our way and they insisted we come by, they have time for us. We ended up waiting for about as long as my actual pedicure took. I chose the $36 session and have gotten a better service with the $25 choice from elsewhere. The place had a 100 rating, not sure how that’s possible. The chairs were dingy and run down, massage was unsatisfactory.

I even brought my own polish. They insisted having time for a manicure so I had one. I paid $30 for gel color that I didn’t even like that much.

Rushed job, little massage during pedicure, manicure just ok. I guess that’s what I get for not going to my regular place and coming in before closing time.

name: Hollis Gibertini
text: Always clean, accommodating, relaxing and quick. Good place for inexpensive Mani/Pedis.

name: Sarah Blackmon
text: Super fast service, total bonus! Great people and nice atmosphere. Plan to go back soon. Tiny bit overpriced, buuuut, we were willing to pay for the service and happy with the outcome, so you decide ;)

name: Arienne McGowan
text: I've been going to this salon for almost 2 years now, wonderful customer service, friendly, laid back, and they know what they're doing.

name: Melissa Schaible
text: Kevin was awesome! Very nice place, relaxing & friendly staff. I just moved here not to long ago and have been looking for my new home base nail salon.... after trying 3 other places I found it!! =)

name: Piabelen Hernandez
text: Although it is my first time at the Polished nail bar, I enjoyed their service. Very good service and very good prices.

name: Lori Davidson
text: They always do a fabulous job and get you in quickly !

resp.text: Love to see you like our services. We have plenty more for you to try. We are looking forward to serving you again.

name: BOBBY LEIBFREID
text:
Totally dissatisfied! Went in to get chrome pedicure and fill...looks like a child did it. They have no idea how to properly apply chrome powder. So $113.00 down the drain!! Never going back! Rush Rush Rush....left with silver chrome powder all over me. Hopefully they will watch a video of proper application of chrome powder. I am a licenced cosmetologist with a nail specialty to boot!! Take your money elsewhere! Update..went in to speak to owner about it and hes too mad about the review I gave to make it right..no offer or refund..he  Said he would have preferred that I came back in and let them fix it before I gave a review but obviously he doesn't understand how reviews work.What a joke! They dont even display proper licences for workers! Reporting to cosmetology board!  I suggested that his employees watch a YouTube video for proper application of Chrome powder you do not put it on with your finger...duhhhhh
Went back to talk to owner and he was RUDE and said he would have fixed it if I had not kedt a bad review! Obviously this guy has no idea how reviews work!! Karma is on them.. take your money somewhere that wont rush your services or treat you like pond scumb!

name: Shannon Nelson
text: They always do a great job and are super friendly.

resp.text: Thank you very much for your feedback. We were glad to serve you.

name: Catherine Crowley
text: The best pedicure you will find anywhere in the Eastern Shore! Holly is the best!

name: Amy Kidd
text: They are family to me now!  Love them all!

resp.text: Wonderful. I am smiling reading your feedback. Customers’ satisfaction is the energy for us to work better. Love to have you back soon.

name: Janice Loughlin
text: Great place. I will definitely return.

resp.text: Wonderful. I am smiling reading your feedback. Customers’ satisfaction is the energy for us to work better. Love to have you back soon.

name: Cecelia Asberry
text: Wine and nails done... who could ask for a better place to get pampered. Staff is very nice and caring. Loved it!

name: Merrill Whitener
text: Love this place!  Would not think of going somewhere else to get my nails done.  Clean

name: katie morgan
text: Kevin did amazing on my nails will definitely be returning for all my nail needs!

name: Allison Fisher
text: Always friendly, clean, and welcoming. I always feel pampered and prettier when I leave.

name: Sandy Miller
text: Very disappointed.  Wasn't going to even say anything but after waking up to my toenails already chipping, not happy.  First impression, disgusting. Didn't look like chairs or pedicure areas are cleaned and/or taken care of.  We were rushed to pick colors and sat in our chairs 30 mins waiting our turn.  Pedicures were rushed and painful.  Website advertises 'professional beauty service,' free wifi, and complimentary wine and soda... Ladies were NOT professional at all.  When my friend asked about the wifi password, the lady who gave it to her was not clear and mumbled it 2 or 3 times before my friend just gave up.  And, we were NEVER offered a drink.  She nor I will ever return.

name: Morgan Kamphuis
text: I was not impressed with this salon. It was way overpriced in my opinion ($90 for a manicure and pedicure). The lady who did the pedicure cut the skin on 4 different toes. The chairs also appeared dirty.

name: Erica Connell
text:
Polished Bar burned my eyebrows!
Do NOT USE THEM.
I have pics to prove it! Save yourself and go somewhere else!

name: Haley McGraw
text: I love this place, They have the sweetest people working here.

name: Ingrid Hartman
text: Sitting here now with Kevin and it's my first time. Won't got anywhere else! Super nice, professional and clean!!!!

name: Samantha Nash
text: After going to several different nail salons in the area I have finally found a clean salon that does great work!

name: Christine Jacquemin
text: Always a nice staff, clean and reasonably priced

name: Belen Wagner
text: Super friendly staff! And quick!

name: Dashira Alvarez
text: I tried gel and did not work for me. I tried sns last week and I came today ( just 7 days after, with all the sns in my nails coming off)  they charge full price. Meaning that I have pay $135 in the last 3 weeks  (19 days). They said that probably are my nails.

name: Lad Drago
text: Great atmosphere.  Love Le and Kevin.

name: Tina G.
text: The customer service was poor and they need more workers.

name: Serendipity Sharra
text: Was not impressed with the atmosphere or the staff. Not friendly and not a great selection of colors.

name: PAmela Rue
text: Hit or Miss - disappointed with rush job and chipped nail polish next day

name: Carrie Collyer
text: Very nice facility. Kevin is a professional.

name: Jennifer Manuel
text: Incredibly rude and unprofessional staff... and they are overpriced

name: erica connell
text:
First time there for a wax. They burned me and most of my skin is ripped off above my  eyes!
and all they said was "put Vaseline on it".
Beware! They may scar you then not take responsibility

name: Tina Flowers
text: Love the staff and owners

name: Peggy Coe
text: Thank you for a beautiful job

name: Jessi Kirk
text: Walk ins welcome, bring cash for tip.

name: Kim Bates
text: Loved it!

name: Stephen Buchanan
text: Le was terrific! Yes, that's how she spells her name. I was dirty after work so I wanted a shampoo before my cut. She did, plus washed my hair again after doing a perfect cut and didn't charge anything more, plus recommended some terrific product and gave me her personal cell number. I'll stick with her!

name: Kizzie Gooden
text: Don’t really deserve a 1 Star....I went in after work (around 1:30pm) and the lady pretty much fussed at me for coming. She asked me what I was there for and I said a wash and style. Then she said you’re going to have to come back tomorrow morning because I’m the only one here and I have two before you. I’m thinking but you close at 7pm and only have two before me why do I have to come back tomorrow? So they lost a customer before they’ve had a chance to serve me. So, no, I won’t be back tomorrow or ever.

name: Tim Aldridge
text: Emily did a great job! I came in around 11am and there was no wait whatsoever. I see many posts from people saying there was only one person working when they came but there were 3 on while I was there. It appears the business has read these reviews and is staffing up to provide better service.

name: DJ RaptorXS
text: Marquita was super nice & did a great job!  Highly recommended!

name: Carol Adams
text: Worst cut EVER!  I was butchered by the middle-aged Asian woman at the Homewood (Edgemont Town Center) salon. All she had to do was follow the cut I had. Did not realize how bad it was until I got home and brushed it out. Cut is uneven and choppy. Could have done better myself with a blindfold and garden sheers. Turns out my mother had the same experience with the same "stylist." The woman should NOT be cutting hair. $27 for the cut and "style."  STAY AWAY from this place!

name: Katie Crandall
text: I went in during a weekday ( 9:45AM ) and there was only one male working. He noted it would be over an hour for a simple trim because “they only scheduled one person to work.” He did not offer any validation and continued with the person he was working with. Extremely poor customer service; this place doesn’t even deserve one star.

name: evildarklemons Dark
text:
PETITION TO FIRE THE OLD FOREIGN LADY!
Do not walk in! Dont even go near this place when the old foreign lady is working there. Ive told her 3 times i just wanted a specific trim and she did not follow directions i also told her and my mom also told her to do this and not do this. She wouldnt listen and just pointed to the picture right beside me and said "you want it like this" i said no and went over with her again to what i wanted. Well i simply wanted a trim and got 3.5 inches taken off me now. This is so frustrating! I see that im not the only victim to have there hair cut by this lady. She needs to be fired for this this is very bad customer service.

name: Johnny Lee
text: Had a great hair from Miss Lee. Will come back

name: Montrice Craig
text: A'Ryan is a great hair stylist she does a excellent job with color and cuts. She did really good on my bob so for cut, style, and color I suggest you go to her

name: Shelley Roman
text: Not a go to for color. I tried getting subtle highlights and I ended up with super blonde highlights on my brown hair! Was very embarrassed to walk out. Never again.

name: Caroline Wright
text: I went in for a simple "straight across the bottom trim", evening out the sides and back to chin length.  I came home with a disaster!  Lots of hair was missed in the cutting procedure and not only was it not even, it was jacked up shorter in the back than when I walked in.  I came home and cried.  I do not remember the Asian girls name who was asked to give me a simple trim but I know that it will take 2 months before someone else can fix it.  Wasted time, tears and $20. I would give ZERO stars if it were an option.

name: karen Edwards
text:
Update: The new manager was great and trying to improve things. She apologized for the poor job the lady did and refunded me. As far as I know the lady who did this hack job is still there. She was mad at. e, would not speak to me or apologize. She couldnt careless if you are happy with what she does to your head or not. I waited until the end of the year to get my hair fixed and wore it up the whole summer. My hair looks a million times better from a student at Aveda. Stay away from from the lady at this place who clearly has many of the same horrible reviews.
__________________________________________
If I could give this place 0 Stars I would. The lady who cut my hair decided to do her own thing and left big chunks, that she called layers, in my hair. The closest thing I can describe my hair in terms of what it looks like now is basically almost a mullet. I came in with really long hair with beautiful long blended layers that needed to be trimmed up and left looking like I fell on a weedeater. It looked horrible and she did not care and tried to charge me double. I immediately went to another salon for an opinion and they said I needed to go back and get my money back and the only way to correct it is to cut about 4 more inches off or keep it up until it grows out and I can get it cut again. Theres no way to blend with the hack job she did. She refused to be understanding and concerned about how I felt about my hair and was angry that I didn't like her "work of art" and that I wouldn't pay her double than what I asked for. Horrible experience. Do not go here.

name: Will Scogin
text: I specifically asked the lady to just trim my hair and keep the layers, and she ended up cutting 2-3 inches off. It was rough/looked awful. Just got it fixed at a different salon, and the new person was shocked at how uneven it was. I would NOT recommend going here!

name: Shyam Panthi
text: There is a vietnamese/filipino old lady "Vuong" who demands cash payments and does not give receipts. She is also very rude and does not know how to cut hair. She is probably pocketing all the cash without the knowledge of the owner. Worst place I ever had a hair cut. Would give a minus rating if possible. Please don't go here.

name: Scott Postin
text: If you value your hair then you need to stay away from this place. I went there on 3 different occasions and had my hair cut by 3 different people and each haircut got progressively worse. The last time I asked her 2 use a 1 guard on the back and the sides and a 2 on the top, simple right? Oh no, she used a 2 on the back and sides and a 4 on top. It looked horrible. Today I ended up going to Smart style salon in Wal-Mart on lakeshore just to get it fixed. DON'T GO TO HEADSTART!!!!!!!

text: After speaking with stylist Taylor about my hair and and asking her if she knew how to cut natural hair  (she said she did), we made an an appt. Despite showing her the cut I wanted and telling what I wanted she still cut off more than 75% of my hair and the cut looks absolutely nothing at all like the several pictures I showed her and explained to her. She was also late for the appointment and rushed through to finish me up. I am extremely unhappy as is my husband. Her lack of attention to my desired haircut has left me feeling angry, emotional and extremely dissatisfied. I would have rather her tell me she couldn’t cut it then to take it upon herself to give me a style she wanted for me. As, I am the paying customer. We spoke and she is aware of my dissatisfaction and has offered to re-cut it. However, there is nothing left to cut. My hair is shorter than my son’s. It is shorter than a TWA, a very masculine cut. The sad part is, it’s a week before Easter. 😥

text: Never knew this place was here but holy cow! Prices are amazing and quality is top notch. Bethany did the BEST balayage, toner, cut, style and wax ever!!! Definitely recommend.

text: Very pleased with my highlights that bethanie did. It’s very hard to get the yellow orange tones out of my hair but she is a hair magician ! Came out a beautiful pale blonde just like I wanted. text: Very quick and professional. I usually don’t bother with reviews but I feel as though Bethany deserves one. The past few times I’ve got my hair faded it was by her and she’s always the one working long hard hours with a smile on her face and always gives the best cuts and edge ups. Check her out, you may need to call in advance to book with her.

name: Tina Townsend
text: I went here to get my hair cut and my daughters ends trimmed. We got there and the sign said they close at 6, it was before 5 when we arrived and as soon as we walked in we were turned around and were told they were closing soon. So instead we went to Great Clips(by Walmart in Hazel Green). There the staff was friendly and welcoming, I got a great hair cut and my daughter had a wonderful experience getting her hair trimmed. We then went back to the shopping center where Head Start is located to go to Publix to grab groceries for dinner. While in that area we drove past Head Start that still had their open sign on and they were still inside working. I was really disappointed because I see the great reviews but unfortunately we did not get that experience but it’s fine I will drive the ten minutes longer to go to Great Clips. Where I feel wanted and valued.

She had me turned away from the mirror and I was horrified when I saw some long stands of hair on the floor. I told her you are cutting too much off. She said she was putting in layers. I said I already have long layers and just need it trimmed. Turns out she cut about 3 inches off and now my wavy hair has shrink up to a Christmas tree sitting on my head. I can barely get my hair in a bun for work and it will be months before I have enough weight in my hair to wear it down. My hair has not been this short in decades and I don’t even recognize myself. I will never come back here.

text:
I really enjoyed visiting bethanie at headstart.

I arrived at 9:15am and was surprised to see she was already with a customer.  I left at 9:30 when it became apparent she was nowhere near finishing.  It was a disappointing experience, and there was truly no good reason for it.

Secondly, when I've gotten my hair cut in the past it did not need buzzers for it to be 2"-6"long.  This person immediately took a buzzer to the top of my head. Jennifer, we're sorry to hear this - thank you for letting us know. We always strive to provide a quality salon experience, and we have shared your review with our local Guest Service team.

If you are interested in discussing this with a District Leader, please contact 1-800-737-3535 or departmentcs@regiscorp.com.

Thank you,
SmartStyle Guest Services Team

The bad part is...she messed up my eye brows making one very thin and one broad. And the worst part is...she ruined the upperlips place by using very hot wax and pulled the strip so harshly that it caused severe bruises at my upperlips skin. I noticed that after coming home when it started reddening and paining. It was so awkward for me to go to office today where I had to tell the story to everyone who I faced. It was bad experience. If the assistant is not trained, the owner should not allow them to work for  any paid service. I hope the owner admits his/her mistake  and take care of that in future.

text: I get my brows threaded here all the time!! She is the only person trust doing them, and she is always super quick!!

name: Alexandra Kortright
text: When I came into this place, it had been a few years since I had gotten my brows done professionally.  I had taken to plucking or shaving myself, but I had dropped the ball and this was just long overdue.  It was super quick and quite possibly the least painful threading experience I’ve ever had (it did still hurt, though).  The lady who did them was super patient with me even though I practically spasmed each time she took the hairs out.  My skin didn’t hurt at all after (which has happened in the past with other places) and it was overall a pretty good experience.  I’d come here again.

name: Camille Whitfield
text:
***UPDATED Review (5 Stars)***
I went back after work and I was given the best service.
She corrected and blended the chopped layers. It is about 4 inches shorter than I like, But it looks and even feels so much better!
My suggestion is, when you go in, ask them if they are comfortable with doing the cut and or style you are requesting. I would have been way more satisfied the first time if the lady who cut my hair originally would have told me she isn't comfortable doing layers. I didn't have to pay for the Re-Do but I did tip. (Which I shouldn't have had to pay for it since it was as bad as it was, so glad they didn't charge me!)
***Original Review (3 Stars)***
I only ever come here.. today I walked in, got someone brand new. And my hair looks absolutely awful. I am going to go back in tonight and hope someone is there that can fix this. It is supposed to be layered and it looks like it was just cut straight across. And it took almost a full hour for this monstrosity. Very upset and hope it will be corrected.

name: Quin Tube
text: We would like to invite everyone  back to the salon...The salon became under New Management May 1 , 2018.. We have a whole new staff with lots of experience and very professional.. Listening to our guest and their satisfaction is what we strive for... Loving our guest and making them feel great is our goal...  Come back give us a try and mention this post and receive $2.00 off on your haircut... We look forward to having you as our guest..

name: Maniacsc
text: Love miss Cathy

name: Amber Marie
text: Hair stylist screwed my child's hair up I showed her a picture of what we agreed on and she glanced at it once and said I do this all time I remember what the cut is and started wacking away. My daughter wanted a asymmetrical cut ended up with what my 70 year old aunt gets short. I'm pissed... But she was a polite lady and me and my daughter just didn't have the nerve to tell her she screwed it up, when I noticed things where going the wrong way with the cut I asked so I guess we're not making it like the picture, and she ignored me and I asked again. She like oh you do know that the girl in that picture has course hair and that want work on her.😠😠😠

name: Linda Pearcy
text: I didn't receive the full hair cut that I ask for. Didn't follow the instructions I gave to her. I said that I wanted longer on the sides and front and at a angel. Hair cut I received is the same length all the way around. Will not be returning.

name: Don Frederick
text: Stay away from this shop. The stylist are friendly however I got a horrible trim. All I asked was for the sides to be shaved and there are several spots longer then others. I should have now something was wrong when the other shop in the same center had an hour wait the this place had stylist sitting and talking. And it does not help that they charged me $20 for what took her 5 minuets. If at all possible I would find somewhere else to get a cut if at all possible.

name: Nichole Cantone
text: The stylist said she'd have no problem doing the same cut as in the picture I showed her. Halfway through the cut when I realized it was not looking right. When I questions her about it she said she'd have to style it so she can finish adding layers. When I asked for more layers on the top like in the picture I showed it was almost as if she was refusing to do it. I finally decided to leave rather than argue with her. 3 days later and I'm left with an uneven lopsided poofy Dora the Explorer looking bob.

text: I called for a same day appt and they were able to help me out. Hannah was my hair stylist. She was awesome! All I needed was a quick cut since I hadn't had one since before the pandemic. Everyone was polite, professional and helpful. It was an overall pleasant experience and my hair looked great! Thanks Salon 12!!

name: Tamara E.
text: From the moment I walked through the doors, I felt appreciated and a priority as a customer. My stylist, Hannah, was super sweet and actually took extra time during our consultation/services to understand what I wanted, gave me exactly that, and also carried on a nice conversation with me. I had about 8 inches cut off of my hair and Hannah was confident and supportive throughout the entire experience. What I wasn’t able to explain (by not knowing terminology) she was able to deliver by actually listening to me and making sure she knew exactly how I wanted my hair cut/styled. Everyone I encountered during my visit was so nice and welcoming. The salon was immaculately clean. I enjoyed my experience overall, but the service that Hannah gave me, including the hairstyle, but especially the hospitality, will be the reason I am going to be a returning guest. I would recommend this salon to any of my friends or family. Thank you, Hannah,  for a relaxing, pampering experience.

name: Joni Kniseley
text: Hannah did an amazing job on my highlights and blow out. Salon is so clean and welcoming. Great products too!!

text: Giving 5 stars to a a business really does mean that as far as I am concerned, it was perfect service. I truly have to say, I wish there were 6 stars for this review. Jennifer was personable, hospitable, and genuine. She made me feel extremely comfortable, and all of her staff went out of their way to do the same. I am extremely pleased with my hair, and I truly feel like I ah e spent an afternoon being pampered....and I typically can’t stand going to salons. This will definitely be my new hair care home!

text: For the price, they should be offering MUCH more with their pedicures. I was party of a bridal party and felt quite underwhelmed with the pedicure. The lady doing the pedicure just seemed tired and just ready to be done and an attitude like she didn't want to be there. She didn't trim/shape my nails, treat my feet and the poish was sloppy. I know this isn't their specialty but don't charge spa pedicure prices for a "bucket" pedicure with pre packaged kits. Comes off very cheap. My manicure was PHENOMENAL!!!!!!  The owner is the sweetest! Another thing.... They screwed the bride, let a bridesmaids leave with a "oh she's got me" without verifying... Bad business not to verify :(

name: Sharon Miller
text: My first visit and Cindy made me feel as though I had known her for years.  Had a pedi and mani and it looks so good!   Love the shop and will most definitely be visiting regularly.  Thanks to all of the staff I talked with for your welcoming atmosphere.

name: Christine Brignac
text:
I have to thank Cindy the owner for her hospitality and pedicure!! Great place, clean and welcoming. Brian the massage therapist was incredible...he knew what areas needed the most attention. I can not thank them both enough for a great afternoon of pampering!!!
CHECK THEM OUT!!

name: Sara Talbott
text: Had a girls day here while visiting Gulf Shores. Couldn’t be more pleased. Received a facial, massage, and pedicure for an amazing price. The staff is extremely professional and nice. Very clean. We will be back here for our next girls trip. Definitely worth it

text: Very talented professionals at CC'S Day Spa and Salon are always accommodating and most efficient. I recommend and refer my brides to them and have never had a complaint!!!! text: They did my makeup for my wedding and WOW!!! Perfection! Airbrushed - I received SOO many compliments. It stayed on for 24 hours and looked amazing in photos. Highly recommend!!!!! So worth it!!!

text: I could not offer higher praise for CC's Salon & Day Spa! They took care of all my wedding day hair and nail needs for myself, my mom and all of my bridesmaids! Not only did we all look AMAZING, but we had such a fun, relaxing experience and thoroughly enjoyed our time here. We will be back!! Thanks so much CC's for your amazing service and skills!

name: Tina Cerne
text: Shannon did an amazing job with my hair. My hair was three different colors from a bad experience at another salon. She was professional, and recommended what we needed to do to fix my hair. I am incredibly happy with my new look. I look forward to my next visit, and trying out some of their other spa offers.

name: David Drennan
text: Good enough for a massage!

name: Jenna Stone
text: I had a therapeutic massage with Valerie on Saturday and it was the best massage I’ve ever had in my life!!  I get them regularly because I suffer from tension in my neck and shoulders causing tension headaches.   Valerie was very professional and listened to my concerns. I’ve never felt better leaving an appointment and I can’t wait to visit the area again so I can book another massage with her!  Valerie truly has miracle hands!!  The salon/spa was very welcoming and clean.  I enjoyed browsing the cute selection of clothes and jewelry while I waited.  I can’t wait to go back!!!  Thank you Valerie!!

name: Terri Paxton
text: Laura did an amazing job on my hair for my wedding. I was from out of town and selected the salon online. I was over the top pleased with the accommodations they made for me and of how beautiful my hair turned out. I highly recommend both the salon and Laura. Thank you so much for helping me pull off my special day.

name: Moonchild Jess
text: They were very nice upon arrival and pretended like they would squeeze us in at a later time. They waited for a whole hour then called and cancelled our reservation! It caused us to not have time to go anywhere else to get hair and nails done! That is the worst customer service I have ever experienced!

name: Harsh Gandhi
text: It is the best hair salon in the whole world... Employees are very talented and professional..!! And most importantly they care about their customers..!!

name: Lisa Fisher
text:
Laura did a great job on my hair for my wedding. I showed her a picture and it turned out perfect! Very friendly! Highly recommend!
Thank you Laura!

name: Cat Rude
text: I got an excellent one hour massage from Brenda! Lisa was kind and upbeat on the phone. She got three of us scheduled for a girls day within one day and called me back to confirm within an hour! They have a really cute salon that’s reasonably priced and has a really sweet, fun selection.

name: Shelli Anderson
text: These ladies were fantastic.  I brought my 79 year old mom for a day of pampering while on what is likely to be her last beach vacation.  Thank you so much for making us a special day with great memories.   My sister and Aunt totally are jealous and planning their day later this week too!  Highly recommend this salon and we had many services between Mom & I.  Waxing, massage therapist was one of the best, pedicures and a fantastic cut and color on Mom.  Thank you again ladies.  You are amazing!

name: Joan Burke
text: Was shocked at the price. I am originally from Atlanta and go back there regularly to visit my children and grandchildren. I usually have my hair done while I am there. However, one time I needed to have my roots touched up. I didn’t ask price beforehand (my bad) and was shocked when I checked out and the price was $80. I have never paid more than $55 at assorted salons in Atlanta. When the personnel at this salon came to our neighborhood (Peninsula) for an event, I was impressed and that is the reason I went there. However, I do not believe a simple root touch-up should cost this much. I won’t be back.

name: Shelia McKee
text: Very nice Experience. AJ you did a wonderful Facial. And you are so Sweet. Valerie I can say WOW to you The best massage I've ever had. Thank you Ladies

name: Shopgirl18
text: Looking for a great massage then call Valerie.  She is friendly and can work miracles with stressed necks and shoulders! Very nice facility and very clean .Easy to reach in the middle of Gulf Shores.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the great review we enjoyed your visit and hope to see you soon

name: Christian Henslee
text: This was my first time at a salon and I could really see a difference between the two! The staff was really tight knit and provided a great atmosphere. She was a saving grace regarding my hair for our family Thanksgiving pictures! She even kept my Charlie Brown style scar hidden just perfectly, which is no easy feat. I'd recommend this place to anyone who comes down here! Thank you again!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words Christian! We are like family here at the salon and we want our costumers to feel the same, we try hard to provide a great experience for all :)

name: TONYA Medina
text: High class very expensive. They sell clothes shoes jewelry.  They also do massages. I was scared to ask how much. But Beth was nice and cut my hair.

This is the best salon in town!  Great prices. I always get the best service and everyone is so friendly.  Cindy always helps me and works around my schedule.  I never leave disappointed. Always get a compliment on color and cut.
The first salon that I use steadily and will always recommend - to everyone.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Julie Cottrell
text: These ladies are too shelf! My step daughter wanted electric lizard (lime green) hair. And they nailed it!! Nails were done, massage and facial.... best spa day

resp.text: Thank you so much we really appreciate your kindness and hope to see you again

name: Sandra Griffin
text: Got a GREAT facial from AJ,sooo relaxing!!! Then Shannon worked miracles with my hair and nails!! I highly recommend CCs,the ladies were so sweet and accommodating

name: Jess Stewart
text: Our family was on vacation and today my husband was treating me to a spa day for our anniversary. After a spa in Orange Beach booked me the wrong services and never called to inform me that they were unable to offer a service they personally confirmed two days prior, I was very disappointed, to say the least. This spa squeezed me in last minute and was so very kind and accommodating. Great Swedish massage! Thank you for a great experience!

resp.text: Thank you for your review Jess. We are so happy that we could turn your day around and give you exactly want you wanted. Hope to see you again!

name: Amber Treuting
text: My mom and I had the most relaxing and pleasant experience here. The staff is so welcoming and up to date on the latest trends. I had my first experience with dipped nails and they are amazing!!

name: Liz T
text: Hands down the BEST Hair Salon in Gulf Shores! Cindy was AWESOME! Extremely professional, AMAZING at what she does!  I have really thick, poofy, hard to deal with hair, and she thinned it, layered it, and gave me a haircut better than I've ever had in my LIFE!  Thought I've had good cuts before, buy now I know what a good cut is and feels like!  I will get my hair done here forever!  Thanks Cindy!  If I could give you 10 stars I would!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! You are an amazing client and we appreciate you Liz.

name: Janet Plante
text: Great experience! Everyone was so kind and pleasant. Very clean and professional...reasonable pricing.Received a one hour swedish massage from Brenda...my first professional massage ever. I'm hooked!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review we hope to see you again real soon.

name: Alisha Park
text: I got my hair and makeup done for my beach wedding. My hair was nothing like the pictures I showed for reference.  I had a hair piece that was supposed to be on like a headband and she put it on like a tiara. My hair wasn't smoothed out at all and was hairspray ed frizzy.  My makeup was so drastic and I felt like I was going to a pageant and not my wedding day. I actually wanted to cry when I saw myself in the mirror but did not have time to have anything redone. She didn't even let me pick my colors for my eye shadow. I wanted natural. I also paid extra to have the airbrush and I had so much makeup caked on that it showed lines on my face that I didn't even know I had. I would've been better off and felt more beautiful had I just done it myself and not wasted  $150. I went back and wiped half of my makeup off and tried to fix my hair the best I could.  I'm so disappointed because I only wanted to have the ceremony for the picutres and I won't even want to look at them.

name: Sylvia Howland
text: CiCi was very professional and the first hair stylist who knows how to cut & style hair in Foley. Orange Bch. Gulf Shores Al. I have gone to over 12 salon's. Have been living in this area for over 35 yrs., so I think I have been around. Everyone loves my hair. Thanks again CiCi. Hope to see you soon and bringing a new client.

text: Wonderful experience. The staff was so friendly and inviting. The massage therapist Victoria was amazing. Will definitely go back!

text: If you live or vacation in Gulf Shores, CC’s Salon and Day Spa is a must visit.. you won’t be disappointed! Following the massage, Shannon Ryck provided a great haircut, making certain to ask my specific wishes for the cut. I was most pleased with the entire experience.

text: Laura was lovely, and the rest of the staff were very friendly. I’m picky about waxing but my brows look marvelous. A great find in AL!

name: Jacqueline Frame
text: I would give 0 stars if possible. We showed up 15 min before our appointment and filled out our paperwork. The ladies were talking around us about unprofessional subjects. Came time for our appointment and no body said anything. Finally 10 min after our appointment time I asked how much longer it was going to be as we had reservations to go to afterwards. With out apology they went to go check and came back saying they didn't know because one massage client made them late. 25 min past our appointment time we had to leave. They asked if we wanted to reschedule and I explained to them that this experience had left a bad taste in my mouth. They responded by saying these things happen. I do not suggest them as they are overpriced for the service they offer.

name: Chris Denson
text: Great medical massage this a.m. helped relieve ongoing pain....

text: Sweetest ppl ever!!! We traveled 12 hours to get to gulf shores for our 30th wedding Anniversary. We were running almost an hour late due to traffic, they were so kind and actually waited for us after hours. Kaitlin & Valarie gave us an hour-long couples massage and let me tell you, these girls were absolutely AMAZING. Valarie even got rid of my sciatica that I've had for weeks!! Thanks so much girls.... May God bless you!!

name: arlene meyer
text: \   what a wonderful place the staff is so helpful and pleasant to be with the service is impeccable

name: mason munoz
text: Great massage and get complements on my haircut all the time.

name: Crystal Fletcher
text: We booked a spa day for a group of 5. When I booked the day I was assured that no one would be sitting waiting on the others and that everyone would be receiving a service at the same time. Things started off fine but went south after the first round. One of our group sat for 1 hour waiting and we wound up waiting for the last lady for an additional hour. Really a matter of time management.  As far the services we were pleased. The massage was phenomenal.  We were asked where she needed to concentrate and she did a great job. Very relaxing!  The facial was wonderful as well. It was really one of the best I have received. The mani/pedi could have been better. Polish was sloppy and and cuticles were not trimmed on the pedi.  However, the ladies were friendly and it was overall and pleasant experience.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Crystal and for being so honest about your experience. The only way we can get better and always be growing and perfecting everyone's experience here is to have honest people like yourself. So far we have hired a receptionist so we will have better time management and we are practicing more on pedicures so we can be more comfortable getting the job done right. We would love to see you again next time you visit and maybe you can get another pedicure and let us know if we have gotten better. I'm glad you had an overall pleasant experience, That is our goal for everyone to have.

name: Therese Ann
text: I went in to have my hair professionally done and honestly...I could have done it myself as horrible as it turned out. I am embarrassed to say I paid $180 plus $30 tip (out of courtesy) to treat myself. It's very uneven and burndt. I have never had my hair turn out this color. I feel if you scew up someone's hair YOU SHOULDNT CHARGE THEM. I went in with healthy hair, left with burnt uneven hair. I'm disgusted. I GUESS YOU DON'T ALWAYS GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR. I WILL NEVER USE THEM AGAIN.

name: debbie Adams
text: Thank you Beth for my great color and cut

name: Denny Shirley Owens
text: Cindy has been my stylist for several years.  I’m always pleased with her work, and the professional, pleasant, and friendly atmosphere of her salon.

name: Mollie Cole
text: I chose this place because of the reviews on Google but I would NOT recommend this salon to anyone for their wedding or bridal party. I was told over the phone that they would not quote me prices because I had little girls getting their hair done so if it was simple it wouldn't cost as much. I also had to give them $100 deposit to hold the reservation (completely understandable until I arrived). One of the stylists was very nice but appeared to be more of an apprentice and had to keep asking for help to do the hair of the 2 younger girls. We were still charged full price for these styles ($75 for a 6 year old and 8 year old). One was a bun and did NOT look good and it didn't even resemble the picture we used. Again, she was very nice but the hair was not close to what we asked for. Two of the styles were supposed to be beachy waves and instead we left with weird curls and half done hair. Both charged $55 and took almost no time making it look even decent. They asked me to send pictures ahead of time for my hair and then clearly had not looked at them. I had to ask multiple times about fixing it (it was for my wedding after all) and while my stylist was nice enough to fix it she did seem VERY annoyed. I left with ok hair that I could live with (not exactly what I had in mind as a bride). And somehow I was charged the same price for mine as the 6 year old flower girl. The owner was pretty rude - she told my sister that she could put the little girls in a room and close the door while we waited. The same girls she charged full price updos for. I guess they were good enough to pay but not make noise in her salon? The last complaint was that the stylists kept stopping with our party to help a mom and bride that were also in the salon. Overall very bad hair and bad experience.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback we appreciate the negative review as well as the great reviews . We strive to help everyone have a pleasant experience. We have a great salon and lots of talent.it is unfortunate you didn't have that experience.moving forward we will take your comments and grow from them. C.C Salon

I always leave here feeling rejuvenated and beautiful. I recommend Pure Beauty to everyone I know.

Also,  they only use hard wax compared to doing wax and cloth strips-- this method hurt a bit less and leaves a silky smooth finish.  After the service she applied this after wax oil which provided a calming effect after the service.  Give them a try,  you won't regret it! Tell them Jalisa sent you!

If you don't complain about mistakes,

Take what you want from this honest review, but they'll never see me again.

text: Every time i go the service is great! The salon is clean and i am always happy with the way my nails look after! Will go there always!

name: Brittany Koptis
text: Thank you so much I have been looking for a place to get acrylic nails then I found y’all excellent service and staff absolutely loved it definitely worth my money and time I will be coming back

name: Carolyn proctor
text:
took what I felt was a long time for color change on toes...and gel polish on fingers.
Very pricey too.

name: Livia Woods Saucier
text: Tracey, Helan, and all the women that work at Deluxe Nails  are some of the most talented, and caring  women I've ever met.  Tracey has done my lashes for years and I've always left with beautiful, perfect lashes.  She does such maticulas work that they last and look beautiful for quite a long time.  My daughter's and I have also had our nails done,and everything is always perfect. .  They are all amazing at what they do and care about their client's.

name: ch mrtns
text:
I used to like deluxe nails, I’ve done gel manicure with Nikki and Randy and I was pleased with the results. I’ve tried other nail technicians at the salon and the results were always inconsistent. Now I can see that the service has steadily declined.
This last time I went there Randy was not available and I ended up getting my nails done with this lady that suggested for me to get SNS. Obviously she had no clue what she was doing, I could sense her insecurities, I’ve chose black and my nails are far from black, I can see thru many spots, uneven on the sides and missing spots on the edges, plus some of my nails are different spots. I called to speak with the manager and she’s offered to get my nails removed and done again. I told her that I wanted to get only gel to avoid an unsatisfactory result and she said she would not refund the difference. I’ve paid $35 for SNS and gel is $25. She told me she is already offering me to fix the nails but she won’t give me a $10 credit. Worse customer service, if I could put a negative 5 star I would. I told her that unfortunately I would not go back to support her business and she hung up the phone on me. I wish Randy would find another nail salon to work so I could continue getting my nails done with him, he does an exceptional job!

name: Elizabeth Moody
text: The Signature Deluxe Pedicure is AMAZING! 2 hours of massage, pampering, exfoliating, expert painting & bliss.

name: Suzanne Callaghan
text: I have been coming here for four years and the service and quality have steadily declined.  Last month I got a "deluxe" pedicure, and the tech barely scrubbed my heels with a pumice leaving my feet just the same as when I walked in, except for alot of rubbing of lotion and some hot stones.  Worst pedicure of my life.  Then today, I go in for a gel fill in only (had learned the hard way about pedicures) and my nails were great, just what I asked for...then they charge me $11 more than the menu states, and they start gibbering about me having repairs....this is absolutely not true.  No new nails were put on today and I left with the same tips that I came in with.  One girl came out to look at what the menu said the price should be, and admitted to me that it was wrong.  I stood there waiting to be refunded $11 and the manager hands me $2.  I left at that point because $9 is not worth arguing about, but made it clear that I would not be back.  They rely heavily on acting like they don't understand English well...and get away with it because most don't bother to see if they were charged the correct amount,  and just blindly hand them their card and sign.  This is not the first instance that this has happened here, so I've heard.  It's a shame that they treat customers like that, as we need a good, reputable salon in Fairhope.  I will be driving to Daphne from now on.

name: Wanda Thompson
text: There is no way I would go anywhere else. The best!!

name: Cayman Goodwine
text: Horrible expierence. Paid for a manicure and was served no more than a polish. There was absolutely no difference. The people were rude and the guy doing my nails was on his phone the whole time.

name: Cecilia Till
text: If I could put a negative 5 star on this I would. I have never had a bad experience in my life with nail places but this one. My nail length is not what I asked for. I asked for my nails to be a little over my finger tips but I got short short SHORT nails instead. The only thing I like about my nails is the color. I strongly dislike the service. And I HIGHLY recommend anyone to go to The Nail Place in Robertsdale AL. That is where im going and staying for now on!

name: Ray Reynolds
text: Good people and good service

name: Scott Trotter
text: Great place to get very happy feet

name: Rob Schwartz
text: Wax all over my shirt. Went in for facial wax, they squeezed me into a tiny room with another lady lying on a table with 2 working on her. I was a little uncomfortable as she seemed to be sleeping through her treatment & probably wanted some privacy.  I had on a nice shirt, I was sitting in a regular chair, not leaning back, no towel or anything over my shirt. I have had it done sitting up elsewhere with no dripping so didn't worry about it until I was paying and she started rubbing at my shirt, which probably made it worse. Have had a nice mani there, however, it is almost always crowded and very hectic, never relaxing. So if you want it fast I'd say go but if you want to enjoy the experience find somewhere else.

name: Pam Williams
text: Love my nails since I started going here

name: Angela Jones

name: Catherine Wurtz
text:
I had a vacation planned for Jamaica and wanted my toes to look great. I asked for a pedi and then acrylic for my toes. When I was getting my pedi they told me that the acrylics we're going to be 18.00, my friend and I both heard it. I went to check out and they said they total was 18.00, my friend and I thought it was a little strange that it was all only 18.00 but ok. Come to find out they were saying 80.00!!!!

I explained to them we both heard 18.00 multiple times and nowhere did it state that it was 80.00, on the board and in the brochure it said acrylics were 25.00 it was never specific to just fingernails.They refused to give on the price in any way!
Ridiculous price and VERY unhappy customer.

text: This place is amazing! The people who work here are genuine and do an amazing job at whatever you ask of them. I always go to Megan Rizen and she is amazing at whatever you need from an eyebrow wax to hair color. EVERYONE NEEDS TO COME HERE FOR THERE NEEDS!!!

Than there is Kristine who rocks, she’s amazing, Maggie who’s experience you can’t multiply and Megan who’s the youngest stylist and between Maggie and Megan you will he saved! Excellent prices! Affordable!!!

name: Alexandra Griffin
text: Misook is amazing! She always does the best work on my hair. I am SO happy she's back and can't wait for my appoitment with her! Seriously, if you are looking to change stylists or salons, book here with Misook ASAP!

text: Megan did a great job on my color. Great atmosphere and service

name: Lauren Nethery
text: Maggie is the freaking best. I look like a model every time she touches me!

name: Alison Kupec
text: I discovered this salon, and my stylist Maggie about a year ago, and have never thought about going anywhere else since. I have very short hair (pixie cut), and it is extremely hard to find a stylist who can consistently cut it well with quality, at a low price. Maggie is very insistent each time, that if I am not satisfied, to just let her know and I can come in again for an adjustment, making me feel like she truly cares that I’m satisfied. The Shampoo portion of session is my favorite part! It’s like getting the greatest head massage ever!

name: Carole Albyn
text: Maggie cut my hair and styled it. Super happy, super cute cut.

name: Lea Roth
text: Love this place! Wouldn't go anywhere else to get my hair cut, toned and my lip waxed. Megan does a fantastic job! Definitely would recommend!

text: *(My rate/review is based on service/friendliness/& Child's Haircut)* Have been carrying my 9 year old son here since he was 4 and though the occasional not wonderful but still good haircut (mainly due to his uncooperative & sometimes untamable cowlick) along with the friendly staff I have always felt to be great with children I actually give them 4.5 stars if you're looking for a great place to take a young child/boy or I wouldn't still be taking my soon there. In fact I just took my son yesterday and the service as well as his haircut receives 5 stars and I'm only sorry I don't remember her name to recommend her.

name: Kevin Wilbanks
text: Less than 1 star, got to this place at 5:40pm for a hair cut. I was greeted by someone saying "were closed babe" clearly marked closing time of 6pm on the door. It would have taken less than 10 minutes to cut my hair.

It’s Thursday 6:45pm, the sign says 8pm close. There are three girls in there with zero customers and she says sorry not taking any more customers tonight. It’s not like a walked in at ten til.
I go out of my way to go here. To bad never will go back with lazy workers just sitting there gabbing away.

text: Wait time was reasonable and my husband hair cut was good. A little expensive for a man's 10 minute cut.
