name: Kay Jones
text: You’re going to love this place. My experiences are always great. Dr. Hartman is talented, funny and personable. Highly recommend.

name: Dani Spearman
text: Five star experience from beginning to end. Great doctors and great staff.

name: Jessie Langham
text: I’ve seen all of the doctors at Skin Wellness and they all treat me and my family. I don’t know how they run such an efficient yet busy practice while still delivering compassionate, thorough care, but they somehow do every visit.  Their bedside manner is second to none and they offer only the latest and best treatments.

name: Carol Misshra
text: Dr. Hartman and staff create a caring, kind, competent environment that put me completely at ease. I know every time that he has my best interest at heart and will give me the best care for my skin.

name: Yolanda Wilson
text: Awesome with me from front desk to the nurses and Dr Yonuz is exceptional and strives to meet all od your skin needs

name: Ann Porter
text: Love this office and the staff. I feel so confident in my skin now.

name: kenny sams
text: The staff was friendly but Dr. Hartman was rude.  Village dermatology is way better.

resp.text: And of course there is no Kenny Sams in our system.

name: D M
text: Dr. Hartman, his team and the products and services he offers, gets 5 stars from me. I was referred to this practice via a friend who was having issues with pigmentation and after seeing the results he experienced I scheduled an appointment. I am mainly concerned about wholistic skin health and anti-aging. I am quite astounded by the change I have seen. I am a patient for life.

name: Meredith Massey
text: Absolutely the best experience every single time! From the time you walk in the door, your are greeted by the most accommodating and welcoming staff, which continues until you leave. Great responsiveness, professional atmosphere, and hands down the best! My husband and I have been patients for several years and have also taken both of my children for appointments, and we have all had great customer service from the beginning. Definitely gets a high recommendation from our whole family!

resp.text: Thank you, Meredith!

name: Yasmine Dabgotra
text: I've had nothing but a fabulous experience with Dr. Hartman and his staff. He is beyond responsive, professional and an absolute expert in his field. If you're looking for the best dermatology experience in the Chelsea area, look no further than Skin Wellness.

name: Nadeira Rickford
text: Extremely knowledgeable, caring staff. Very honest in their recommendations.  Dr. Hartman knows how to get results!

name: Ola L
text:
Very good patient/customer service.  It is difficult to get into a dermatologist, but they try as much as they can to help.
I would send my whole family there, they are very trustworthy and knowledgeable.

name: Kim Gann
text: Love Skin Wellness and the fact I have two locations near by. All of the staff is so friendly here and Dr. Hartman is the BEST in town. This office is ran with excellence and it shows!

resp.text: Thank you, Kim!

name: Pj Hester
text: Excellent service

name: Courtney Johnson
text: Brittany Rigsby CRNP & staff were super friendly, helpful, and very knowledgeable. Best dermatology visit I've had & highly recommend!!

name: Anomor Yasdnil
text: Black owned business with the best Doctors and nurse practitioners. Very organized with multiple locations, with extremely friendly and helpful staff. Their locations are extremely clean and have such pleasant environments. They always give back to the community, and often host special events for their clients or host fundraisers as well. Very thorough and knowledgeable, usually treating/curing quickly, without repeated visits (unlike most Dr offices these days). Our family is very satisfied and will continue to recommend their services.

name: Adriane Andrews
text:
This staff literally wrote a false review using my name. I wonder how many others there are. Wow, I’m so appalled. I have received the best treatment ever from Dr. Youhn, but Dr. Hartman only cares about money not his patients. I tried very hard to keep a positive relationship with this practice, but they refused to uphold excellent customer service.

Best

resp.text: We care about our patients. Not money. But when people receive treatments and leave without paying, yes we try to collect payment and call the police.

name: Macamillion528hz Stinson
text: I've been to a number of dermatologists over my lifetime, but Dr. Hartman is hands down the best of the best. He is extremely thorough and spends time addressing all my concerns. His staff is knowledgeable, accommodating and efficient. He is a professional in every sense of the word and I would recommend him to anyone looking for dermatological services.

name: J Ebbert
text: Amazing experience. I was in and out of the office in 20 minutes!  It's usually near impossible to get a dermatologist appointment that's within a month of when you're calling (especially to an office you've never been to) but I called Monday and they got me in on Tuesday! Dr. Youhn and Christa were amazing. She was so friendly and made the whole experience enjoyable and painless! She has resorted so much more confidence in myself from getting rid of a beauty mark I had ever since I was a kid. I highly recommend this place!!!

name: Larry Roberts (Pastor)
text: Dr. Curl and others have always been very good to me. Love them all.

name: Darla Watson
text: The girls in the office and all of the doctors and nurse practitioners have always been super sweet and kind to us whenever we visit. I’m so happy to have these services in Chelsea. They even provide laser options and spa procedures. The best!

name: Lindsay Hamner
text: I had a great experience here. The staff is incredibly friendly, the facility is stylish and still welcoming, and Dr. Youhn is a wonderful doctor. She's very knowledgeable​ and addressed my concerns quickly. She even found a few things I missed that needed to be addressed. I would highly recommend her and the Skin Wellness Center for anyone looking for a dermatologist in the area.

name: Victoria Bailey
text: Outstanding service and staff. I felt that my needs and concerns were heard. I will definitely be returning

name: Cindy Merriwether
text: Dr Hartman explains exactly what is wrong and how we are going to treat it. I sincerely trust him, his medical knowledge and his judgment. The entire staff is friendly and makes you feel at ease even through some not-so-easy time.

name: Nikasha Thomas
text: Dr. Corey Hartman and his staff provides great professional service. Autism sensory friendly. Thank you for making my son comfortable and providing excellent care of his skincare needs 😊.

name: Sheila Jackson
text: Skin Wellness has exceeded my expectations.  No longer do I have to leave Chelsea for dermatology care only to be overcharged and belittled at other places.  Everyone here from the receptionist to the doctors are friendly, kind and really do care about me and my skin.  The new office is beautiful and impeccably clean.  I have been a patient at the Homewood office, but now I don't have to fight the traffic to get the best care in the Birmingham area.  I love this place and will continue to spread the word in Chelsea and beyond.

name: Nazaren “N Mindi” Mindingall
text: I’m always impressed with the efficiency and professionalism of the staff and the medical care I receive from Dr. Hartman. It’s second to none. I will continue to refer all of my friends and family.

name: Elizabeth Golden
text: Always excellent. I’m proud to be a patient.

name: L M
text: I took my daughter here for acne & the dr's wouldn't even consider topical treatments they only would do ACCUTANE which has alot of side effects & should be a last resort instead of the only way to treat mild acne. They also prescribed antibiotics & when I asked to get the prescription they said they send all prescriptions to Texas & have tgem shipped to the patient?! Its been 6 mo & still havent seen tge antibiotics from Texas. Never would I recommend skin wellness center to anyone

name: Haley Isbell
text: The entire staff’s professional and the excellent care I received will be the reason I go back as well as refer anyone looking for a dermatologist in Birmingham area. Everyone in my family has seen a doctor at Skin Wellness and we are thankful for their care.

name: Lori Yonfa
text: Dr Hartman & Dr Yang are the best ! They're both are terrific Doctors.

resp.text: We love you back, Lori!!

name: Alicia Kenerley
text: Whoever answered the phone had ZERO services that they offer, like she just doesn't care at all about her job nor me a potential cash cow of a customer. So, never mind.

resp.text: I’d like the record to show that this review was written at 2:42 in the morning by a person who has never visited our office. Also, in my 16 year experience, someone who was serious about skin care and procedures would not mind paying the $100 consultation fee to come into the office to discuss these things like an adult.

name: Brannigan Keller
text:
Edited from a 1 star to a 5 star

My 2 year old child was a new patient and one of his siblings got sick the day of the appointment. I called to try to reschedule and was informed that I would be charged a no show fee. I do not think they could have made me pay the $50 no show fee as I had never been to this business before and more importantly was not aware of this ridiculous amount but called my spouse to make arrangements to go.  Needless to say they lost mine and my families business, I would not recommend them to anyone as my experience is not how to treat customers.

I’ve changed my negative review to a positive one after receiving a phone call from the owner of this practice.  It’s nice that he took the time to call and listen to my concerns while making attempts to set things right. I understand why these “no show” policies have to be in place as I work in the healthcare field as well.  After talking to the owner I would recommend this business.

resp.text: Ms. Keller, Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We apologize that this was your experience. Charging for missed appointments due to illness is not and has never been our policy. Again, we apologize.

name: Doug Merkel
text: Always nice. Front desk back. We do not wait long to be seen. Good location for us.

name: Trina Janay
text: Saw Dr. Rayna Dyck(she was recommended by some people i know personally). & she was horrible. She first off camebin very dry which is a horrible first impression and my attitude immediately was based off of hers and by her attitude being so dry (seemed like she really didn’t want to be at work) it made me not believe anything she said or that she didn’t care to help ...although everything she said might have been true. Her staff though is very sweet. I didn’t get the medication she thought MIGHT help b/c it was pointless to purchase out of pocket if it MIGHT help. And the two reasons she said i might have skin discoloration was definitely not my case. I’m big on reviews & she had a few reviews on her dry attitude but i gave her the benefit of the doubt because i had people who recommended her..obviously b/c she helped their condition & not off her attitude. She was so awkward & dry. Def. appreciate Dr. Hartman for giving me a call about my visit and hopefully i dont have to pay another co-pay when i fu with him b/c today i def. paid a co-pay for no reason at all. and the stars are for the staff and him calling me back def. not for Dr. Dyck.

name: Gillian McCown
text:
Dr. Youhn had the nerve and audacity to tell me that I should wean my son. Last I checked, breastfeeding is outside her scope of practice and she has no business giving professional advice about childcare or breastfeeding to a patient. It is unethical to give advice or direction on any topic professionally outside one’s scope. Breastfeeding and the health and wellness of my son most definitely are.

Updated because they decided to be unprofessional with their response here and on Facebook.

These comments started when I was asked if he was my only one and if I was thinking about having more yet and I said I'm still not sleeping so no. She kept saying should really talk to his ped because he doesn't need to be nursing all night long. At his size he doesn't need to eat at night and he's probably just doing it out of comfort. I didn't ask for sleep advice.
I mean I could understand her saying the nursing could be irritating my issue and that weaning might be something to consider.
But talking about how my son doesn't need to nurse anymore and I should really just talk to his pediatrician about weaning him is way beyond her scope and none of her damn business!
His pediatrician has no problem with it and nursing till 2 is recommended by the WHO.

name: Gina Delbianco
text: The Chelsea office is aweful. I've been taking my daughter's here for skin care for a long time now...mostly because we live in Chelsea and it's convenient. I've decided I've had enough of their extremely snooty, unfriendly staff. We had been seeing Dr. Murphy in this office for years and then one day she just  magically dissapears and is replaced by a different dermatologist with no explanation. Nothing!  Can't stand this office!!  We wiill be moving on to a new dermatologist and hopefully a smiling, friendly and much more upbeat atmosphere!   Alert people! Five minutes after posting this review My phone rings and this man states is name is Dr. Hartman ..and demands to know my reasonings for posting this review! This is just too unreal for me! Skin wellness of Chelsea ...you are sketchy!!!!!!  Ok so now I'm getting harrassing messages from two different area codes regarding this review. I guess Skin wellness pays some crappy people to harrass people that give bad reviews in hopes they will erase it. Not going to happen. You're Chelsea office sucks!....Excuse me! Whoever you are..her name was Brittany and she treated my children's skin problems for years. And please . ..stop texting your profane messsges to my phone!

resp.text: We pride ourselves on being friendly and helpful. We have never employed a doctor named Murphy. Good luck achieving your skin care goals.

name: Sarah Holder
text: Fantastic staff and exceptional providers. The whole team goes above and beyond for their patients!

name: Lillian Byner
text: In response to Dr. Hartman's reply to my review, I appreciate your telephone call. However, as I communicated to you in our conversation last night which you neglected to include in your response, I have waited for a return call to my non-urgent issue way longer than 24-48 hours. My first follow-up appointment where the biopsy was taken was on June 13th, where I was told by a clinician that I would know the results before I left for vacation. I called for results initially 1 or 2 days before I left town June 23rd. I then called back on the 28th, where I was told once again that I would be called back before close of business, yet I was not. I was never informed by any of your staff that I spoke with (both clinical and non-clinical - I have spoken with both) of the 10-14 day timeframe for biopsy results. In speaking with you last night is the first I have heard of the 10-14 day waiting period for results and the results not being discussed until the scheduled follow-up visit. Perhaps some form of training refresher would be useful in ensuring that all of the staff, both clinical and non-clinical are relaying uniform information and setting the proper expectations to the patients. Once again, I appreciate your reaching out to me and I am sorry that I had a less than desirable experience.

name: Robert Cowart
text: Very good exacerbation

name: Kris Findlay
text: Great care and nice people!

name: April Cano
text: Attentive Staff and Doctors

name: Judy Pannell
text: Love the doctor and employees!

name: Desmond Allen
text: Professional staff that has been spot-on with diagnosis

resp.text: Thanks, Desmond! Glad you’re reaching your skin care goals.

name: Kimm Coady
text: Very nice.

name: Dee Shopper
text: Not sure need another visit

name: Tasha Duncan
text: Very friendly staff.

name: Duane Scarborough
text: Great staff!

name: Royce Karina
text: So I was on a 13 hour road trip going from Florida to Texas, and as one would do during their drive, I couldn’t help but notice my unsightly nails as they were directly in front of me as I steered the steering wheel. I decided that before I check in my hotel, I get my nails done 💅. I checked in and shortly after, I was appointed to Melissa. She treated me very well and listened to what I wanted :) and she did just that. She was very skilled in what she did and my nails look fabulous! I wanted a design on my nails and she asked another nail designer to draw the smiley face. Gel nails are pretty pricey but it was worth the experience and how my nails looked! There are some nail salons that I have been to where the nails are crooked and the polish is not evenly distributed. I am extremely pleased with the service and my nails! If I ever find myself in Mobile, this would be my go to!

name: Marianna Lyon
text: Very professional, clean, and awesome manicures and pedicures! They have great customer service and you can earn points to get discounts on services the more you come. They stay busy so it’s important to make an appointment but they always have a lot of times available. I recently had a gel pedicure and within a week the color changed (possibly from the sun) and they were more than happy to change the polish for free when I came back a few days later. It’s a little bit more expensive than other places but the customer service and experience is absolutely worth it!

name: Jenna Brown
text: Such a great place to get your nails done. The health rating is 100, and it is so gorgeous inside. The ladies that did our nails were very kind and treated us like royalty. Our manicures and pedicures were very strong.

name: Kaila Hart
text: I LOVE this place! I'm from Indiana on my way to Gulf Shores and needed my nails done. I googled a nail salon on my route and this one popped up. I called two weeks in advance and made an appointment for Mani/pedis and when I tell you this experience was WONDERFUL, I do mean fantastic. Top notch professionalism, kindness and even had a mimosa to pass the time. 100% recommend this place to anyone and everyone!

name: Tearsa Brown
text: I had the best experience here. The technicians are so meticulous, and I did not feel rushed in/out. Do yourself a favor, and make an appointment. Making an appointment ensures you don’t have to wait, and simply adds to the relaxation of your experience. I will most certainly be coming back. I have nothing but positive things to say.

name: kim debose
text: The atmosphere is the best! Amy Le is very sweet and the BEST at what she does!!!! She makes your eyebrows look AMAZING!!!

name: N H
text: This was an incredibly poor experience with customer service.  I stopped in on a very slow Wednesday night as an out-of-towner, returning to New York the next morning.  There was an hour before closing and the salon was mostly empty.  I showed the girl my unpolished/natural nails (aka minimum prep required) and asked about a manicure.  She smirked at me and said they wouldn't see anyone else that evening, despite the sign on the door saying there was still an hour remaining and walk-ins were welcome.  I asked again, explaining that I was going to be flying out the next morning and she just smirked again and said they wouldn't see me and I could leave.  As I left, I noticed that they turned the 'Open' sign off.  I cannot believe this.  Hours posted exist for a reason, and this kind of poor experience in New York would shut a salon down very quickly.  I guess Alabama doesn't have enough high-quality competition, and can support this kind of nonsense from customer-supported dollars.

resp.text:
Hello, Ms. N H. Unfortunately, you came in after 6:30pm asking for double services. Our receptionist told you that all our nail technicians were already servicing the other customers and would not have gotten to you in time. Every night, we turn off our "open" at 6:30pm and you walked in after we had already turned it off. We try our best to take in everyone who walks in, especially if they come in "an hour" before we close.
I am sorry you feel that way and if you decide to give us another chance, please feel free and call to make appointment with us, to secure your spot on the book with us. We do prefer appointments because it gives us the crowd control and social distance between the customers. Thank You.

name: Johnathan Dennis
text: My first time and I can say I'd do it again! Very relaxing and professional! 👍🏽

name: Karmel Karma
text: I’ve recommended this place to several people.  They list their hours till 7pm.  But DO NOT go there after 5:30 pm.  This is the second time that they rejected customers between 5:30 and 6:15 when they weren’t even busy.  If you list your hours till 7, you plan on taking customers till 7.  Otherwise, put it in your ad that you don’t take customers after 5:30.  An out-of-town guest was dropped off there by a friend going thst way and I was to pick her up at 7 after feeding and bathing her two year old.  They wouldn’t take her  because they said it was too late.  She arrived at 6:05.  She’s now walking the two miles back.   I would never recommend these yo-yos again!

resp.text:
Hello Ms. Karmel, I am so sorry you feel that way about our hours. Our hours are from 9am-7pm, our cut off time(to stop taking in walk-ins) is at 6:30pm(with one service). We take both walk ins and appointments, but appointments are prefer due to crowd control and social distancing with our COVID-19 precautions. We will and do accept walk ins if we have available nail techs to start on you right away or with a 10-15mins wait gap.

Your friend walk in when all of our technicians were already working on their clients and would not have finished on time to start on your friend, she would have waited over an hour. Every night, we turn off our "open" sign at 6:30pm and your friend came in after we had already turned it off. If you decide to give us another chance, we recommend you calling and making an appointment first to guarantee you a spot with our nail technicians. Thank you.

text: Very understaffed on a Saturday. We waited an hour and still had not been received services.

resp.text: Hi Chelsea, our apologies for your long waiting for to be serviced as we tried our best to get to all the customers as fast as we could. However we were very busy with our appointments and could not get to you in a timely manner. If i'm not mistaken, our receptionist did mentioned to you that it would be going to be a bit of a wait? Furthermore, we couldn't rushed through our client because that is not the ideal of our business. Yes, we were understaffed because 3 of our team members were off due to personal reasons. As for a new business, it does takes time to nurture and slowly build up the team to its solid ground. We would love to have a lot more staffs, however we can't just randomly hired anybody, especially with our personal services business. If you happen to give us another try, feel free to book an appointment so that your time and service will be reserved.  Again, sorry for your experienced.

text:
Had my hair cut here @ the Hartselle location. I showed the young lady a picture of the cut I wanted & even told her....
1. I have naturally curly hair so please don't cut it as short as hair that is straight, because curly hair "shrinks" up after drying.
2. I said I'm aware that you may not be able to make my hair look exactly like the lady's hair in the picture, but I would like for it to be as close to the picture as possible. Wasn't even close.
3. When the young lady was finished & I seen  my hair, needless to say I WAS NOT THE LEAST BIT HAPPY, NOT EVEN A BIT OF A MORSEL HAPPY. Paid & left with tears in my eyes.
4. THE RIGHT SIDE OF MY HEAD LOOKED AS THOUGH I HAD NO HAIR, OR BARELY ANY HAIR, BECAUSE THE YOUNG LADY CUT IT SO VERY, VERY SHORT AFTER ME ASKING..... PLEASE DON'T CUT MY HAIR REAL SHORT, BECAUSE IT'S CURLY AND CURLY HAIR "SHRINKS" OR MAYBE A BETTER  WORD TO USE IS "TIGHTENS" UP.
5. I had to ask for it to be cut while wet & not dry, then had to ask for it to be blow dried & styled after the messed up cut... all of which was included in the price I was paying.
I will not go back to SUPER CUTS. I wasted my time, money & tip I gave the young lady, even though I shouldn't have done either.

text: Worst experience I have ever had at an eyebrow place. I went in with very thick eyebrows that I had been growing for 5 years after over plucking when I was young. I told the girl, “please keep them thick, I am growing them out.” She proceeds to do one eyebrow and says check them. When I saw how my eyebrow looked I was in complete and utter shock. They were paper thin… even thinner than they were before growing them out. I told her she made them way too thin and she proceeded to gaslight me and deny she did anything wrong. In the end I ended up with paper thin “sperm” brows that were completely asymmetrical with one arched and the other straight. I couldn’t even drive home after this I just cried in my car. They don’t even have the decency to apologize at this place. If you value your looks and self esteem at all, RUN not walk away from this place.

Please do not trust these people to do your Brazilians please go to a professional waxing place where they know what they are doing. This was my first and last time at this place. STICK TO THREADING until you all learn what it means To really do Brazilians. It’s sad that I even have to commute 2 hours home just to get a professional wax. Do better.

You ought to be ashamed of yourself charging $40 for a Brazilian Wax and $15 for the underarm when you don't even have a lot of hair under your arm.  Come and get a class here in Atlanta and I am sure your business will go smoother and hopefully your business will have a longer life span.

When receiving service this is what it’s all about she has definitely gained a forever customer and friend I will highly recommend Cabana Wax & Maddie to my colleagues, family, and friends. She’s definitely sending me off right for my upcoming mommy makeover and might I add the receptionist was amazing and all smiles and the property was very clean 😊 But parking was crazy 🥴 but overall experience 10/10 y’all check out Maddie and tell her Jessica sent you’ll 🥰

name: Mary Busby
text:
I went for my first wax ever here.  I was nervous, which means I was extra chatty. But Kristen was amazing! She talked me through and made me feel wayyy more comfortable than I imagined I ever could be doing this and it was never awkward.

She used a mixture of soft and hard wax and went back to clean up any strays that were too short for the wax to grab.

I’ve had bikini waxes before and even that wasn’t as comfortable as this. I immediately scheduled my follow up appointment.

There was also literally no wait time and everything was super clean!

10/10 would recommend.
If you’re been wanting to get waxed but afraid or insure, don’t be! I was and now I’m sad I waited this long.

text:
I am very picky when it comes to my skin and the type of wax I use. I have been waxing for a very long time now and stopped shaving 2 years ago. My first time at Cabana Wax was for a bikini (never done it before). I was very anxious because of showing my parts. But let me tell you, if you're scared like me or insecure, honey you have no reason to fear. Bri did my wax and she was amazing. She made me feel super comfortable and had a conversation with me throughout the experience. I also had my period  that day (it came super early) and so they provided me with a tampon.
Since then I always go there to get my underarms, and happy trail done.
When I am ready to do a Brazilian I will surely go to them!

name: Amelia Hooper
text:
The studio itself is very clean and minimalist, the staff are friendly and professional, and I'm always in & out in less than 30 minutes. Services are punctual and scheduling is flexible.

I'm a repeat client of over a year, and I can't speak highly enough of the management. I've only ever had one negative experience, and Allison took it very seriously. She contacted me less than an hour after I left a private review, and she completely resolved the problem. If you bring any issue to their attention, they are happy to help fix it!

name: Mel Ponce
text: They are always so nice and definitely know what they are doing! I'm always 100% happy with my eyebrows whenever I go

name: Natalie Altman
text:
I tried this place because of all the great reviews I saw, however, I was disappointed. I gave it three stars because the place is clean and the people were friendly. Those were the only good things, though. The actual services I received (Brazilian and armpit wax) were done poorly. I still had patches(I could understand a couple strays, but not patches) of hair and I realized there was even wax still stuck to me when I got home. I was in and out in less than half an hour, which would have been great had the person actually done a good job. Seems that they were more interested in just getting it over with than doing quality work. They are the cheapest place around that I have seen and clearly, there’s a reason for that.

Edit: The owner of the business quickly messaged me with an apology and a refund. She was very kind and professional. Again, the facility was very clean and everyone was kind. Hopefully my experience was just a fluke.

name: Natasha Bodiford
text: Maddie was great. Overall experience was amazing.

name: Angela Barton
text: I am from Tampa, FL and went to a premier wax bar called Flirt. No shade to my girl back in Florida, but Kristin here at Cabana Wax is AHH-MAZING. She did my Brazilian and I feel bad for any hair that thought it stood a chance. This girl left me clean, from top to bottom. She wasn’t afraid to get in there and get any stragglers. They also use a mix of hard and soft wax which is 100% the way to go. (For those that don’t know hard wax can be used multiple times in the same area or used as a precursor for soft wax because it doesn’t adhere to skin) ANYWAYS. This girl is amazing, and the atmosphere was clean, spa-friendly, and quick. 10/10 would recommend to anyone. THANK YOU KRISTIN and see you in February :)

name: Jasmine Seiger
text: Very clean & professional. They did a wonderful job and the owner is incredibly sweet. 10/10 would recommend to anyone looking for a good waxing experience.

name: Tabitha Townsend
text: I went in for my very first Brazilian wax and Bri was awesome! She was very professional, fast and gentle. It was not as bad as I was expecting it to be. I will be back!

name: k bottoms
text: Kristen is a professional in every sense of the word! I hate that I waited so long to become a customer.

name: Eboni Finley
text: Cabana is a great place to come and get any service that you need. I was new to waxing and they made me feel super comfortable. I definitely recommended all of my friends. Candace was the amazing. Super nice.

name: McKenzie Hicks
text: This was my first Brazilian waxing experience. I booked an appointment online which was very user friendly and easy to follow. When I got there the greeter was very friendly and made me feel welcome and comfortable. Candice was who did my waxing appointment and I could not have been more pleased. She walked me through the whole process and we talked during the whole appointment. There was not a moment that I was uncomfortable or anxious about the waxing. She was bubbly and fun and really made the waxing experience wonderful. We all know that waxing is not pleasant, but she made it as enjoyable as possible to where I was able to finish the appointment with no problem. I highly recommend this spa and also Candice for your appointment. I cannot speak for the other employees, but if they are anywhere near as great as Candice, you are in spectacular hands. I will definitely be using their services again. (They also take Covid-19 precautions seriously which adds an extra level of safety and comfort to your appointment.)

name: Schinell Walker
text: I love it here!!! Place is clean and the Staff is friendly.I come here once a month for my Brazilian wax and Bri is AWESOME ❤️..... I do recommend this place!

name: Ashley Moore
text: Excellent and professional service by Candice! Very cheerful and upbeat feel from the moment you walk in and until you leave. I felt very comfortable and was in and out in less than a half hour. Highly recommend!!

name: Dierdra Grant
text: This is by far the best wax experience I’ve had. The service was exceptional and prompt. Candice was awesome! If you get the opportunity, I would definitely suggest requesting Candice! Cabana Wax will be my go to for all my waxing needs.

name: Azaria Malone
text: I loved Cabana Wax! My first time coming Bri made sure I was well taken care of! My second time was even easier! Nice clean establishment with a friendly staff. I recommend Bri for you wax needs!

name: Toni Clay
text: Very friendly atmosphere and staff. My technician made me feel comfortable and relaxed, I will definitely continue my appointments here!

name: Kaidean Savage
text: They were so welcoming & friendly!! This was my first wax experience and, I think her name is Kristine, did an AMAZING job of helping me feel reassured and relaxed. Would go again.

name: Shardae Tiaire
text: Loved them very professional worth every penny I actually  went 2months ago will be going back very soon I was curious but  don’t be afraid ☺️ relax and trust the process and what I did

name: Marquetta Johnson
text: I don’t even know where to begin! This place is so tranquil and relaxing, that it made me leave all of my nerves at the front door. Also, this is my first time having the Brazilian wax. The technician ( whom was 24 weeks pregnant) was amazing. She made me feel extremely comfortable and explained everything before she did it. I am now obsessed! Thank you ladies for being total ROCKSTARS!!! I highly recommend Cabana Wax!!

name: Rachel Cabot
text: I cannot say enough great things about Cabana Wax!!! The studio is extremely clean, smells great, and has a fun atmosphere. The prices are the lowest by far in town because they don't add in fluff but rather strive to get you in and out for routine waxing. The owners and staff could not be any nicer and care deeply about the services you receive. I have been going regularly for a year and do not have a single complaint or critique - they are just that great of a studio and do a phenomenal job! Huntsville is lucky to have Cabana Wax!!!!

name: Tasha Napieralski
text: It was my first time getting a wax and all of the staff was welcoming and made sure I was comfortable. I had gotten there about fifteen minutes early and they were able to get me in and out in very reasonable time. When it came time for the wax itself, the esthetician made sure I was well informed and prepared, and made conversation with me so I didn’t feel awkward. Overall, the staff was very caring and professional and were very meticulous about details. Definitely would go back.

name: Brooke Diaz
text: The staff were so nice and professional! This was my first time getting waxed so I was a little nervous, but Bri made me feel at ease and talked to me the whole time! It went by very fast and she gave me great tips for post-care!

name: Ashley Perry
text: One of the best wax experiences I’ve had and I’ve been getting this service for over 4 years. Very professional and clean. Also they were fast and made it a comfortable experience. I had Candace B. And she was awesome!

name: Taylor Ratz
text: I had a less than great first impression of the business but the owner reached out to me personally to apologize and correct the issue. She went above and beyond for me! I sincerely appreciate the care and concern of the owner and I will certainly go here for my next appointment! Thank you for taking care of your current and future clients!

name: Alyssia Monte
text: I had a great experience here! It was very clean and quick.

name: sydney anderson
text: My first time getting a wax in a while and Candice was super sweet and took her time. It was clean and smelled great in there. They were very on time, and she finished me pretty fast without missing a hair! I will be back, Thanks Cabana.

name: Shamya Simpson
text: I’m home from school & wasn’t able to go to my regular place (LA Bikini) so I tried Cabana- BEST choice ever!!! Literally everything was perfect! it smelled amazing, everything was clean, the ladies were super welcoming and nice & the girl who did my Brazilian (I think her name was Kristen) made me feel welcome in a new place and she was super easy to talk to! Highly recommend this place!! And the prices are reasonable! I pay more at L.A. Bikini, 10/10 recommend

name: J Jackson
text: It was my first time there and it was amazing. From the moment I waked in, it was a clean building and the aroma smelled great. I did not have a long wait before going back and Kristin is amazing. She makes waxing more than tolerable. I come from miles away for this service and I already have my next booking set! The value is great as well as some people definitely overcharge, theirs is reasonable. Great job, Cabana Wax!

name: Nicole Robinson
text: I moved from GA and could no longer travel to get my wax services .. I was very nervous coming to a new place but Candice P. Was very professional and her energy made me very comfortable. I will definitely be returning!!

name: Anjelica Baker
text: I’ve gotten sugared before and it was horrible. This was my first Brazilian WAX and it was so amazing. I had Kandace and she made the process so enjoyable. It was so close to painless. She was sweet and over all it was an awesome experience. They definitely have a regular now.

name: Amanda Morgan
text: Always such a wonderful Experience. So glad to have found a place like this that I feel comfortable going to. You are in and out in no time. I’ve had tons of different waxes from here and all have been pretty painless and relaxing. I choose Bri every time And she never disappoints.

name: kaneshia b (neshSOlovely)
text: The staff was very professional and made me feel comfortable the entire time I was there. It was my first time getting waxed but I enjoyed it and will be making another appointment soon. Highly recommend.

name: Mandy Bozzell
text: Amber was amazing! This was my first wax and she made it a wonderful experience. Will definitely be making regular appointments

name: Tomeshia Cole
text: The best and fastest experience I’ve ever had. Very welcoming and organized. Bri was amazing! My Brazilian was completed in 12 mins! Worth every penny!!!

name: Breanna Anderson
text: First time here since moving to the Huntsville area from VA and this was by far the BEST waxing experience I have ever had all thanks to my girl Kristen. She made me feel completely comfortable and relaxed it didn't even feel like i just met her.She is definitely my new go to person because I will be back. The place was very clean with relaxing vibe the receptionist was great as well very friendly!

name: Nicole Daly
text: I am from out of town and needed a place locally while visiting family to get my wax. Cabana Wax staff were so welcoming before, during, and after my service and made me feel so comfortable. Amber was amazing!!! What a wonderful experience! Thank you Cabana, I will be back :)

name: Contessa Hudson
text: Great experience. No wait time, able to go on my lunch hour. Bri did a wonderful job on my Brazilian wax.

name: Tammie Adams-Fletcher
text: It wasn’t as painful as I’ve experienced before. Neither, was I uncomfortable during the process and it only took her like 45min., if that. Amazing atmosphere & service! Also, staff is very nice and welcoming!

name: Shametrice Holden
text: Omg they are amazing. Its a calm environment and if it’s your first time they will walk you through every step of the process. I have no complaints what so ever. I definitely will be returning.

name: LaQuena Tolliver
text: I absolutely LOVED my experience today. Today I had a full Brazilian and my nose done. Took no time but everything was done efficiently!!! You truly get a great experience from start to finish and Bri is hilarious!!!! This has got to be the least painful waxing experience I've ever had. Can't wait to block my next appointment.

name: Mitzi Dennis
text:
Cabana Wax Studio is the BEST place I have ever used for my routine grooming. Today I was in for two services and I was in and out of the studio within 13 minutes.
The Studio is so bright, clean and comfortable with professional ladies who work to make your experience the best it can be.
Thank you to Alison Dennis for her innovative mind and opening Cabana in Huntsville.  I can’t wait for Cabana Wax number 2 to open in Madison.

name: Ruth Spann
text: This was my first time getting waxed and Bri took care of me! Everyone was super nice and very professional. I was nervous that it would take a long time, but I was in and out in about 20 minutes. I would definitely recommend if it’s your first time

name: Diana Romine
text: This place is so beautiful and Candice was awesome. She did a great job and was very sweet. I will be coming back here from now on. I highly recommend.

name: Tatiana Lucas
text: Best wax experience ever!!! Haven’t had a wax in a about a year and she made sure it was not a painful experience and got every hair! Lol! Definitely recommend!!

name: Megan Bauer
text: This was my first ever wax experience, and now this is the only place I’ll ever go! I was honestly surprised at how fast and clean my entire appointment was, and I never once felt weird about it. You could tell the technician knew what she was doing and was confident in her ability. Plus the location is super cute and tidy!

name: Mattie Rafferty
text:
Bri was quick and honest about the pain and process. Was definitely a great experience and am definitely planning to go back!
Pretty much no wait time. The studio was adorable too.

name: Hayley Palmeter
text: This was my first time at Cabana Wax Twickenham and I had the best time! It was decorated so beautifully, and the entire staff was extremely friendly and professional!! Bri did such a great job! I will definitely be going back!!

name: Natalie Wicks
text: Candice just did my Brazilian and I was in and out within about 15 min. She did a fantastic job and was as painless as it could’ve possibly been. Definitely will return.

name: Jai Wright
text:
Excellent, quick, professional service. My go to place for unwanted hair removal.

Absolutely love Cabana Wax Twickenham!

name: sharrona williams
text: Love love love this place.

name: Casey Papp
text: They were very professional and clean. I went in for my first Brazilian wax and they walked me thru the entire process and made me feel very comfortable. I highly recommend them for all of your waxing needs.

name: Lauren Morrison
text: I had my eyebrows waxed by Kaitlyn and she did a phenomenal job! Very sweet, easy going, and professional. The store smells AMAZING + is so clean! Anyone would feel comfortable coming here.

name: Monique
text: I absolutely loved my experience here. I was a little concerned going from SugarBrig to hot waxing but the welcoming greeting and service given, explanation of what is being done and so on is comforting. I told Kristen that I am recommending them to everyone. She was PHENOMENAL!

name: Amy Haines
text: My first time getting a brazilian wax. Amber was amazing! I highly recommend this place for your first time getting waxed.

name: Hillliary Street
text: Always a great experience! The studio is clean and the staff and owner are great. This is hands down the best place to get waxed in Huntsville and they have have easy online scheduling and TWO locations!

name: Alice Anderson
text: Cabana is exactly the kind of experience I was looking for. No fluff (in prices or wait time), and the atmosphere was pleasant and clean. The technician did a great job on my eyebrows. She made my brow line so clean while keeping my thick shape. I’d highly recommend Cabana to anyone ❤️

name: Lisa Matsuyama
text: I love love love cabana wax!! Bri is amazing at what she does, and is HILARIOUS. I’m usually the biggest wuss ever when it comes to pain, but Bri makes it super fast and efficient! Cabana Wax is generally very efficient, and has a great atmosphere! Everyone is so kind and welcoming and I always know I’ll leave with a smile. Thanks guys! So happy to have found y’all

name: Zada
text: It was my first time getting a wax and the office was so clean and the staff is so professional. Katy B did an amazing job at taking my mind off of the pain and honestly she did it so quickly it wasn’t that bad. Will be getting my second wax soon.

name: Ariel Martin
text: This is the best waxing salon in Huntsville. The staff is friendly and professional. The salon itself is extremely clean. I’ll never go anywhere else!

I love everything about this wax studio. Quick, affordable, easy to book, and the owner and workers are great!

Before coming here, I waxed myself, but after visiting this place, I’ve chosen to get the Brazilian and my legs done solely at this studio because of they do a great job for an even better price!

name: Shannon Cruz
text: I haven’t been waxing In years since naturally I was very nervous. Kristin made it comfortable and easy for me and talked to me whenever I got nervous. The facility is clean, employees are friendly and it was an overall great experience. I will definitely be returning when it’s time!

name: Mic Green
text: Super nice and friendly staff.  Usually a hard wax kind of girl but the soft wax worked and Bri was amazing

name: Suzanne Ray
text: Best eyebrow wax from a locally owned & operated store.

text: I had my very first Brazilian at Cabana and it was so easy. I was so scared and timid but being able to schedule my appointment online and do things on my time made it great. When I got there the receptionist was so sweet and friendly. Needless to say Cabana is my go to wax studio now- love them!

name: Ladeadra Young
text: It was my first time and I was bery pleased. My tech was very informative and polite. She talked me through the whole process🤘❤ definently going again

name: Chanté P
text: I loved loved loved Cabana. I highly recommend them to anyone. AMBER is AMAZING. Was nervous my 2nd time in a long time and she made me feel very comfortable. WILL DEFINITELY BE BACK!! ❤️

text: I really love going to Cabana Wax. I've had sessions with every technician there and they are just so incredibly nice and have a great sense of humor. They're exactly the kind of people you want when you're having a Brazillian wax done, because you don't want grumpy people down there. I also have my eyebrows and underarms waxed. If you haven't tried the underarm wax, give it a shot.. They're baby butt smooth for about 10 days. I love it!

name: Peggy Masters
text: Every time I go to Cabana I am so pleased with the customer service and efficiency of their staff. I love that I can go in for an appointment and still have time to grab a quick bite to eat on my lunch break. The easiness of the online booking system makes it SO easy to schedule appointments that work for my schedule. I’ll continue to be a regular here for sure!

name: Laura Simmons
text: I had my first Brazilian wax at cabana with Bri and she was great! She had me in and out so fast and she walked me through everything and kept talking to me through the process so I wouldn’t think about what actually was going on. The place was very clean and the lady at the front desk was so nice. I have already made my next appointment and would highly recommend cabana wax!

name: Ashley Burns
text: Came in for my first time at 35 weeks pregnant. Very clean and professional !! Kristin made the experience quick easy and not awkward at all!! I will definitely be back!! Prices are great as well!

name: Mileska Van Scoyoc
text:
Absolutely love Cabana Wax! I have been going to them for a few months now and still love them. They have provide great customer service while keeping a competitive price range.

Highly recommend to anybody!

name: Hayley Wineberg
text: I’ve been going to Cabana for about a year now and I’ve never had a bad experience! I couldn’t make any open appointments for a wax so I called and Bri was able to squeeze me in- she is the best! I love that everyone is so nice and I’m always in and out in under 15 minutes. Highly recommend!

name: Riley Doyle
text: Cabana is awesome! It is affordable (most affordable place I’ve found in Huntsville). The environment is welcoming, relaxing, and all of the staff is so kind. I would trust any of them for a waxing, but recently went to Kristen and she was AWESOME! She knows her stuff, and her bed side manner is great! I highly highly recommend!

text:
Highly recommend Cabana Wax.
Efficient, courteous and professional. They get the job done right the first time, and in a timely manner. Their location and pricing are also from the best in town. Oh and they’re fairly quick!
Don’t be hesitant, and don’t worry if you aren’t regular to waxing. That’s exactly their field, and they will make your experience right and comfortable.
Best of success Cabana!

name: Yutiv Fuqua
text: I love Cabana Wax. This was my first Brazilian wax experience and of course I was very nervous. Kristen was wonderful. She walked me through the process step by step. I had an amazing and surprisingly relaxing experience. I highly recommend Cabana Wax.

name: Kelly Nash
text: very friendly staff and good at getting you in and out which is great for someone with such a busy schedule like me! it smells amazing too which is a plus. though it’s efficient, they take their time to make sure you leave feeling beautiful!!

name: Sarah Anne
text: First place in Huntsville with reasonable prices and easy online scheduling. They are also friendly and do a quick job.

name: Tasha
text: Kirstin was legit! She made me feel very comfortable. She literally got every little hair up off me. Highly would recommend her! She also gave me more knowledge regarding exfoliating & etc. Definitely will be back!

name: BreeAnn Campbell
text: The facilities were great! Very clean and modern style. I felt comfortable. Bri did a great job! I was in before my scheduled time and out before I was supposed to check in. I was SUPER happy with that because everything was what I expected and quick!

name: Allison Mason
text: Cabana Wax is awesome! Staff is super nice and friendly! I was in and out of my appt really quick! Will definitely be going there as a regular! Just bummed I didn’t know about this place sooner! Also the booking online is amazing!

name: Chatty Cobie
text: Candice did my Brazilian wax! I’m 7 months pregnant. She made sure I was totally relaxed the entire service! It was little to no pain! I will be returning!

name: S A
text: I am a Cabana customer for life! What sets this place apart is their knowledge and experience. They use BOTH hard and soft wax and best of all, they know when and where to use either type! I have not seen any other aesthetician’s office with the experienced staff they have here, who all maintain the very clean and no-frills environment. I know what I’m here for and they get me in and out! Never thought I would say goodbye to European wax center, but here I am!!

name: Alexis Crockett
text:
Very nice and clean! Great job and good timing .
Great place to go for your first time.

name: Amberly Grissett
text: I Was in desperate need of an eyebrow wax and Kristen  took very very very good care of me! I'll definitely be back and I'll definitely use her again!

name: Jordan Wilbourn
text: I had a brow waxing by Bri and I cannot recommend her enough. She was quick and professional. I am very happy with how my eyebrows turned out. Bri even went out of her way to fit me in her schedule earlier than scheduled because I had something come up! So I will be going back!

name: Danielle Gardner
text: I’ve been going to Cabana for over a year now! They are amazing and I just love Kristen. She always does a thorough job. Quick, but thorough! I promise you won’t be disappointed.

name: Dani Sadczenko
text: My experience with Cabana Wax has been nothing short of excellent. The staff is very courteous and always makes sure I'm happy when I leave. The online booking is super convenient and parking/access is easy. The prices are very reasonable, especially when you factor in the level of service you're getting. I would highly recommend Cabana Wax to anyone!

name: Katie Bouldin Perez
text: Lovely peaceful studio that is always immaculately clean. Friendly knowledgeable staff. Easy to book appointments and great price point!

name: Danielle OGwin
text: I absolutely love Cabana wax! They are affordable and professional! I love that they get me in and out in a timely manor. No extra spa amenities, all business and that’s just was this busy working mom needs. If you have any questions they are always willing to help so don’t hesitate to reach out to them. Give them a try, I promise you won’t be disappointed.

name: Brittany Mack
text: I want to LOVE this place so bad. As for as the process, it's hands down the best experience I have gotten here in Huntsville. Staff is friendly, attentive, and professional. The studio is clean, welcoming, and in a good location. The service is pretty fast. Im usually out in 20 mins or less and it's less painful then other places I have been to. My only concern is that for me, the hair tends to grow back wayyy faster when I go here compared to other places I've gotten serviced at. There were noticeable hair stubs all over less than a week after my wax as if I had only shaved a few days before, so I kind of felt like I wasted $50 when I could have just shaved at home which is what I'll more than likely have to do in a week anyway because it's growing so fast. The same thing occurred after my first visit as well, but because the customer service is great and the place is clean and well put together, I returned anyway. I don't know if they use a different type of wax from other places or what. When I've visited other places (before and after going to cabana for the first time), I didn't notice hair stubs until at least 2.5-3 weeks after the wax. I'd still recommend the place to others. I'll probably try the other location out next time and see if I get the same results.

name: Sarah Long
text: What a cute, clean shop! So glad Huntsville has dedicated wax shop that made me feel comfortable and in good hands. Thanks Cabana! Will definitely be going back.

name: Yolanda Martinez
text: I’m in love with Cabana Wax. I like the fact that the waxing last longer than one from other places. They have affordable prices.  Their staff is very knowledgeable, professional, skilled and well trained.

name: Trinity Ridley
text: Had my first Brazilian wax with Amber. She understood it was my first time so she was very informative on what to do and how everything worked so that calmed my nerves and made it a great first experience. I would definitely recommend! I can’t wait to go back!

name: Reyna Arrasola
text: My first time getting a wax and Bri took good care of me! She was very fast and never made me feel awkward!

name: The Nail Society
text: It was awesome. I was trying them out because my original wax girl was booked. Seeing as  waxing is very intimate I’m very picky of whom I go to. This place was clean, bright, and airy and the staff was very friendly and sweet. I enjoyed my service and will def recommend them to all my friends and of course I’ll be back 😘😘😘!

name: Nadine Hansen
text: Had a great experience!  Staff was friendly and professional.  Felt completely at ease with the technician who was obviously quite experienced.  Will definitely make this my go to studio.

name: Elisabeth Key
text: I had such a great experience at Cabana Wax. I will definitely be going back!

name: Nicki Sorrow, LE
text: I went in for a Brazilian and couldn’t have been more pleased. I was in and out within a few minutes and my waxer was SO professional. The girl at the front desk was SUPER sweet. I will definitely be coming back!!!!

name: Kanesha JS, M.S. IT MNGT
text: First time receiving a Brazilian Wax since moving Madison. I must say I have found my my new waxing center. Definitely recommended! Clean and friendly staff. Very satisfied with the end result.

name: Shirley Pickett
text: Bri was extremely professional and punctual. It didn’t take very long and wasn’t what I would call painful. Very doable for first timers. So much better than dealing with razor burn during bathing suit time. Shirley

name: ANITA WEBSTER
text: I went in to get my very first wax with Bri, and initially I was very nervous but she made me feel very comfortable. She was ver professional, on time and clean. It was a great experience and I will only be waxing from now on.

name: Jackie Hopkins
text: Cabana Wax is awesome!  Fast, friendly, and effective services!  Highly recommended for all your waxing needs!!

name: Amber Hinton
text: Super friendly staff and clean facility. I wasn’t even in there for 15 minutes for a Brazilian wax. They are just as excellent as European Wax Center. This was the first place I came for a wax when I moved to Huntsville and they have yet to disappoint me.

name: Lynette Potter
text: I have been going to Cabana Wax for several months now and it is the perfect location for a "straight to the point" wax. I love that there is no muss and fuss about getting in and getting out. When I get waxed, I don't want to be there for a long time and with Cabana, it is simple, to the point and I'm in and out. The wax they use is very high quality and makes my skin feel so smooth. I did not think I'd ever be one to prefer waxing over shaving, but this place made me never want to shave again! I've gotten Brazilians, eyebrows and under arms done there. (Goodbye nail salon waxes) Next I'll be getting facials! The staff is incredibly personable and will remember your name when you walk in the door.

name: Jessica Stroud
text: Really great place for a wax! The ladies that work there are like old friends. My wax experience was quick and to the point, that’s exactly what I want I a wax. Amiright!? Bri did an excellent job. Also the place is clean and provides a nice sanctuary for all your waxing needs! Absolutely will be back!

name: laila Allen
text: My appointment started right on time. This was my first Brazilian Wax. Bri was very personable and talked me through every step of the process. She gave me specific instructions to follow after the process and set my expectations moving forward if I wanted to continue having the service. I am very pleased with the outcome and will definitely be back.

name: Tatiana Castellanos
text:
Two thumbs up! 😊

Cabana Wax is VERY clean and the ladies are so kind and knowledgeable. I highly recommend them.

I love Cabana Wax! 🌴

resp.text: Erin, I am so sorry this happened. I am the business owner, and I’m not sure how that happened, but I assure you We would never block someone trying to get information about our business (and patronize our business, which we use to support our family). Please call our studio at (256) 970-4300, and we will make it right and see to it that you get the excellent customer service you deserve. Thank you for your interest in Cabana!

name: null bul
text: The atmosphere was nothing like i expected, it has like a cold loft feel as opposed to a spa feel. The staff was nice but the non usage of gloves turned me off it’s just something im not used to. Also laying used wax strips near my face as opposed to the trash isnt exactly pleasant either but whatevs

resp.text: Hi, thank you for visiting our studio! We are not a spa; we’re a wax studio, and we do not advertise a spa environment :) most clients love our simple, no frills atmosphere and speedy service. It sounds like you had a facial waxing service. To be clear, our staff constantly sanitizes their hands between services (for their own protection and for that of our clients), and we have a 100 health rating from the Alabama Board of Cosmetology, which is on display in our reception area. Our technicians do not always use gloves during eyebrow wax services, because sometimes wax can get on the fingertip parts of a glove and get smudged onto parts of the brow line that are not meant to be waxed. In other words, in areas such as eyebrows where extra precision is needed to avoid removing too much hair, gloves can make the process more difficult. Gloves are always used during body waxing services. Thanks again for coming to try us out; it sounds like a traditional spa may be more your style!

name: Katherine Hau
text: To be honest, I was so excited for cabana to open, affordable Brazilians, convenient, and chic. I usually travel to atlanta for my Brazilians because I have been so satisfied with my visits to those waxing places. Because of my experience at cabana, I will continue to travel to Atlanta for my services. The rooms seemed unfinished with exposed ceilings and everything is stock white, which makes the time of service kind of nerve racking. The rooms are small and the beds are so rickety. I did not feel secure at all.. the structure of the studio was not designed well so when my aesthetician entered the room, my parts were facing the door... imagine someone walking by right when she opened the door... secondly, I get Brazilians about every two month.. I have never had a service where they used strips... do you know why strips aren’t used in a Brazilian? Because our skin is so sensitive, the strips are too abrasive for it. A few hours after my visit, my area broke out  in rashes and i got so irritated I had to see a doctor after because OTC cream did not help. I was rooting for cabana but because of this visit I will continue my well-worth-it commute to Atlanta.

text: This was my first Brazilian wax so I was nervous but Amber was so amazing and made the experience great. I will definitely be back!

name: Business Trans
text:
My first time coming here and I chose Bri for both me and my mom, firstly, she’s only been waxing for 5yrs, there were no gloves being used, didn’t even see her wash her hands, no wipes to wipe my face prior to waxing, i laid down on the table and she immediately began waxing, no skin analysis, no questions or conversation.

The door was open, no privacy, just a cart with hot wax, used wax globs, laying right next to the unused sticks to apply the wax

I only came here because my regular wax lady was out of town but i wont be coming back, this place is unsanitary but the receptionist was nice.

I wouldn’t recommend this place at all, I don’t believe any of these women are estheticians but whatevs.

Update: Someone from the establishment responded to my comment, obviously, very offended by MY OWN experience which no one is in control of nor will tell me to delete MY experience. You ladies need to take classes on professionalism because my comment wasn’t rude, simply MY experience. Take constructive criticism so that you can improve not to take it personally because your comment definitely doesn’t encourage me to revisit & I’m sure turns others away.

Also, it doesn’t matter what service I have, MY experience in comparison to my regular wax lady, who’s a licensed esthetician for 20yrs, to your staff of 5yrs, is a joke. You’re unsanitary & I stand behind MY experience.

resp.text: Thank you for trying out our studio. I want to address a few of your comments. First, she’s only been waxing for 5 years? That’s quite a while (and Bri is very experienced), so I’m not sure what you were expecting as far as years of experience. Second, there is no need for a formal “skin analysis” in the room; that’s why we have you fill out a form in reception where we ask, among other things, whether you have used retinol, Accutane, alpha hydroxy acids, etc. in the area(s) to be waxed and whether you’ve ever had a bad reaction to waxing. Even without a formal skin analysis as you call it, our technicians are analyzing your skin during the service and would immediately stop the service if there were any issues. Third, everyone who waxes at Cabana Wax has a current cosmetology or esthetics license, which is what the Alabama State Board of Cosmetology requires. The Board actually visited us a few weeks ago for our 2019 unannounced inspection (we got a 100), and licensure and cleanliness are the two main things they inspect. Your irresponsible comment about licensure insinuates that we are violating the law, which is slanderous, and I encourage you to remove it immediately. Finally, you had a chin wax; the technicians would never leave the treatment room door ajar for a Brazilian wax or any other intimate service. Thanks again for your business.

name: Kacy Hairell
text: A girlfriend and I went to Cabana Wax for a girls afternoon and they were so accommodating and sweet. Neither of us had been there before or had any services such as microdermabrasion or dermaplaning and they explained everything and were so patient and understanding!

name: Ashley McQueeney
text: I've been here a few times for several services. They are amazing and made me feel comfortable. Great at Brazilian waxes!

name: Adrian Collins
text: I had a great experience when I came to cabana wax. They were very nice and made sure I was well accommodated . Thank you guys !

name: Chandra W.
text: I will definitely be back here, they were quick, friendly, and the rooms were clean. I also liked how they used different waxes depending on the "area" since hair and skin thickness changes.

name: Jaeda Rochelle
text: Got my first Brazilian wax ever here and it was very quick and I didn’t feel the slightest bit uncomfortable like I expected to. Highly recommend

name: Jessica Hamilton
text: The girls at the front desk lack customer service skills, the person who done my wax was alright. However this has been the worst Brazilian that I’ve ever had in my life. I have never dealt with so many ingrown hairs and I am completely miserable from it. The most I’ve ever had from being waxed has been TWO total over the past 7 months, with this most recent wax I’ve literally (not even near joking) have had over 17. One of which I had to be placed on medication because it became abcessed.

resp.text: Jessica, we just called you to try to discuss the experience you have described in this review but were unable to reach you. I’m very sorry you have had ingrown hairs since your wax. We see you had an appointment in March but have not heard from you since then. We would have offered assistance with the ingrowns if we had known you were having a problem, but this is the first time we’re ever hearing about your experience, almost two months after the fact. We would sincerely love to help, but we cannot if we don’t know there’s a problem. Please call if there’s anything we can do to help you! We would love to do so. Thanks :)

name: liz Hurley
text: As good as a waxing can be, so quick and clean!

name: Dyisha Hudson
text: I highly recommend them!

name: Shayna Johnson
text: Will definitely be back! Friendly staff, good prices, professional services😍

name: Jonathan Mcintyre
text: Amazing service and the staff was friendly . I will definitely be using them in the future

name: anita anderson
text: It was super easy to schedule my wax.  I arrived a few minutes early and we got started right on time.  This was my first wax with Cabana wax but not my first Brazilian.  I was very comfortable and I dont necessarily like to talk during the event lol.  I think my tech picked up on that pretty quick and she didnt try to make small talk.  I will be back.

name: Daynna McGee
text: Amber R. Is amazing! This was my first time getting an Brazilian wax and she made me feel relaxed and with as little pain as possible!

name: Margaret Foster
text: Quick, convenient and a fabulous work! Plus their prices are unbeatable.

name: Nicole Stubbs
text: Great experience, first time waxing they were sweet and helpful! Awesome prices

name: Torey Lavish
text: Cabana Wax nailed every expectation I had. Amber did a wonderful job on my facial, explaining every step and what she was using and literally my face felt silky smooth all day. I got two compliments on my skin that day, and I literally never get compliments for my skin! Danielle did an amazing job on my brazalian. It was my first time ever getting one and I dont think I can ever go back to shaving. She explained all the different waxes and why she was doing what and kept convo so it wasn't awkward whatsoever. I couldn't recommend either of these ladies more! The lady up front is always so welcoming with a smile on her face and is friendly! I will be a regular customer for sure!

name: Elizabeth Streams
text:
I had the BEST experience at Cabana Wax and Highly recommend their services! I first discovered them when I had a microdermabrasion facial and it was amazing! From the friendly staff to the cute stylish decor to the relaxation that ensued, this place is just what Huntsville needed! I plan on becoming a regular and you should too!

Since then, I've been back for several other services, ranging from a brazilian, eyebrow wax, express facial, and skin consultation. They also have new hydrogelly masks that are AMAZING! Check them out... you won't be disappointed :)

name: Lizz Ford
text: Kristen was great!!! She got it done and got it done fast!!!!

name: priti chauhan
text: Good place, professional, i like it👍

name: Ke Cake
text: I love this place ! This staff is very warming and friendly the place is clean and spotless love the atmosphere it's in a great location. I received my first brilizan wax by Amber back in December and been coming here every since

name: Anne Wood
text: I was so excited when Cabana Wax opened up!! I live in 5 Points and the only places I knew of to get a Brazilian wax were pretty far away from me and all of them took over an hour, were crazy expensive, and to be honest just not worth it. Cabana is the perfect mix of quick, easy, affordable,  luxurious and comfortable. I know “luxurious” is not a word most would use to describe a Brazilian experience, let’s be real, that shiz is always gonna be unpleasant...but Amber and all the aestheticians have a totally laid back way of making you feel comfortable. I have also gotten dermaplaned there, had my eyebrows waxed, gotten a facial, etc and never been displeased with anything. Sure if you are expecting a lounge with spa water and a sauna and a 30 minute massage along with your services cabana might not be for you BUT if you are looking for a perfectly comfortable experience, that is quick and easy, with high-end products and services at a very reasonable price... Cabana is your shop! I’ll never go anywhere else 💚

name: Raelynn Messex
text: Kristen was amazing, will definitely be returning!

name: Colette Carnes Lattimore
text: Very professional, on time, clean! Great!!!!

name: Sharon Brazille

text: Nice environment, friendly staff, quick service!

name: Betsi Boutwell
text: These ladies are friendly, professional, and respectful of your time. I wouldn’t go anywhere else.

name: Mykel S.
text: I went to Bri and got the eyebrow and lip wax combo. She waxed my brows and lips to the point where I have scabs and bruises around both my eyebrows and lips. The pain is excruciating. I won’t be back

name: Kristen Torbic
text: I used Cabana for the first time a month ago and I was very pleased. I will defiantly be back!

name: Mackenzie Johnson

text: Very professional and courteous.

text:
Excellent service, fast, and affordable!!
~Kristen Jackson

text: Great place, very punctual

text: Very professional, clean, and affordable!

name: Denise Miller
text: Quick and easy

name: Jakeyah Williams
text: Awesome Place!!!
