name: YouTube Account
text: Had a great experience at Cabana Wax! Maddie was so sweet and fast!

name: Tory Wuycheck
text: I’ve been coming to Cabana Wax for a few months now and I love it! Kristen is the best!

name: Chichi Jumbo
text: I spoke to a recruiter, Ms. Cindi, and she was very knowledgeable and very professional! I am pleased with my experience!

name: Jessica Smith
text: I do not recommend if you’re looking for professionalism and communication. While the front desk attendant was apologetic, I still will not recommend nor return.

name: JD McGuire
text: They always do good here , the instructors are right there to help and are very prompt ... I've never left unsatisfied

name: Rachel Salters
text: While I’m not a student there yet I am hoping to be in the fall. Everyone I walk through the doors it just feels like home and the staff and student are so nice. I got my hair cut there one time and while it did take a little longer I was so happy with my results. What people need to understand is that they are student and they are trying their best, and as for comments made on Ms. Susan I think she is a lovely person, very sweet and very helpful. There was always a teacher walking around checking and I just can’t wait to be a part of the Paul Mitchell family.

name: samantha jones
text: I communicated to the student EXACTLY what i wanted. I wanted an overall color change and had multiple pictures as examples. She gave me a halo highlight that barely even made a difference in my color and charged me full price. They do not listen to the client and often times listen to the head instructor even though it wasnt what i had even asked for. Very disappointed

name: Elizabeth Stclare
text: Chelsea is amazing and certainly reflects the professionalism of the Paul Mitchell experience. So glad that I have had the opportunity to return especially in these restrictive pandemic times.

name: Dena
text: I always enjoy every experience I have had at Paul Mitchell! They are very professional and seem to stay on top of students. I wish I had time to go there more often. My last visit was great. I was trying something new with my hair color and wished I would of had time to go back during the grace period to have them go up higher with my color. Other than that everything was great. Do not go in when you are in a hurry. It is a school and they are learning so have to have patience. Thanks so much!

name: Lindsay Bogle Waits
text: I have been a faithful customer for 6 years, and I have been satisfied with my hair cut and highlight services. Unfortunately the past few times I have had highlights done, the learning leaders have not led the students well. Recently the student was unfamiliar with highlighting and caused the lightener to “bleed” causing an intense and distinctly different contrast to show up on the root and parted portion of hair. They tried to fix the problem by toning this portion. By toning the hair I no longer had highlights in this portion leaving the hair a reddish dark color on the root in contrast to the blond. They offered to provide additional highlights on another visit but I would still have to pay for the lightener. I was told $13. The next time I came within 7 days to have the lightener done to fix the toned area without highlights. It became apparent the learning leaders only add a small amount of lightener to each extra bowl needed to lighten so they can up charge $13 per bowl. I have noticed this in the past. This time I was charged for 3 bowls. The instructor said these extra bowls were not necessary, however the instructor allowed the student to use this amount. In addition to the bleeding mistake that occurred the previous time without proper supervision, I was disappointed by the poor customer service given by the instructors and poor business strategy taken by charging the customer for a mistake that was done under the lack of care by the learning leader. I have recommended this school in the past, but I will no longer do so. I am disappointed in the lack of desire to serve the customer well and the lack of instruction done by the instructors.

name: Ashley Linden
text:
I am so pleased with my first experience of Paul Mitchell. My stylist was Shelby, and she did a great job of listening to what I asked for. I was very pleased with how her instructor payed attention to her work and helped where needed and did an excellent job. I wish I had gotten her name.

I brought pictures and was very specific about wanting layers and they talked out ideas and were willing to give advice and do whatever I wanted. I never felt rushed (even though my hair was super long and it took an hour and a half) or like I was inconveniencing anyone even when I asked them to go back and put some more layers in.
Other salons had argued with me about layers in the past and seemed afraid to cut my long hair and I have left disappointed, but not here! Thank you all for a fun and relaxed environment with great prices too!

name: S s
text: Went for a haircut recently and had a very good experience. Robert (instructor) did my haircut and he is an excellent teacher. I was here couple of times in past too and never had any bad experience with students. Instructors are always taking care of each client. Thank you Paul Mitchel instructors for all the effort you guys put in to teaching the art to the students. It’s very important to know what you want to get done and explain it to your stylist. Cost is unbeatable. It’s gonna be a while for them to work on you, they are learning on you so help them. Show pictures so they can get a better understanding of what you want.

name: Amy Floyd
text: This was my first time, and it was an okay experience. It took a long time for a wash & cut (75 minutes), but that is to be expected as it is a teaching school. I ended up fixing my own hair once I got home because there were lots of uneven places. If you are broke & can't afford to go somewhere else, this is a good choice. You just may have to repair your hair a bit on your own afterwards.

resp.text: Hey there Amy! We appreciate your honest feedback and you're absolutely right-we are a school! Our students are all at different levels of skill based on several factors including, but not limited to, length of time they have been in the program and the specific areas in which they excel. You may not have known this, but we have a 100% guarantee and you can always let us address any issues you might have had with your service. Students work on guests because they need the hands-on experience which is part of their curriculum. Students aren't ready for the salon until they have completed their program, hours, and have taken both their written and state board exams. They are then ready to transition to an actual salon. We also have students who are in a program here we call Phase 2. These students must pass an interview and hands-on assessment in makeup, cutting, color and texture. These "master level" students are available upon request and you'll be getting a more advanced, driven student that is much further along in their program. However, these services do cost a bit more. All that being said, we have to remember that we are a school, first and foremost. We love being able to offer extremely low (much lower than an actual salon) prices for our guests because our students need the hands-on experience. We can all remember the first time we tried to accomplish something...sometimes it was great, but sometimes we also had a lot to learn from the experience. But with practice and patience, we got so much better than when we started and that's exactly how it is for our students. We hate that you weren't happy with your hair, but we do appreciate the time you gave our student in letting them perfect their craft.

name: Alyssa ellis
text: As a student, I’d like to personally say, in regards to all of our learning leaders they help us to the best of their ability and in regards to them caring, they care way more than most normal teachers or instructors and ALWAYS try to make sure the guest is happy, although sometimes it can be confusing on what is trying to be communicated - Our learning leaders are the best there are is assisting us in our journey.

name: jessalyn jones
text: TERRIBLE SCHOOL!!!!!! No one helps the students out. They have to many people on the floor at once it looks crazy. I went in for a cut and it took 2 and a half hours.. because “Susan” wouldn’t help the student. If I could give a zero star I would. AWFUL!

name: Kaitlyn Marlowe
text:
The first time I went my experience exceeded expectations.

I have been twice more it service has been terrible.

(1) I was told 2 hours and approximately $40 for a basic cut and color. SIX hours later I was still there and the bill was $110 because the student colored my hair in a way we had not discussed during the consultation.

(2) I had to bring my child with me to an appointment and was refused service.  Which is fine.  Inconvenient, but fine.  However, the attitude behind the refusal was quite rude.

name: DaShanee' Miles
text: Absolutely love this place! The people there make you feel like family. Raven did an excellent job flat ironing my natural hair.

name: Ashley T.
text: Went in with a perm in mind but they were really honest with me and said they couldn't due to the dyes in my hair but instead said they'd teach me how to curl my hair the way in I had in my reference pics if I wanted which was really sweet of them. I instead went for a hair cut which was great for the price and the job my stylist did was wonderful. Highly recommend.

name: Diane Harris
text:
I had been using the location in Madison, AL for several years, then moved back to the Montgomery area last year.  Birmingham is the closest location to me, so I tried a local cosmetology school.  They do not measure up to Paul Mitchell.  I decided to make the drive to Birmingham and was certainly not disappointed.

I received the service I  have come to expect from Paul Mitchell schools.  I was asked questions to determine my wants and needs and an instructor was checking in throughout to assure the work was being done to my satisfaction.  I have my next appointment scheduled and am bringing a couple of friends, as well.

resp.text: Ms. Harris we are so pleased to hear about your wonderful experience here and can’t wait to see you again for your next service!

name: Alyse Gilliam
text: Had a great time here! We went in to get my hair, makeup and manicure done for junior prom. Everyone was super friendly and easy to talk to. Even though I got there a few minutes late we had no wait time at all. Taylor was so sweet and helpful, talked to me about exactly what I wanted done and just made the whole thing stress free. I went with a black manicure, curly side updo and soft makeup with a red lip. Everything turned out perfect and stayed from my morning appointment to after prom! I am definitely going back and would advise anyone who has a special occasion coming up or just wants to treat themselves to check The School out! It is also very very reasonably priced :)

name: Kim Nguyen
text: Had a great first-time experience at Paul Mitchell The School Birmingham.   Hannah gave me a cut & style and fixed my poor attempt at a trim from a few days ago (I had completely butchered my bangs). Everyone here is very friendly and welcoming. I love my hair and my bangs now and will definitely be coming back!

name: Julie Hughes
text: My daughter, Katie, graduated from Paul Mitchell today. Thanks to the staff for their guidance and expertise.  The instructors, staff and owners taught her, not only how to be a hairstylist, but the business aspect of the profession. Now she has the foundation she needs to go out into the world. Without a doubt, she will be successful! Thank you!

resp.text: Julie thank you so much for the kind words! It was so wonderful having Katie enrolled at our school. She is such a kind and creative individual and we’re truly going to miss her. We wish her all the best in this next chapter of her life!

name: Tamara Morton
text: The receptionist and my beauty specialist were very professional. My pedicurist tried her very best to do a good job and she did. I was very pleased with the outcome. What a treat! Regarding your website, I would like to be able to see prices for all the services that you provide. I'd probably end up spending money on more procedures if I could see what options were available. Anyways, I just discovered you, I've had two excellent experiences and I'm very happy to be a new client. I'll certainly spread the word to my friends.

name: Jennifer R James
text: Great place if you’re willing to help others learn/allow them to practice on you. Love the staff & the students. I always leave happy.

name: Monika Camino
text: Students do not seem to know what they are doing. And they seem to not have a lot of help. The student sat and waited for a teacher to come by and help for over 15 minutes while I sat there and watched the black teacher mess around with the black students. So unfair... need better staff!

name: Nikita Monroe
text: I will never go back! Teachers are so rude. Small white lady with blonde hair made me feel so unwelcomed and treated the student as if she was dumb for not knowing what to do. Not yet fault this school doesn’t teach the students.

name: Nancy Ledbetter
text: Love going there! My sister's and I meet there once a month for girls day. The students are always eager to please and the instructors are very helpful and ready to jump in if necessary.

name: Anna-Marie Settine
text: I love to come here to get my haircut. They always do a great job, and all of the products make my hair feel and smell amazing. The students and leaders are all very nice, professional, and talented. They listen to exactly what you want and make sure you leave with beautiful hair!

name: Cathy Forrest
text: Loved my haircut today.  People are so nice. The owner came over and helped, very great teacher.  I highly recommend that you try it out!!

name: Holly Parker
text: I have been in the past and had good experiences but sadly I can no longer say that. I went a few weeks ago and they seemed really rushed and not as personal as in the past. The instructor didn’t check my hair when I was completely done. After about a week I noticed that my hair was uneven and a huge chunk was shorter. I called to see if they could fix it and was told it had to be within 7 days and I would have to pay for a new cut. I was unable to go in any sooner because it snowed and then I had to work the weekend at my job.  I would gladly have given them a chance to fix it but they haven’t taken any action towards making it right. I am saddened by the fact that they messed my hair up and won’t fix it for the integrity of their establishment. I left a message for the manager and have not gotten a response back. This happened about a month ago. In my book, that’s a sign of being unprofessional. I will not be going back here.I hope they can fix this and do better in the future!

name: shawn swartz
text: I love coming here. They give such individual attention, more than I've ever received in a private salon. My hair is extremely thick and quirky and they spend the time asking questions and learning my hair before ever starting. The instructors remember me and my hair every time I come in. I won't go anywhere else to get my hair done.

name: Brenna Terry
text: Professional and fun! I have gone in and asked for a variety of edgy, complicated styles- bob, pixies-  and have yet to be disappointed. Even if the student is still learning the ropes, the stylist who oversees them will make sure that they give you a great 'do. Sometimes you may have to wait a bit for the head stylist to approve, offer advice, etc. but the wait is worth it in the end. Please support PM and help these up-and-coming stylists start their careers!

name: Tamara Caffee vlogs
text: I got my hair dyed here amd i cant get over how good it looks i did natural colors and it looks great i recommend this place

name: Stephanie Pilgrim Moore
text: Very friendly and professional, the only downside was that it took about an an hour and forty five minutes for a shampoo cut and blow dry (which normally took less than an hour at other salons).  However, I was happy with the service and the results.  Have already booked my next appointment.

name: brenda Weaver
text: Tori R.  Dyed my hair and it turned out fabulous!   Not only did I get great results,  but expertise customer service!   Everyone was there to help her with the foiling of my hair, which took a long time.  But she did an excellent job and I am so pleased with the results.  I will recommend Paul Mitchell Academy to everyone I know.  Thank you so much Tori!

name: Megan Richey
text: Salon experience for a great price! Their color is amazing and I always get a great cut. Actually, I have had better cuts by the students here than stylists at most expensive salons. Give it a try.

name: Patsy Blakley
text: I lost my hairdresser, he retired so I decided to try the school. I was really impressed and pleased with my experience. I got my hair cut and it was great and I liked the products they used on my hair. It made it soft and took care of the frizz. I will go back.

name: Wynter Rudolph
text: I had a wonderful experience at Paul Mitchell.  The hairstylist were very friendly to me and I just love how my hair looks now. Robin Rudolph did an amazing job on my Eyebrow wax.  I love it!

name: Bonnie Ferguson
text: Adding this to my list of the WORST customer service in Birmingham. I didn't even get to step in the door because they CLOSED the school without letting anyone know! I drove all the way there in the RAIN for nothing! You need to let your customers know if their appointments are canceled! SO SO SO UNPROFESSIONAL. I don't even want to make another appointment if this is how they treat their customers. I wish I could give zero stars.

name: Astoria Riggans
text: Love it here

name: Azziza S
text:
My daughter, my mother and I all got great cuts. I've never had a color but I've decided to do it.

Sadly the student who had great talent graduated. The last time I went the student destroyed my hair, gave me scalp burns from a too strong bleach solution, and turned my blonde hair GREY.

Then the instructor absolutely refused to fix it. They were extremely rude and unprofessional. I will not be going back. Use the Aveda salon and school instead.

name: C Gilbert
text: Teairh is awesome. Done great with my hair and will go back to see her!

name: Carole Tull
text: I have been coming to the Paul MItchell School Birmingham for about five years, and I have never had a bad experience.  I love watching the new students become professionals, and I usually follow one student until he or she graduates.  I have made many friends, and I still hear from some of the people who did my cuts and color throughout the years.  Keep up the good work, Paul Mitchell students.

name: Allison Kerner
text:
I am very pleased with the hair trim I received!
Haley P. did it!  I will be back in a few months for another trim.  And thanks for allowing my hair to stay long...

name: Kat Henderson
text: I've gone three times now. They are very professional and definitely get the job done, I'm just disappointed in the time expectation. It took two hours my first time for hair bleach- I was going to get a cut but passed as I was on lunch and had spent too much time. They're not open Saturdays. 2nd time was cut bleach and toner, which was fine. Third time took almost 4 hours from the time I got there to the time they checked me out just to do root colour + toner. They put two hours on my chart. I'm not sure why the time it took doubled.

name: Nameless Faceless
text: Loved my highlights! Great prices and knowledgeable staff! Very professional.

name: Khrystal Fairchilds
text: I got my hair done there & love it.

name: Katharine Blackwell
text: I routinely get my hair cut at the Paul Mitchell School in Birmingham. They always do a great job, and I feel like I'm treated like a VIP client!

name: Catherine Glenn
text: I have always had an awesome experience here!  The stylists do a great job, and the price is right!

name: Shannen Wright
text: Been coming here 4-5 years had good experience and have seen many different girls only had one bad hair cut. But over all satisfied.

name: Taylor Lee
text: Worst service ever. Teachers are terrible. A student had no help she waited around for 15 minutes trying to get a teacher to help her. They need changes.

name: Mary Linda Smith
text:
Absolutely wonderful!!!
Great experience!!!   I've already made my next appointment!!!

name: Kylie Heitman
text: Really great experience!

name: K K
text: Proud graduate of 2015!!!

name: Rece Stewart
text: Love my haircut.

name: Kayla Garrison
text: I also offer hot towel services for men, straight razor shaves with hot lather, perms, multidimensional colour, colour corrections, children’s vibrant temporary color services, facial waxing, under arm waxing, and upper body waxing. Consultations are always free! I also travel for formal events.

name: Candy Prestage
text: This is a great, awesome, wonderful Beautician. She put color in my hair that lasted 6 months and still had color. She does a wonderful job on cutting and styling also. I don't believe I could ever find someone as kind and as professional as she is.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review!!! Enjoy $2 off your next haircut!

name: Billy Burbank
text: maddox  barbering and beauty is the best place get a perm and hair cut and straight razor shave from Kayla have a good hair cut.

resp.text: Thanks Maddox! I always love giving you a high and tight and taking your sides to the skin with a straight razor!

name: Kim Urban
text: Kayla is a wonderful colorist and stylist! 10/10 recommend!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the review!!

name: Jasmine Morgan
text: Love getting my hair cut here! Highly recommend!!

resp.text: ❤️we love when you visit us! Thanks for the review!

name: Michelle hamner
text: She's the best!!😍

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review! Remind us to give you $2 off your next haircut for leaving a review!

name: Jackson montgomery
text: Awesome

resp.text: Thanks for the review! Enjoy $2 off your next haircut!

name: Kristi Carroll
text: I've been going to Brazilian Wax Spa for almost a year now. We move often, so to be able to find an environment that is not only convenient but great in value has been fantastic! I've seen a few different wax specialists, and all but one have been extremely comforting. The front staff is pleasurable. My previous appointment the went above and beyond to give me some information on where I can find local events and restaurants.

name: Neema Kamau
text:
I was 7 minutes late to an appointment, 7 MINUTESS!!!! and the lady at the told me that since it was over 5 minutes, I could no longer be seen that day and would have to reschedule.

Absolutely ridiculous.

Not only did she say that I would have to reschedule but she implied that I should be thankful since other places in town charge more than $35 for Brazilian waxes. I've been here a few times before and I am really upset with the way customer service is going. I booked this appointment weeks in advance and typically people will call you before moving your appointment! Things happen all the time. I planned on going out of town and this was a HUGGGEEEE disappointment. Go where your money is valued, it definitely isn't here.

name: Leona Smith
text: Extremely rude to my mother who has mobility issues. You’ve lost a whole family of customers. We will not be supporting this business in the future. I hope you can get training in basic human compassion. Good luck.

name: Shelby Miles
text: Bri is bae! She definitely gets me right every appointment. I love my brazilians now. She is fast and gets everything off. She does not come to play, at all.

name: Ashley
text: Friendly and attentive staff. Reasonably priced!

name: Charity Kent
text: It's not weird, its fast, and the service is really nice. Definitely coming back

name: LaShanda Dickey
text: I have became a regular here, and have started bringing my daughter with me. Bri is the best. She is so sweet and knowledgeable about her job. Very compassionate about what she does! I love it here. Highly recommended!

name: Kattie
text: Just listen to the person thats doing the waxing and you will be fine. And it will be uncomfortable but worth it.

name: Sarah “TWIXER” Alsabah
text: So I’ve been a customer for a year now with Ashley.. and now that she’s gone I tried with another lady and she was new at it and did everything badly. Like I had to leave after two strips because I couldn’t handle her work…

name: Ashley Young
text: I love going to Brazilian Wax spa, they're always so nice & friendly and very professional

name: Nicole Watts
text: I love this location. I’ve been to the Vestavia location and after coming to this one, I’ve never been back. The Hoover location never disappoints. On top of that, their building score is 100. Clean environment & nice decor. On the other hand, I’m dropping in to brag on BRI! She is the best!!! Her personality is positive and welcoming. She provides fast, efficient service. Bri keeps you calm during the waxing process (she even has you laughing) and she makes sure to get all of the hairs lol.

name: Michal Crowder
text: COVID era instructions are clear, the place was clean, and the staff super friendly and helpful.

name: Holli Baker
text: Kaylene is 5+ stars every time! The front desk lady, however, gets zero. She was exceptionally rude on both the phone and in person. Get one of the Vestavia people to take her spot because I never want to interact with her again. If it wasn’t for Kaylene I wouldn’t come back.

name: Patrick Cook
text: My very first time here and first waxing in several years. I saw Briana (sp) on 8/29/19 and she was fantastic!  Very quick, efficient, and thorough!  I had a lot done with back, shoulders, chest, stomach & front/back male Brazilian. I’m enjoying the smoothness! There was never an awkward moment. Have my next appointment with her scheduled in October and look forward to it!  (also shout-out to the receptionist who was amazing, but don’t know her name right off) thank y’all and see y’all soon!

name: Youlanda French
text: Love the service. My technician was very professional. No issues afterwards and the price is very affordable.

name: Tony Kelly
text: Very private, professional, comfortable.  Scheduling the appointment was very quick and easy.  Everything was clean and crisp, from the seats in the office to the bathrooms.  I'll definitely be back, and I'd recommend to anyone else.

name: Samantha Phillips
text: I was able to get an appointment the next day when I needed it. Very professional and friendly, clean, and quick.  Will definitely use again and would recommend.

name: Sabrina Barnes
text:
Love this place.
First time getting a Brazilian wax and they made me feel comfortable even though I was nervous.
I since been back twice and once to the Vestavia location.

name: Autumn Daniel
text: Ashley was the absolute best!! She made it quick, thorough, and easy for my first time. She kept the conversation going and was very encouraging. Definitely will come back.

name: Angela Ayoub Shunnarah
text: I have Always had a good experience here, but I scheduled an appointment today and rushed from work to find out they weren’t there for my wax due to some licensing issue. I never received a phone call letting me know of this and tried calling several times and was on hold for 15 minutes with no answer. I was Offered no apology by the receptionist and her solution was for me to wait an hour or to reschedule. Very unprofessional.

name: K Mayes
text: I went in for my 1st Brazilian and was super nervous. Brianna assured me that I'd be fine and talked me through the procedure. She was honest,thorough, and kind. I will definitely return.

name: Taylor Amundsen
text: The staff is absolutely amazing. They are so quick and efficient, never have I had such a good experience at any wax spa. None can compare to Marci's standard and expertise, she holds her entire staff at the highest expectation, and they don't disappoint.  The quality and cleanliness of her spa is above and beyond, and never once have I felt un-welcomed or judged. Highly recommend any of Marci's staff, they are all excellently trained and brilliant at what they do.

resp.text: Thank you Taylor Amundsen. :)

name: Julia Lynch
text: Wonderful experience every time! They even help educate you on after-care.

name: Keeshia Pace
text: Carrie is the absolute best.  She's gentle, yet thorough.  And offers a delightful conversation during an awkward service.   I've been going to her for over a year and I plan to continue.  The Hoover location is a new store front so it's shiny and inviting.   It's very a clean and sanitary environment.  They offer a variety of waxes that include hard,  soft,  and sugar.  They also sale scrubs and other options to treat hair bumps.  Kris, the receptionist, is in the perfect role.  She greets you with a warm smile and hearty greeting.  Everything about this place makes you want to return.

name: Angela Davis
text: Very disappointed with the service. When I made an appointment, I asked for the latest available which was 6:40 pm. I got stuck in traffic and called 25 minutes prior to tell them I would be 5-10 minutes late.  When I arrived I was 10 minutes late, and they told me they could not do my appointment because they were closed. The store listed a closing at 7 pm. I was very disappointed with the customer service and how rude they were! I DO NOT RECOMMEND AT ALL.

name: Grace C.
text: One of the best waxing spas in the area! Professional staff! My wax lasted longer than usual too! Will definitely be back!

name: Farron Della
text:
This location is friendly, quick, hygienic, and does a fabulous job!

Didn’t realize how good I had it until traveling to the west coast and saw they charge $60+ for Brazilians out there!!

name: Ashley Black
text: Miranda is awesome! She is very detailed so you get your money's worth! I like the atmosphere of the Hoover location better than the Vestavia location. They do great work here!

name: Tessa Daniel
text: Always have had a good experience here. Now has a great receptionist. Super nice.

name: Dyale Harris
text: Service was awesome

name: Keshia Rodgers
text: First time waxing. Ashley made me feel very comfortable.  Will return!!

name: Miss Angie “Miss. Angie”
text: Best wax!

name: Kendra Sherrod
text: Miranda is an absolute angel! She made my first experience so comfortable. Very professional and kind! Can’t wait for my next appointment.

name: Trina Janay
text: Although the front desk lady was a little dry (granted everyone doesn’t have good days but i definitely noticed that)! I had a great experience with BRI doing my Brazilian wax!  It probably took us 15-20 mins but it felt like 10! Literally felt nothing! Not only was she good but she had a great personality! Definitely my spot now!!

name: Carol
text: Marci and her staff are the best!   I have been a customer since she opened and everyone of my experiences there has been positive.  The best in Alabama!

name: dwyatte hataway
text: Thay git the job done in a very reasonable amount of time

name: Tabietha Wilson
text: Went for my 1st Brazilian wax and was quite nervous about it but the staff was awesome and everything went so well that I booked another one in 4 weeks

name: Ashley Price
text: Marci is always great.

name: Kimberly B
text: Clean, professional and top-notch service; four years (started in Vestavia) and counting.

name: Kia B
text: The staff is awesome and always friendly. Would definitely recommend either of their locations.

name: Summer Austin Wells
text: Marci is the best of the best.  She is very knowledgeable and talented in waxing quickly and effectively.

name: jami elmore
text: I seen Carrie today, she was very fast and friendly. I will be back to see ms Carrie again! Receptionist was very friendly from the time I walked in till the time I left. I would recommend this location and business!!

resp.text: Thank you Jami Elmore. We appreciate your review. :)

text: Had a great experience...very clean. Technician made me feel very relaxed.

name: Michelle S
text: Super friendly staff. Very professional and honest. Great to answer questions. I'm so happy with my hair and my daughter's hair. I will definitely be back.

name: Joseph Madaio
text: Good, quick and efficient; and cost effective.  You HAVE to reserve ahead.  Located in Walmart, so you can shopping also.

name: Ms. Ray
text: This was the absolute worst customer service experience ever! We had an appointment for today (hair cut)..upon arriving, there were 3 people waiting at the front desk. The lady in the back NEVER came to the front to acknowledge those people or to see if any of them had an appointment. Instead she looked at us-ignored us as though she wanted us to go away. Well, we did just that. If you hate your job or have a problem with serving others, then why work in a customer service role? You should atlrast acknowledge clients and let them know you will be right with them momentarily. I guess this business is doing well during COVID-because she absolutely did not care about the clients or money that was lost by her arrogance and laziness. Worst!

name: Laurie Gist
text: Penny Ritter is a great hair stylist . Athens al location

name: Carlos Fletcher
text: I have gone to Walmart years ago when Chelsea was there! I needed a quick shampoo and conditioner, (that is all) I wear my hair natural, but was having some problems with my shoulder today, so I went in at about 5:10 knowing they closed at 6! One stylist and she was finishing up a cut on one customer and next cut a one year old babies first cut with hardly any hair! She never recognized me there and after finishing the baby at 5:50 she began sweeping and then looked at me and asked what I needed! I said a shampoo and conditioner! She said we close at 6! I said well why didn’t you say you wasn’t going to have time to service me, she said I thought you were just getting a trim! Trim or shampoo it’s a service! She did not say anything else to me and kept sweeping the floor! I put back the products I was buying and left the store peacefully but very upset! Yes I am a lady of color,  does cost cutter service people of color still? Just asking for myself?

name: Angela Flannagin
text: The service was great. She done a great job on my hair.

name: Rhonda Garrison
text: Lovef my hair. Not a very bie wsit tine.cutHey are professional

name: Valerie Dowdy
text: I got my hair cut and highlighted here about a month ago and everything was great! The employees were very friendly and professional. My hair turned out exactly how I wanted it. I received so many compliments from friends and family on how amazing my highlights looked. I won't go anywhere else when it comes to my hair! I highly recommend Cost Cutters in Athens, AL!

name: Ashley Yerbey
text: I love my cut and highlights done by Kayla. It is always a great experience with friendly and professional staff. They are also excellent with children and show so much patience towards them. Highly recommended!

name: Angela Putman
text: Stopped by cost cutters in Athens to get my hair cut, the young lady, Kayla  was so sweet and friendly and did a great job on my hair.... when I’m back in Athens I will definitely get her to cut my hair again.  Thank you.

name: Breanna Butler
text: Kayla is my hairstylist, and she is awesome! She always helps me pick the perfect cut and color for my hair and she is so sweet. Love her!

name: Steve Williams
text: The Ladies do a great job.

name: Deadly Freyja
text: Rude people who couldn’t even answer my simple question and they charge an extra $10 if your hair is longer than your shoulders. Just for a cut. Not a style. I wasn’t even getting it cut to above my shoulders either just about 5 inches cut off. They also sit to where you can’t see them and they can barely see you when you walk up. Took a few minutes for them to notice I was even at the desk. But seriously, not going to pay $23 plus a tip just to get 5 inches of my hair cut off so guess who got over a 50% tip for doing my hair, great clips next door. Still was cheaper than this place by a few dollars WITHOUT the tip lol.

name: Robin Hall
text: Nicole is amazing at what she does. If you ever go there in the Athens Wal-Mart ask for Nicole she will amaze you

name: Paul Kennedy
text: If not on the internet. You will be the last inline to get service. Carry my money to a salon that welcomes your dollar.

name: Alyssa Clement
text: Heather did a great job on my hair. She was thorough and she knows her stuff. I will be using her from now on 🙂

name: Laurie Bristow
text:
Visited June 19th between 11 and 12. Girl I got had long mouse brown/blonde hair. I asked for a graduated bob, stacked in the back at the base of my neck and below my chin in the front a good 2 inch difference. What i got was a pageboy straight across front and back just below my ears. She was in such a hurry I did not get a good look at it until I got home. After I cried. I realized it will take awhile to grow out in order to repair this.  I have gotten excellent service here previously. But not on this day. This is a very bad style on me and the stylist DID NOT LISTEN TO HER CLIENT. I need a frame around my very round face. This is depressing.
Laurie Bristow

name: Julie Seals
text:
The stylist hacked my hair off where it looks blocky and uneven, and she took off way, way more than I asked for. I have long, curly hair and only needed a trim. It looks absolutely horrible now.

She also complained about the other customers in there to me. It was my first time there.

I know you get what you pay for, so I guess I shouldn't be surprised, but I would seriously recommend against going to this particular place. Unprofessional behavior and unskilled hair cutting.

name: Josh Byington
text: Great service and will get you in and out with a good cut for a good price.

name: Starr Crowley
text: Eye brows and quick trim on the go

name: Linda Andrews
text: I had my hair shampooed, wrapped and styled at the salon in Athens. Service was excellent and very professional.

name: Chasity Ingram
text: Greeted with friendy service and I received a haircut that I LOVE!!! VERY friendly staff and ran by very kind, professional managment! Will most definitely be back!!! I also got highlights and they set my cut off ! I've received a million compliments ! Kayla is the sylist that done my hair, and also manages it. She is great...and highly recommended!

name: XxShiftyWolfxX gaming
text: Only place I get my hair cut

name: Jonathan Liner
text: The price was reasonable, the lady who did my hair Nicole was really nice and her station was very clean! I will certainly be back!

name: Mandy Sutton
text: Customer service does not exist at this store anymore. Twice stood for 5 minuets and no one would come to the counter today and earlier this week. I have been using your location since you moved into Walmart and today was my last (attempted) visit.

name: Christi Thompson
text: I always get the service I want with a beautiful smiling face!

name: Dub Diesel
text: Food was good but the service is lacking bad!!

name: Alan Mason
text: AWESOME, friendly service! Always recommend it to everyone.

name: Terri Putman
text: Fast service and I love my hair! Thank you!

The hours posted on here are incorrect our normal business hours are...

text: Glenda at Athena Alabama is awesome. If you want an awesome short haircut, she's your girl, Awesome!!!!!!!!!!!!!

name: Erika West
text: Great customer service

name: Ericia Mason
text: Great service and people

name: SKIP Surbaugh
text: Great stylists.

name: Regina Reeves
text: Great service Kayla!!!

name: Stars World
text: Bad haircut

name: Audry Vanzant
text: Lets go ...y'all

name: Dewite P
text: Friendly group

name: Marla Judd
text: Super clean, very lovely decorated and peaceful salon! Super friendly staff. I got a pedicure and manicure with a full set. Great quality of service! You will not be disappointed. They use plastic in the pedicure tubs to keep everything sanitary and sanitize the chair and all other areas immediately after your pedicure is completed. If I lived in this area this would be my go to salon!

name: Sherida Russell
text:
I have been meaning to leave a review since the first time I visited in April. I absolutely love Caroline and Diana at Omega Nail Boutique. My daughter introduced me to Omega Nails (Caroline) and I have been hooked every since. Now, me and my other daughter are regulars.

It is so refreshing to experience not just basic but exceptional customer service. The ambiance is wonderful and matches the  always warm, inviting and, relaxing service. Both ladies (Caroline and Diana) pay very close attention to detail. My daughter love the great art work Diana does for her. She is never shaken by the request but rises to the challenge. They are truly an asset to Omega Nail Boutique.

I highly recommend this nail salon.

name: Brooke Carmichael
text: This is the BEST nail salon I have ever been to. Sophie is so sweet and funny! She stayed past the time they were closed to do my nails. She was so welcoming. She even explained why she did certain things to the nail. They will give you their best options of what to use on your nails. They take their time and actually care about you here!! You feel like a guest, not a customer.

name: Brittany Gill
text: Hung did an amazing job on my no chip mani and alpha pedicure. Jackie welcomed me and was very courteous! This establishment is beautiful inside 😍. I love the cleanliness and style of this place! The nail bar was my fave. Felt like "happy hour"! Check out the pics.

name: Stephanie Espinoza
text: Today was my first time going to this establishment. This was such a great experience. As soon as you step inside it is such a welcoming and warm, relaxing environment. I had a gel pedicure, Hung did amazing. He was so delicate yet paid great detail to my feet. I have never been so relaxed- best pedicure ever. Diana did an SNS extension and got the shape PERFECT, she listened to how sharp I wanted them and not 1 nail is even a little crooked. The girl chat in the salon was also very fun and welcoming. The prices were comparable to other places I’ve been to in the Birmingham area, but for the quality I received I would have been happy to pay more. I will be going back.

name: Amanda Golden
text:
Great service!  They are polite, caring, engaging and helpful. They’ve just earned my continued business.
Thank you!!

name: Shelly Gentry
text: I've been going to Omega Nail Boutique for close to 2 years now. Caroline and the staff are warm and friendly. They strive to be sure you are well taken care of. You need to check them out! Pedicures are also amazing! Try the Jelly Spa Bath one. My feet have never been so soft. They offer an array of pure organic lotions and foot scrubs. They are also the cleanest nail salon that I've ever been in, and trust me, I've been to a few over the years. Love them dearly!

name: valarie mcclellan
text: Excellent service and selection.  Booked an online appt for my mom. While she was getting her nails done, I decided to get my nails done. It was no problem for the staff. They started on my nails right away. Relaxing atmosphere. Kind staff.  Thx ONB

name: Crystal M
text: I highly recommend this place! Very professional and helpful. The ambiance is lovely; one of the best decorated and clean nail salons I’ve ever been to. The prices are decent and I could tell the other patrons are regular customers just by the conversations.  I will definitely be returning.

name: Chenere Epps
text: I just left this shop and the atmosphere was nice but my nails are ugly and they did try to fix them but it looks like I did them. I’m so disappointed. Money wasted and I will never be back.

name: McKenzie Erin
text: So clean, happy, and comfy! I loved everything about the atmosphere & Caroline was 100% ok getting what I wanted right. Definitely my new go to for all things nails!!!

name: Danielle Davis
text: i have had great experiences each time i’ve visited this establishment! Caroline is AMAZING! my nails always come out great, hands & feet!

name: Paige Barker
text: I decided to try Omega because they had good reviews online. I went to have SNS removed and a manicure. I had a gentleman take the SNS off of my right hand and file my nails down. He randomly switched out with a lady and she did the left hand. It appears they did not communicate with each other because the man rounded my nails on the right hand and the lady squared my nails on the left hand. I asked the lady to fix the nails and make them look the same but this did not happen. The lady also proceeded to file the top of my nails down even more. My nails are paper thin now. One just broke in half in the nail bed. Once she began to paint my nails she did not cover the whole nail and left huge gaps open. It appeared that she could not see clearly. There was a language barrier so I asked another technician to let her know this. They proceeded to try another color on my nails but the outcome was the same. I asked to have the nail color removed and to leave. I was still asked to pay $13 for a “manicure.” Very unprofessional and the worst “manicure” I have had. I wish I could post pictures in this review.

resp.text:
Hello ms. Paige. We are incredibly sorry for the inconvenience we’ve caused you and for the unpleasant experience you received. We have since resolved the problem with the lady. She is no longer employed here. We would also like to redeem ourselves by giving you a proper manicure if you would give us a second chance. Please give us a call and we will get you set up accordingly.
Again we apologize for your experience. We try to do our best and want nothing more than your satisfaction.

name: Eva-Claire Riley
text: I have never been so quick to leave a 5 star review but Caroline and Hoang were awesome and I'm so happy with my manicure and pedicure!! I made an appointment and didn't wait at all. Caroline came up with an amazing design and it was just perfect!!

name: Sinead Abbott
text: We visited from out of town and had a great experience. The space is very beautiful and well lit. A very relaxing experience. 💅🏼✨

name: Terrance Hosea
text: Best nail salon in Birmingham! Anything I show Sophie I want, she makes it happen. Very warm and welcoming environment. As a male, I feel comfortable there, I don’t feel rushed, and my feet feel more soft since I’ve been coming.

name: Bunny D
text: Called and made an appt for 15 min. Later I walked in was greeted by my name and was given a chair instantly.  My 2 nail tech were patient and attentive and listen to everything I said-I felt at peace here.  Thank you for the great experience!

name: Paula Young
text: Sophie & Caroline were absolutely AMAZING!!!! 💅🏼🥰 they stayed after hours to finish our nails & made us feel so welcomed! We will definitely be using Omega Nail Boutique for all of our mani & pedi needs. I will now recommend them to anyone & everyone! The service & quality are worth EVERY penny!!

name: Pido Tran
text: Very friendly staff!! This place really has that community feel, has regulars that come in that they know by name, and always remember their kids/things about theirg personal life. I have never been to a salon that has such quality customer service! My friend and I came in for a mani and pedi. They made us feel like we’ve been coming for years! Special thanks to Diana, Caroline, and Hoang!

name: Barker Black
text: This was me and my mothers first time here and we loved it. There are very personable, kind, and skilled. We loved the atmosphere. They are extremely clean. Our nails look and feel great!

name: Miranda Nassif
text: All I can say is....WOW!! I am so impressed and pleased with not only my nails, but the service! Caroline, Jackie and Sophie are the best along with everyone else! I am so excited to come back! 🤍

name: Johnice Sewell
text: This salon treats their customers well. They are friendly, courteous, and have great conversation. The facility is extremely clean. They are taking all necessary precautions to keep people safe. Great environment. I will be going back.

name: Hunter Kestner
text: The team here is amazing!!! By far the best Nail Boutique I have EVER been too! They do such a great job, with how sanitary they are and professional they are. I highly recommend this salon. 1000 out of 10!!!!

name: Kathryn Clayton
text: They were so nice It was like talking to a friend's. My nails look beautiful.

name: Tree Davidson
text: Sophie was wonderful. She was very professional and helpful. The salon was very clean. Great selection of colors to choose from. Sophie did a great job!

name: Karin Marshall
text: The staff was nice and willing to converse with us. They gave suggestions and always made sure we were comfortable with everything they were doing. The process was quick and very relaxing. 10/10 would recommend and come again.

name: Jakeriah Henderson
text: Caroline is always friendly when I go in there or call and Ms. Luna was great! They both took their time and did great!

name: Megan Crowe
text: I highly recommend this place!  Everyone is extremely friendly and Mariah was a joy!  The boutique is extremely clean and my pedicure was the best in Birmingham!  Thank you!!

name: Amanda Smith
text: This crew welcomed me and talked to me as if they had known me for years! Loved my whole experience and will for sure make it my go to place!

name: Carla Diliberto
text: Great service and friendly staff.  Great pedicure with massage. I tried the dip powder manicure and love it! Best spa experience I  have had yet in Birmingham. Highly recommend !!

name: Logan Hanle
text: I made an appointment for SNS/dip with Sophie and it could not have gone better. Omega is super clean and the staff is friendly and inviting! I definitely found my new nail salon!

name: Rita Mclendon
text: Great place! Took us, a party of 8, at the last minute. We needed pedicures for a funeral. They were friendly and pleasant.  Will definitely be back.

name: Anum Hussain
text: Has an amazing experience! Very sweet and caring people did a great job!

name: skyla hall
text: I had an excellent visit at Omega. The customer service was great! Caroline, my nail technician was very personable nice and respectful. I highly recommend if you’ve searching for a high quality nail salon in Birmingham. You won’t be disappointed.

name: Isaiah Toomer
text: I came and got a manicure and pedicure and the experience was amazing! Mariah did a great job and I will be returning!

name: Nichole Ryder
text: First time client and will definitely be going back! Mariah was wonderful. My nails look great, she took her time and was super helpful when I was picking my color and the services I wanted. Atmosphere was fantastic, and everything was very clean. Only a few people there at the time, all wearing masks so I felt very safe. Staff is friendly and easy to talk to, would definitely recommend!

name: Renee Matthews
text: Excellent customer service. Sofie knew exactly how to make my fiancé and I feel comfortable 😌. She was very personable and sweet. Her brother was very kind as well. My nails and toes look amazing and my fiancé loves his eyebrows. We will definitely be going back.

name: Mike Mashburn
text: Caroline and Sophie took care of my wife and I for our anniversary couples pedicure. I have never had a pedicure but they made sure my experience was perfect. My wife commented that she has had many pedicures but this was far and away the best. We will be back! Top notch all the way around!

name: Katherine Mullen
text: Moriah and Jackie were amazing nail techs, so kind and did a fantastic job. Great atmosphere, their playlist was elite. Definitely found our new place!!

name: Mary Kathryn Kelley
text: GREAT PLACE!! I am new to the area & so happy I went here!! The ladies were incredibly nice & my girl did an amazing job! I will definitely be making this my new spot — HIGHLY RECOMMEND

name: Erica Watson
text: Omega is like no other nail salon I’ve ever been to — it is an experience (and a wonderful one, at that). From calling to schedule an appt to putting those last “magic dry drops” on my precisely-pedicured tootsies...I am relaxed; feel welcome; and always, A L W A Y S satisfied with the finished product. It is evident Caroline, Sophie and Maria are genuine and truly want customers to enjoy their time being pampered. And,  bonus, the place is immaculate and received a 👏🏻100% 👏🏻 on their health safety inspection! Cheers to Omega — they have it figured out!

name: Shelly Richard
text: My friend and I had such an amazing experience here! Caroline and Cline did such an amazing job, they deserve raises! We were so relaxed and they were such good company. We will be returning!

name: Tara Marshall
text: Awesome environment and very cautious and clean to ensure that you are safe during Covid

name: Madelyn Boodoian
text: I had been told to go here by a very reliable source and I was thoroughly impressed! Mariah was my provider and she was the sweetest and most accommodating. I have a cosmetology license and know a good manicure and they did an amazing job. Will definitely be my new regular spot! Thanks guys!! You're all so sweet and amazing at what you do!

name: Sara Allbritton
text: What a wonderful nail salon!  We noticed that this place had an 100 on health rating and agreed! We’ve had pedicures all over Birmingham but this is the best! What nice people!

name: Alison Lebert
text:
Best nail salon I have been to in the Birmingham area. Caroline and Sophie took their time and really educated me and my friend on the quality of their products and services.

The Salon’s COVID-19 precautions are outstanding.

Overall, A++ experience!

name: Juanitra Moore
text: Caroline is the absolute best!!! After coming back from a long hiatus of having my nails done- I knew I made the right choice of coming back to Omega Nail Boutique. They are so personable and care about you as a customer as well as the care of your nails. Everyone there is great.I always love the experience when I go. You absolutely get what you pay for and so much more!!

name: Rhonda Rogers
text: Outstanding service!! I felt extremely comfortable and safe during my entire visit. I’ve been in the area for a year now, best nail salon I’ve found!

name: Kristin Lovvorn
text: This place has never failed to do a fantastic job every time I go! Everyone is so friendly, professional and you can tell they enjoy the job they do ladies keep up the great work! 😊

name: Misty Williams
text: I can’t say enough good things about Omega!!! I absolutely love all the people there because they do a stellar job, plus it is the cleanest nail salon I’ve ever been to (and they were super clean BEFORE COVID)! I work out a lot and beat my nails up, but with Omega, my nails last SO long every time. I can get at least three weeks out of my gel pedis. If you haven’t tried Omega, you’re definitely missing out!!

name: Laura Endicott
text: If you're looking for a place that will get you right in and pamper you without feeling rushed, this is the place for you. Omega Nail Boutique has such a great atmosphere and very clean environment. Caroline took great care of me and my nails look amazing! This is the best place I have been to have my nails done. Do yourself a favor and go to Omega! You won't regret it!

name: Brent Curtin
text: What a great place. Not a typical nail salon. My wife and I love Caroline. As a guy, it’s sometimes uncomfortable to go to a nail place but they make you feel so welcome. I actually consider her a friend. We are regulars now.

name: Donella Gelpin
text: Love love LOVE Omega! I love feeling at peace and home each time I walk through the door. From the decor to the personality of each employee, it’s superb! Caroline, Sophie, Mariah, & Jackie...are the best! I love the personal attention I receive each and every time.

name: jennifer killen
text: Hot stones were amazing. I've been missing out.

name: Ragefest 2000
text: Omega is all about service. From its first customer to its last they go out of their way to make whatever your getting the best it can be. My pedicure and manicure were amazing and they really pampered my boyfriend and I with red red and white wines. Plus they are one of the only locations for hi quality dip nails in Birmingham.

name: Jason Lambert
text: The staff is friendly, the shop is clean, and their service is top-notch. This is the best nail salon around.

name: Lisa Ippolito
text: Absolutely my favorite place ever!  I’ll never go anywhere else for my nails!  They are above & beyond special!

name: lsbryant34
text: Jackie is an excellent nail tech. He was super nice and professional. The salon is clean and the staff is friendly. It has the upscale salon feeling. The pricing is reasonable and the service is A1.

name: Laura Morgan
text:
One of the fanciest nail salons I’ve stepped foot in! The atmosphere is so comfortable and the wait time was nonexistent! I 100% recommend this place to anyone near the Colonnade area.

Sophie and Diana were so sweet and made my experience wonderful.

name: Amber Foster
text: In Birmingham this week for work and needed a nail repair. After looking at multiple salons online I settled on Omega. I am so glad I did. The atmosphere is incredible and the service was even better. I went ahead and had the color changed on my nails along with the repair. She was kind enough to reshape my stiletto. I joked that I was now going to have to travel 6 hours just to get my nails done!

name: Law Wycoff
text: Awesome pedicure. Massage chair and wine set the mood just right. Jackie took time to make sure my feet were handled just right 💪🏼

name: Taylor Hayes
text: This place is amazing! I’ve never seen a bar layout for getting nails done, it’s something you should definitely check out. Sophie worked on my nails and shes super sweet. Thanks for the excellent service!

name: Aimee Weaver
text: Found this place a month ago!!! Everything about this business gets 5 stars. The owners are very kind, the salon is pristine and they do the best job on my nails! I will be back!!

name: Anna Marie Porter
text: I came to Omega for the first time, and had the most wonderful experience I’ve ever had at a nail salon. Everyone should give them a try. You won’t be disappointed!

name: Katherine Hooks
text: I have long been a client and friend of the owners. I have never been to a nail salon before that felt so welcoming, warm and relaxing. The salon is clean, has an incredible color selection of well-known, name brand polish, and services are executed with perfection and professionalism. I recommend Omega above any other spa in Birmingham!

name: Holli McManus
text: Great manicure. Great conversation. Who could ask for more?  Definitely recommend.

name: Cheryl Chapman
text:
Really great pedi with excellent leg and foot massage. Only my second visit but I'm a regular now.
I pass 2 closer nail spas to get there. Relaxing atmosphere, great chairs and an enthusiastic and welcoming staff.

name: yes sir
text: Great Service

name: Chelsea Maher
text: Great people and beautiful salon! I really appreciate their willingness to share their knowledge as well. Worth the drive from outside the 280 area!

name: Isis Major
text:
I have to say that this is the BEST nail salon I have ever been to!! Everyone was so kind and actually attentive to what I wanted my nails to look like. Even when I wanted to shorten my nails, I didn’t get the typical nail tech eye roll or sigh. They said “Absolutely! We want you to be comfortable with your nails”.  I even tried a new design I saw on Pinterest (which I was nervous about), and my nails came out identical to what I wanted.

Caroline and Sophie made me feel very welcome. It was like I had know them for years. Needless to say, I will be going back and I give them more than 5 stars!

name: Audrey Rice
text: Best nail salon experience I have had in a long time! Caroline took great care of me and made me feel very relaxed. This is my new place for sure.

name: Ashley Jackson
text: This is the best nail salon I’ve ever been too! Everyone was extremely kind and my nails are PERFECT! Definitely the best nail experience I’ve ever had!

name: Jennifer Carter
text: Beautiful salon but the owners are extremely slow. They played around and talked through my entire time there. My visit was 4 hours long for a simple mani and pedi. Worst experience ever.

name: Hannah Carroll
text: I really like trying new nail boutiques, this one had so much potential. The ladies were so sweet, however I paid a good amount for a gel pedicure & two of the nails came off the next morning. After I went back to get them fixed, another fell off the day after.

name: Image Pure
text: I walked by omega boutique and I was curious so I walked in. They just opened! I was greeted by the owner Stephen. I felt very welcomed and the atmosphere was calming, but that's not the only thing, the nail techs did an amazing job on my fullset. I have been going from nail salon to nail salon and the service was always good or the worst experience of my life, but this set was immaculate. I highly recommend this boutique if you're tired of going place to place.

name: Lisa Cumming
text: Very friendly and welcoming staff provided an excellent gel manicure. Will definitely return to see Mariah!

name: stephanie lorino
text: Loved it! Today was my first visit and I will be back! Great relaxed atmosphere and kind people that are great at what they do! Very clean and professional.

name: Juani W
text: My first visit was nothing short of professional, awesome customer service, quaint atmosphere and I love my nails! I’m certain to be a repeat customer! #NewNailsNHappy

name: Felicia James
text: Super awesome experience. My mani and pedi look absolutely amazing and everyone in the nail shop is super nice and accommodating. I will definitely be back for sure!

name: Carl Stacy
text:
It was a absolutely awesome
experience.

name: Demetria Mabay
text: The service, atmosphere and staff is excellent!

name: Amberley
text: Caroline is super nice and friendly. She did so gentle and professional job for my pedicure.

name: Deloris Eggleston
text: Sophie is absolutely wonderful!!!!! She made me feel so relaxed while doing my pedicure

name: Holly Holt
text: I am OCD about getting my nails done every 2 wks and it's extremely rare for me to go 3 wks or longer, but when I noticed my travel schedule had me going to Birmingham this wk then my maintenance schedule went out the window. The girls at omega are amazing and are totally worth the wait! If I could I would fly them to Atlanta every 2 weeks just to do my nails!!'

name: Natasha Criss
text: Great service, excellent atmosphere, and people who make you feel welcomed and pampered!

name: Shamarold Nettles-Nelson
text: Really nice salon,  a tad bit overpriced, but not so much that I won't return.

name: John Bodkin
text: Great services.

name: Cassondra Glass
text: I love them Everytime I go somewhere else I always have to go back to then to fix it

name: Bridgett Fortenberry
text:
Samantha is the BEST. She has been my stylist for at least 13 years. I have followed her to whatever shop she has went to. I drive from Birmingham to Pell City now just for my hair cut ,color& style.
Love Bridgett

name: Jennifer Tyler
text: I highly recommend this shop to anyone needing your family’s hair cuts. Emily cut my hair and my daughter’s hair.  My son and my fiancé use her for their cuts too. We all drive a long a long way to get our cuts from her.   She did awesome job on all of us. I love the cut I got. It’s easy to maintain.  She has been my stylist for over a year now. I highly recommend her to anyone who needs haircuts for the whole family.  The shop was clean and masks worn at all times. I felt very safe and taken care of by the staff. Thank you.

name: Morgann Kolb
text: Clean, friendly, caring, hard working, patient. Knowledgeable staff.

name: Matthew Poole
text: We went to get my little big guy a cut and Robin did a great job. He is 3 and only had 4 hair cuts so he still isnt comfortable yet but after some candy offered up by Robin and some soothing Mickey mouse everything was okay. She did a great job at comforting him and being patient. Before and after pics

name: Louise Skoglund
text: Emily does a great job every time. I have highlights , lowlights done she is very good. My only complaint is the price. They are lower then some though.

name: Trish White
text:
Only do hair cuts 😢
Beth has always gave me that style I go in for, she is a 5 star to me .

name: Marie Alverson
text: My hair stylists Morgann  at Smartstyle in the Pell City Walmart did an outstanding job on my hair. The color and cut was just what I asked for and my hair feels wonderful. Morgann has colored and cut my hair before and I loved it both times. Great bunch of ladies at Smartstyle.

name: renae jackson
text:
The blonde with the glasses, her name is Morgan, I know that because I treated her like a person and had a lovely conversation with her about my hair.  She is a great stylist, I have wanted to get in her chair for months since she consulted on my color.  She knows what she is doing, she listened to what I wanted and gave great feedback and suggestions on improving my look.  For me, the proof is in all the compliments I get at work and on the street.  I will definitely be back and ask for her.

11/2020 I was able to get an appointment with Morgann.  We did all the usual things to my hair while wearing a mask.  The color came out wonderful as usual, and the new cut is awesome.

name: David Tyler
text: I have followed Morgann foyer years now. I love my hair cuts and the environment of this salon. All the stylist here are welcoming and entertaining. I'm always pleased with my haircut and the teatree shampoo is awesome! Give them a try.

name: jonathon FeNdLeY
text: The lady Morgann did an awesome job with my cut and color.  I highly recommend you ask for her.

name: Lacey Jackson
text: The blonde hair lady with glasses may be the worst person in customer service I have ever met. If I could rate 0 I would. Absolutely rude.

name: Jessica Ballentine
text: they a great job

name: Alliyah Gover
text: Great service and great people!

name: Jessaca Martin (JessyJae 228)
text: Robin does AMAZING work! She did my hair exactly like what was in the picture & styled it beautifully. Showed me how to style it the same way everyday & what products would work best. Didn't cost an arm & an leg and didn't take up my entire day! I will never use another salon & I will forever see Robin anytime I need a cut & color!!

name: Alicia England
text: If you want a haircut you can go anywhere but if you want true hair value go to Morgann. She cares about the health of your hair. If you want someone that will listen to you and make you walk out feeling glamorous, she is your stylist. Morgann has done a great job on my hair for  10 years. She is the only person allowed to touch my natural curls. She always does a great job. I love that I set up an appointment and I don’t have to worry about anything.  I do not want cheap hair so I am willing to pay a professional to do my hair the right way the first time. Just because this salon is in WalMart that doesn’t mean these are “wanna be stylists”.  These women/men spend their time and money learning a trade to help support their families. I love my SmartStyle stylist Morgann. I trust her to do anything and I mean anything that she wants to do to my hair. MORGANN YOU ARE THE BEST EVER!!!!

name: Pebbles Flinstone
text: Samantha & the rest of the gals are great! I loved the way my hair turned out!

name: Stephanie “Steph” Isbell
text: She did good job on his

name: Jessica Leigh
text: Great haircuts for my boys and they were very good with children

name: Jessica Miller
text: Very good thing did a great job on my daughter's hair

name: Lisa & Matt Park
text: Great!

name: Corrie Garrett
text: Really good with hair

name: Chrisandra Smith
text: Annie Brunson is so helpful.

name: Kayla Elrod
text: I called to make my mom that's eldlery (80) on a very fixed income to get her Hair rolled and set. I called to make a appointment and to make sure of the price before she arrived. I was told $16.98 and she said just walk in. So my mom went in and got her hair done after being told $16.98 on the phone when she went to pay it was $32.00.so we spoke to the same lady that told Us 16.98 on the phone and she agreed it was $16.98 needless to say the lady that done my moms hair still charged her over the pice we was told Over the phone. I feel Like she was taking advantage of. We will never go back here again and I sure hope this doesn't happen to anyone else especially the eldlery on a fixed income. I would give 0 starts but I have no option.

resp.text:
We're sorry to hear this, Kayla - thank you for letting us know. We strive to always provide a quality salon experience, and we have shared your review with our local Guest Service team.

If you or your mom are interested in discussing this with a District Leader, please contact 1-800-737-3535 or departmentcs@regiscorp.com.

Thank you,
SmartStyle Guest Services Team

name: Daisy Sykes
text: Master hairstylist did a wonderful job my hair is hard with all these curls

name: Keaton Abernathy
text: Friendly, experienced staff. Will even help you pick out a new haircut if you don't know what you want.

name: Kayla Lynn Minish
text: Absolutely terrible! Messed my son's hair up twice and once before picture day!

name: JAMES JONES
text: Prompt, courteous and professional service!

name: angela whitten
text: Great hair cuts

name: Bama Momof1
text: The women was so rude . I walked out and never been back .

name: Jessie Rutledge
text: Got my hair did up

name: aerial franklin
text: Yay

name: John G
text: Never seems to be enough help.

name: Blanche John
text: They are the best and both very precise & clean with them work. Also very sweet! Since starting to come here since COVID the staff has kept the place sanitary & up to standards.  I will continue to come here for these great services.

name: Carla R
text: Madison Nails and Spa is my daughters and I go to place for manicures, pedicures and waxing. This is the only place we go since we found it! The people there are wonderful and they do an awesome job with all the services we have used. I first went there to get my eyebrows waxed and they did a great job but what keeps me  going back is that they put something on my skin after that really soothes my skin. And if I get my top lip done they they do something that makes it sting less. Also with all the pedicures I have had there, I have never had an ingrown toenail, and that has happened to me several times at other nail salons. I highly recommend Madison Nails and Spa!

name: Anne Anderson
text: I've come here twice now. Very professional and caring.  My tech is my favorite but they're all very great and professional!  I highly recommend this place!

name: Diana White
text: I'm so happy I found this place! Very clean & respectful staff. The owner is so kind and timely with each appointment. Love it! Highly recommend.

name: Jennifer Stancliff
text: Excellent services and good prices

name: Sandra Jackson
text: My nail tech specified exactly what shape I wanted for my SNS and gave me some great recommendations on whether or not I should lengthen or keep my nail length. Thanks!! Honestly love this nail salon!

name: Lucasta Jones
text: I've been coming here for 5 times and they are by far the best nail salon in the area.My tech is absolutely amazing!! She truly understands what I want (shape and color wise).

name: Jasmine Wiley
text: I simply needed a fill in . The nail tech misshaped my nails to a complete different shape that doesn’t exist. After explaining I just needed coffin shape. Maybe it was a language barrier but I was still charged full price even when I asked her not to complete the service. No one offered to fix the problem.  Only nails salon charging extra 20.00 for gel polish. So basically i was charged 90.00 for a pedicure since that was the only thing done successfully. They also use their nail drills on the highest speed . Be prepared for sore nail beds!

name: Helena Wilson
text: This is my regular go-to spot. They do a good job, and the prices are good too. The technician removed my previous hard gel and gave me a beautiful manicure. Shaping was done perfectly and she took her time. Will definitely return.

name: Nina Allen (Nina Jackson Allen)
text: Excellent.  Ask foe Lina or Nancy!!

name: Nasa Trần Dung
text: There were a couple of regulars who walked in while I was there that were greeted by name, so that made me feel more confident in choosing to come here for my first time. Very clean and friendly. I'll definitely be back!

name: jalisa jordan
text: I received a pedicure and gel polish on my nails.  I had to touch up my feet in the shower the same night.  The pedicure wasn’t done well at all.  The gel on my nails is peeling off .  It hasn’t even been a week.  For the price, I expected better .  There’s an extra $5 charge for each service , due to covid .  That’s fine, but with all the money I spent, again, I expected better.

name: Amanda Walker
text: Not satisfied at all first they didn't understand what I wanted kept asking me to get gel polish instead of regular and kept insisting I get a different shape than coffin why they wouldn't just do them like I was asking instead of insisting on doing them other than what I was asking for idka nd did not know how to do coffin shape evidently cause I had to come home and fix them some nails were alot shorter than others just not a good experience at all and i normally pay about 33 or 34$ for a full set regular polish and polish toes i was charged 60$ i will not be going back

name: Tim Horton's
text: Clean place friendly employees. They really try to give you the nail design you want to have. I got my first ombré powder done here and it looks amazing. I would definitely come back and I highly recommend it.

name: Imelda James
text: This place is the best! They are so honest when it comes to nail techniques and what is best for their clients. I always get the SNS and some other nail salons make it too thin, too thick, too wide, etc. but not this place! Perfect every time :) and they take their time with you as well so you never have to feel rushed. Thank you!

name: Raven Blackwood
text: Absolutely amazing!! took their time and gave me exactly what I wanted. Will be returning, and definitely recommending to everyone I see!!

name: Scarlett Wellman
text: Love, love , love Lina and her team! I am never disappointed with their work.

name: JB
text: Would give 0 stars if possible. Very shady, tried to claim gift certificate was worth half the written value. Beware

name: Vargas Nicol
text: Best nail salon!!! CLEAN, friendly, and consistent staff, lots of polish choices. The absolute best spot in the area. I will be back.

name: Dangie A Turner
text: Loved this place & the staff was super friendly. Pearl pedicure was amazing!

name: Trini Doll Nicky 2021
text: My GEL NAIL polish started to peel off within only 2 days after getting service. That's my only complaint. Wendy was my nail technician. She was kind and courteous. The staff was professional. But my nails looked horrible after only a couple of days and I tipped $20 and paid good money. So of course I was disappointed.

name: Danny Ali
text: I recently moved to this place and have been searching for a good nail salon that has good customer service.  I've tried 3 other places and was not impressed at all.  And this salon is excellent!  I just went for the first time this week and manicurist took care of my feet.  It was heavenly.  The pedicure was great. I look forward to going back again and again.

name: Imelda Jones
text: I've already recommended two of my friends and they have enjoyed their experiences there.  I continue to go with a friend every couple months as a fun treat/hangout for us. I like these technicians! They were detailed, thorough, gentle and communicated well with getting our approvals of the color, shape etc. I think we will request them when we go again.

name: Sheila Murphy
text: I had heard good things about this place, but my experience was not good at all. I even contacted the owner about my experience and she was not helpful at all and took over a week to respond to me. I got a mani/pedi and was so disappointed. It was painful, the lady didnt understand what I was telling her, the polish looked so very bad and I removed it as soon as I got home.

name: Leslie Kerr
text: I’m extremely disappointed in the service received. I specially told the technician NO extension/tip for my teenage daughter. She didn’t listen and added tips despite the conversation.

name: Emily Mark
text: Love this place - super friendly. Lina did my pedicure but it was the best pedicure and foot massage that I've received from a nail salon. I definitely recommend this salon!!

name: Flores Dominique
text: Another great mani from manicurist did an awesome job on my Pedi. Manicurist also talked me into a facial, which I desperately needed so it didn't take too much persuading. It was great, so I'll go back for one another time for sure. Thanks, I will be back!!

name: Kendra Creamer
text: Always greeted when I walk-in. Rarely have to wait for a chair. If you make an appointment you get in within  minutes of arrival, even when they are busy. Staff is always courteous and they do great work. Waxing always looks great too. I never go anywhere else.

name: Stephany Nitza
text: I love this place and had such a great first impression. I got a full set with the dipping powder. I was amazed. It is very clean and the nail techs are very professional. Barely even any wait time either. Wendy did my nails and I will be back to see her again.

name: ashli Jennings
text: Very clean. Great experience!!

name: Gladys R. Rutledge
text: Another wonderful pedicure at Madison Nails & Spa. One thing that i love about this place is they bring out a clean box of tools for each customer unlike some other nail places that just wipe tools off with rubbing alcohol. Technician wasn't rushed and did a great job. Hot cream and massage is heavenly!

name: K. Hankins Heidi
text: I've had my gel nails on for about a week now and they still look good. Also the ladies there make you feel comfortable and welcomed. Glad I was introduced to this palace.

name: dimaris griggs
text: I love this place. they are always friendly professional and prompt. if the wait is going to take long they will always reschedule you. they will not waist your time. I am always satisfied with the way my nail look after the service. I highly recommend them. check them out. you will not be disappointed

name: Chalisse LeMaitre-Layman
text: They always make you feel welcomed, not rushed. They listen to what you want, and they are the best with children when you have to take your lil one with you. I am extremely happy that they had been recommended to me.

name: Puggy Paul
text: The Manager was very rude when after being 40 minutes past my appointment acted like she could care less. I'm sure the nail techs are great but the manager is very unprofessional and a jerk.
