name: Amanda Mary
text: I have been going to Madison Nails & Spa now for quite some time. The shop is clean, friendly and all the people do a wonderful job. My technician is meticulous. I had trouble finding a really good nail shop until now.

name: Michael Williams
text: I have been getting my nails done at this place for half a year and do not plan to go anywhere else. I live 30 mns away from Madison and this is honestly my favorite place to get my nails done. They are very nice and friendly! They know how to treat their customers! I recommended this nail salon to my friend and they were satisfied with their experience!!

name: Billyjoe lopez
text: Never disappointed in this place I drive 30 minutes out of my way in order to go here because their work is that good I'll never go anywhere else

name: Aya Khatib
text: Lina is the sweetest, kind hearted, most passionate lady! She listens to what you want takes her time and is very detailed with all her work. A PERFECTIONIST AT ITS BEST!!! All the beauty’s that work here are great, friendly and extremely knowledgeable and professional. This is the place to go not only for your nails but she also does micro blading and let me just say I am in love with my eyebrows!!!

name: Evelyn Martin
text: Do yourself a favor and go to Madison Nails & Spa. Staff are AMAZING. I have been getting my nails done for years and this is the real deal. From the friendly service to the overall asethetic it's the best experience you can receive!

name: Amanda D
text: I always have such a good experience with Wendy. She always makes it such a treat to have my nails done. I've been going to her for about 4 years and couldn't ask for a better nail tech. She does a fantastic job and is always extremely professional and friendly. Lena, the owner provides an wonderful relaxing environment. Appointments are honored and rarely run past but you must come on time because the techs are busy with clients all day. Wouldn't go anywhere else.

resp.text: Thank you for your comment and your business. Hope you and your family have a wonderful holiday!!!

name: Anjali White
text: This is the best nail salon in Madison hands down. I just wish they did acrylics because I know they would do them expertly. They really are perfectionist which is hard to find in a nail salon. I just wish they were closet to my apartment

name: staham jackson
text: My first time visiting there I got the best pedicure I have ever had in my life along with a wonderful foot massage. Their techniques are modern and the salon was extremely clean. Their prices are competitively priced compared to other salons who were not as professional. I plan to go back for a fill in soon.

name: junk mail
text:
This nail salon is the absolute best! Even though they are busy, they are always very polite and have beautiful smiles for everyone. Wendy is awesome at what she does and she has always done a great job for me and my friends.
100% Satisfaction at Madison Nails and Spa.
100% Happiness with Wendy and her beautiful art.
100% Amazed at how Lina runs her business better than any Nail Salon I've seen!

name: Patrick Olivia
text: My first trip here was excellent! I got the most thorough mani/pedi I've ever had. They also managed to some how make my terrible feet soft. So many colors to choose from and they do nail art. Excited to go back!

name: John Pierson
text: The Pedicure was great.  The technician, Amy, was very professional and welcome me.  I highly recommend this shop.

name: Angela Dennis
text: Had microbladding done.  She did such an awesome job!!! It was my first time so I was a little nervous but she made me feel very comfortable.   Great experience and would definitively recommend. Love it

name: Jodi Biegel
text: This salon seemed a little pricey, but they do great quality work! The price in the end is worth it!

name: Brittany M
text: Went last week for dip nails. One, they dipped my nails directly into the powder which is unsanitary. Second the gentleman who did my nails clearly did not know what he was doing. I had to ask him after he thought he was done to make my nails smoother and less bulky. I was so unsatisfied after 2 hrs of being there I gave up, paid and left. Went back a few days later because my nails were lifting... ALREADY! Why go back? Cause I had to match the color. A new person did my nails and did a complete different method than the first guy. The nail ended up being completely different from the rest of my nails. I also had to ask her to go in and make my nails less bulky after she thought she was finished. Beware who you let do your nails there if you are getting tips and doing dip. I gave them 2 stars only because the facility is very clean and nice.

resp.text: Sorry, your not happy. But as every story there is always to sides to a story. I went back to see when you visited us last and see you came in 12 days ago. After 12 days no color will be the same. So when the technician did your nails with the same powder the color was off. In most salons you would have paid full price after 12 days. I do apologize for your bad service.

name: Julie C Smith
text: This group of people are Awesome! They have always done an excellent job on my pedicures and nails! Very clean place. They also did my microblading it looks so awesome. It looks just like hair. I am so happy with the job Lina did on my eyebrows. I would recommend any services you need done. Thanks guys for the great work you do!

name: Theresa Leonard
text: Call this morning got a appointment with Wendy for 2:00. She got me in and out. Love my nails

name: Mary Ann Ketron
text: Thank you Wendy for always making my nails look beautiful! I prefer a natural look and Wendy knows the perfect combination of powders to get the look I want. Thank you for always making me a quick appointment around my busy schedule. I look forward to  our time together!

name: Ms Ken
text: Awesome service! My nails look phenomenal! Just what I asked for

name: connie garcia
text: I’ve been here a few times, and each time I get the feeling that I’m not welcomed. Some employees do a great job but others seem in a hurry . The only nice one is Wendy and the owner.

name: Grace
text:
It took two and a half hours for a manipedi after they assured me it would be ‘about an hour.’

I got a great pedicure but the woman who did my manicure was rough and impatient. She told me repeatedly to relax my hands (which I’m pretty sure I was doing) and when I didn’t do it the way she wanted, she twisted my fingers uncomfortably while expressing her annoyance. The end result was a mediocre manicure.

This salon is a gamble. Can sometimes be great, can sometimes be pretty bad.

name: Alicia Hall
text: This is a very clean and well kept salon.  My services have mostly been good but some inconsistency in the quality at times.

name: Jessica Burgess
text:
I honestly enjoy my experience at the Madison Nails and Spa as I was a new customer. However, I didn’t fairly enjoy how rude customers were treating the nail technicians. On Saturday, I came in to get my nails done and notice how rudely one customer was treating one of the nail technicians, Nancy. This lady was criticizing and complaining on why she didn’t want to speak English and started to act very poorly to her.
First off, I need to state off that customers really need to stop treating these workers like they are machines. Sometimes they have rough days and they can’t do as well as they used to be. These people have families of their own and can’t spend all their time working on one little piece of your nails. I honestly don’t know how anyone could have the right mind to treat someone like this. These nail technicians has lives. They might not be as fortunate as others with well paying and easy jobs. Customers can’t treat these people like they have no value other than painting nails. And sometimes these nail technicians don’t even get enough sleep or rest, and have off days. And all these negative reviews on this nail salon makes me sick. You don’t know how it feels to make a business just to have people talk trash and negativity about it. Weren’t you people taught on how to react others the way you wanted to be treated?

name: Maria Battle
text: It was okay. My pedicure was nice, just a bit over priced.

name: L.T. Stallworth
text:
Beware. Definitely stay away from the old guy if you want dip nails. He is horrible. My nails are too big for my fingers, clumpy and thick plus he was too rough. Also, the color palate is off. I choosed a gold color dip powder and it turned out olive green. Before I even got a chance to voice my grievances, I noticed I was missing my wallet. But had my checkbook in my purse. Long story short, the owner didnt know what too do saying she wont take checks! Tried to send me to the bank with someone tailing me like they would miraculously allow me to get money out with no ID. I had to leave my phone just to go all the way back home, in order to come back and provide her with payment. I did apologize for not having the proper form of payment, then offered advice  that she should take cash app, google or apple pay, pay pal or something if this should ever happen again because she made me feel some type of way about the situation with her rudeness and lack of understanding, and for this reason I would not be returning. She basically told that was my problem. Clearly it was an "our" problem because I couldn't pay for her service at the time, right. I cant and wont ever support a business who can't respect their clientele and provide a decent service along with customer service. As well as the right to refuse service to anyone sign hanging in their establishment. Who and why would you refuse service to anyone I wonder? I'll tell you who, anyone with an opinion, just like I told old dude the color was off on my nails and the shape and he got an attitude about it, then became rough stating I wasnt hold my hand properly. 1 star is 1 too many in my opinion. Needless to say. I will be going across town in the morning to correct this disaster.
P.S. excuse all the typos, my fingers are sore from the roughness of old dude rubbing dipping powder off with a rough dry towel.

name: Kaeti Milton
text: The staff provides excellent customer service and quality work. The atmosphere of the facility is relaxing and pleasant. Also, it's comforting knowing that all of the equipment used for different services is clean and sanitary. I've noticed that the health score of the salon has been 100 consistently every time that I've been there. I would never use another salon than this location.

name: Andrea Nall
text: I love my nail salon.  Its very clean and the staff is friendly.  They have convenient hours.  They offer many different services and options.  Fair prices as well.

name: Paula Taylor
text: SERVICE IS ALWAYS EXCELLENT!!!! Shout out to Wendy👍🏼... Greatest Nail Technician Ever! 😊

name: PAULA TAYLOR
text:
Shout Out to Madison Nails, and Especially my Favorite And Most Dependable Nail Professional, Ms. Wendy.... I’ve been with her for over 7 Years, the service provided has been SUPERB!  I highly recommend Wendy, you will be definitely satisfied.
Thank you Wendy.

name: Datrean Pileggi
text: They were very good, attentive, and kind in the beginning. I’ve been coming here for about 18 months. I made ONE (my first) complaint about my nails a few months back and they’ve been rude and dismissive ever since. Just today I came back to try again. I asked for a pedi and full set and they waited until my pedicure was done to tell me that no one was available FOR THE REST OF THE DAY to do my nails. It was 1pm on a random Wednesday... Never coming back

name: Trevor Holt
text: Amazing service!! Fast friendly and they pay attention to detail. I noticed that everything was kept very clean which is a huge plus and the environment is relaxed so you don’t feel out of place as a first time customer. No doubt I’ll be back and would not hesitate to recommend to anyone!

name: Savannah Brooks
text: Today was my first time visiting this nail salon and i will definitively be a regular! I got a pedicure and gel manicure and the experience was great and so relaxing! They use disposable nail files and sponges (all salons are supposed to but salons don’t always follow this rule I’ve noticed) and they had the perfect matching color for the gel polish on my nails and regular polish on my toes.

name: Carla Lester
text: Had microblading done here! The whole experience really couldn’t have gone better. Everything was so professional and amazingly sterile. Almost hospital like. Although really nervous about the procedure and the final result beforehand, I have nothing but good things to say after having it done. The results were great; very natural just as requested. Discomfort was minimal and the healing and care process was explained in depth in order to achieve the best results!  Definitely recommend!!

name: Jenna Vasquez
text:
I came in last week with my mom , daughter and i for a fun time pedi . The boss , and two other females talked about our toe nails and my finger nails the entire time ,and made fun of them , laughing and pointing showing of my nails to the boss .i didn’t want to get filled at their store on that day . that was the most disrespectful and rude thing to do to paying customers $75 +tips and just to be insulted!, NO!
yet each one got a tip but i did tell my lady
how rude the three of them were so i’m leaving this review! unsatisfied

name: Vanessa Wilson
text: They people here don't give the same level of service to walk-ins vs regular clients.  I was at Batteries plus and decided to go in for a quick polish change and brow wax.  My brows were too thin and had spaces.  My polish didn't have enough coats.  I won't be back.

resp.text: I'm sorry but we are not located next to Batteries plus. But if you did get your Nails done at Madison Nails & Spa we apologize you did not have a good experience. We pride ourselves on great service.

name: Kelly McGuffin
text: The experience I had was terrible!!!  The guy that did my nails acted like he was in a race to get my nails done.  He didn't file my nails and I had pieces hanging off the side.  I asked him to fix it and he painted it to the side of my nail.  Other nails look terrible.  He was very rough and didn't care.  My fingers were red and almost bleeding.  I wouldn't dare go there again.

name: Patricia Wyenandt
text: I've been coming to this salon for more than 3 years.  Everyone is greeted immediately.  I have never seen anyone have to wait more than 15 minutes.  Lina, the owner does my nails.  She does a great job and works with me to create interesting color combinations and designs.  All of the technicians are good.  Everything is sterilized and the tools are prepackaged for each client.  Their health rating is a consistent 100.  I recommend so many people to come here.

name: Timothy Corey
text: Tammy (my wife) has had nothing less than excellent service from Lena and her staff. My wife has very high standards and has been to many salons all over the world. For her to want to write a review is very rare. Every APPOINTMENT has been kept and EVERY crazy idea my wife has for her salon care has been taken care of with the highest professional care. Thank you Lena and your staff.

name: Ilona Allen
text: Best place ever, sweet and kind and do a great job

name: Lanita Parker
text: I have been here several times. My sister had given me a Gift card for Christmas in 2017. I also had another one that was not dated. I usually wait until spring to have my pedicures done. I forgot about the gift cards last year and went and paid cash for my services. I ran across the gift certificates and decided to take my sister to get manicures and pedicures done today. We checked to be sure we could still use them since I know one had expired. They said yes and said that the price had gone up and we would have to pay the extra cost. Of course I had no problem with that. We were both going to upgrade our pedicures to a more expensive service. We had picked out our colors and they had directed us to our chairs. They had already started removing my toenail polish when the same lady that initially told us we could use the gift certificates said that one had expired. My sister decided she wouldn’t have anything done if they were not willing to honor the amount that had already been purchased. Then they said mine had also expired because it had their old location listed. We both left. My sister and I both, along with 2 of her daughters used them exclusively for all our pedicures. I feel they could have made some kind of arrangement with us. It’s not like we clipped a coupon that expired. These were bought gift certificates and we were planning to spend more money above their value. They lost lots of future business today because I won’t be back!

resp.text: Sorry! We can’t take gift certificate has been expired in 2years.

name: ashley harbin
text: First I never write reviews but This place is Great, they keep the store very clean, they take their time, and the staff are extremely nice and professional. I love my nails and will be a returning customer. Lee and Wendy were great!

name: Martha Newman
text: This place is so nice!! Super clean, courteous staff and they go above and beyond to make you comfortable. They do an amazing job with manicures and pedicures!! I will never go anywhere else!

name: Aaliyiah Swoopes
text: I hardly EVER post reviews but the way I was treated today was absolutely ridiculous! Poor customer service has been the most memorable experiences that this place has to offer. WENDY & LINA we’re both very rude with nasty attitudes when I stated a problem about my tips for a full set being cut too short. When I was told I am being “too picky” it blew me!!! As far as I’m concerned, my requests should be made bc that is what I am paying you for! After reading other reviews (to see if I’m the only person that experienced this) it seems like regular customers are treated like precious saints compared to walk-in clients. I will not be coming back or referring business to this place! OAN Train your nail techs accommodate clients instead of making excuses for mediocre service 😒

resp.text: Sorry for your experience. All our staff been take care but you wasn’t happy with anyone. Sorry we can’t please you.

name: Denise Mack
text:
I have been going to this shop for about four
Years and the service is great!  If the wait is longer that 15 minutes, you are advised before you sit.
You are provided water, kids juice box if requested.  Technicians are polite.  Love the atmosphere.
I have gone to a few other shops and always run back here.  Very professional.  D

name: LaShawn Jackson
text: Madison Nails & Spa offers excellent service. I’m very particular about my nails and pedicure. I’ve been going to Lina for over 2 years now. The customer service is awesome. They have many nail colors, keep up with the latest nail trends and offer a variety of other services (wax etc). My preference is the SNS dip powder which keeps my natural nails strong and healthy. I would advise you to make an appointment because the new location is conveniently located and the walk-in traffic is high. An appointment will put you ahead of the walk-ins.

name: Cinda Feagan
text:
Please be aware because I returned due to the nail polish being lumpy after day one of having  them done. I returned the following day to show Nancy the tech and she was extremely rude!  She shook her finger as if I was a child and told me what she felt would be best for my nails after I told her repeatedly that I only want gel not powder. She pouted like a child the entire time she was removing the gel. I always tip and now I want everyone to know once you return if serviced by Nancy she pretend like she cannot understand English.  Trust me they all speak English but use it to their advantage when they do not want to honor quality service.

Consider this as a warning!  I will never return to this salon!!!

resp.text: I’m sorry for your bad experience. We have professional nail technicians that always refer you to the best service. You chose your own technician to take care your nails and you walk out without paying or telling the technician Thank you. Thank you for your comments and your business.

name: Reya Patel
text: I am very disappointed in the lack of service they give here. I've heard great things about this place from friends. However I did not get that. I wait over 50mins before someone even acknowledged me. The work they do is great. They did a really good job on my nails. They customer service skills did not match my expectation.

name: Tabetha Bell
text: I  am from out of town. I was worried about finding good service. Maddison Nails & Spa went above and beyond to satisfy my needs. I highly recommend.

name: Sandra Brooks
text: My daughter came in for prom nails and picked out a color to match her dress.  The nails come out a very different color.  They were no help in making things right.

name: Sarah May
text:
I haven’t been to the spa a lot but I have heard from my friends that the owner is very rude most of the time they have been there. I in no way try to be rude but I can say myself she gives off a vibe to me personally, or like gives an attitude. She also treats people with appointments better than walk ins and it gets on my nerves most of the time because some walk in people could be waiting for like 3 hours and the owner would decide to do the person who could show up to an appointment late. She doesn’t show much respect or attention to “walk in”customers. Just in my opinion, I hate that, like it’s the vibe she gives off that she doesn’t care about most of her customers.

If you are a new time customer though, and you want to have a good experience, I recommend either Wendy or Nancy. I just wanted to share some of my friends and I experience after going to this nail shop.

I am not trying to offend the owner, I’m just trying to share my opinion.

name: kaiya mcghaw
text: Amazing service! And quality is always top notch! Definitely recommend.

name: diane korb
text:
Lina's attention to detail is awesome! She does a great job on my nails!
I will not go anywhere else!

name: Quiona Edwards
text: I usually don’t leave bad reviews even if I receive bad service. However, today’s visit was horrible! Wendy usually does my nails and 8/10 times she gets it right. I’m not sure if she was just having a bad day today but she was EXTREMELY rude and not helpful. Oh and my nails look bad already. Hasn’t even been 12 hours!

name: Tiffany Myers
text: Always recieve excellent service! Highly recommended!!  I see Amy and she's amazing!

name: Katrinia ktrinia
text:
This place DESREVES a NEGATIVE STAR.
One Star is too good for it.
My daughter went to this shop.
She has small petite hands.
The nails the placed on her hands are way too big. I called and asked for the manager. To have them redone. "LINA" said there was no manager there. I asked could we come back in the morning She said NO. 5PM instead. I asked for the managers name so that I could speak about getting them done earlier. Then this Person said She was the manager. SMDH now. ( So shes a liar too) She said I was being loud and nasty to her. When in fact I wasnt. The service is Trash. The nails are Trash, polish lumpy . I will be sure to advise others not to go here. Here's a little advice for this business. When you work in service. KNOW your place. It's to serve. Lina

resp.text: Thank you for your comments. First when you asked for the manager I told you on the phone “how may i help you”. I never said I was not the manager. English is not not my first language so maybe I was unclear. You then started to rasie your voice when requesting your daughters nails need to be fixed. I told you we have time for the repair tonight and you rufused that time. I then told you we were booked and the first available time for the repair was 5 pm tomorrow. Once again thank you for you comments and wish you the best of luck.

name: Amanda Goeke
text:
If you're going into the salon I recommend a pedicure over a manicure. My pedicure has lasted for over two weeks and the massage treatment I got was heavenly.
I did get a shellac manicure or and it barely lasted a week before the tips began wearing off. I get shellac because I am constantly washing my hands as a teacher, and having it we are off within a single week was a bit annoying.

name: Susan Mitchell
text: Very beautiful and clean interior, excellent staff and a very relaxing environment.  I highly recommend.

name: Faith Thornton
text: My name is Faith Thornton and I have personally known Lina and her family for 11 years. She has done my nails for years, starting back when their shop was in Wal-mart. She is a perfectionist, goes to school and classes to learn the latest tricks of her trade. She takes responsibility for her salon and for her employees. All of her employees are nice and respectful. They all do a fabulous job. Lina will recommend a product because she knows what is best for the client. She recommended the SNS powder and I will never use anything else. It does not chip or fade, it makes brittle nails like mine strong and helps them grow. I no longer have to get fake nails because of this amazing product and because of the knowledgeable people who work here. This is the place to get your mani’s, pedi’s, waxing, nails, and a variety of other services. They are AWESOME!!!!💜

name: Michaela White
text: They are so nice and friendly here!! I get regular acrylics and they stay on for 3 weeks!! They are Truely amazing

name: Rene Stokesberry
text: Lena did a great job on my nails. She removed my acrylic nails that 2 other places did a terrible job on, and did a shallac gel finish on my natural nails for durablilty. My new go-to place for sure.

name: Brandy Sacco
text: Went for a pedicure, the lady I had cut the bottom of my foot  was not apologetic.  Will not be back.

name: Kate
text: You absolutely CANNOT beat the service for the price!!!! The salon is clean, well decorated, good selection of polishes, the staff is extremely friendly, and the prices and services are the best of anywhere in the surrounding areas!!

name: Amanda Bonds
text: Love it. Lena and her crew are excellent at mani/pedis. The leg, brow, 👙 wax is done professionally and with care. Tell thwm Amanda sent you.

name: Ariyaé Dearing
text: Takes there time on Full Sets & does great on them!!!

name: Brandi Johnson
text: Beautiful salon full of rude nail techs.

name: Marsha Barnett
text: Awesome !!

name: Tianna
text: Nails look horrible. Bad customer service. Save your money and go elsewhere.

resp.text: I'm very sorry you had a bad experience. Please come back and ask for Lina. I would be glad to make it right.

name: Rachael Glenn
text: It took my technician over an hour to do a FILL IN and my nails look terrible!! I will NOT be back!!!

name: Melissa Bradley Ball
text: Kevin and Lena are great.

name: Jirah Moon
text: Briggitte does my hair and she always does an amazing job. I know all the other girls that work there do as well. The shop is always so clean and smells good. Everybody is pretty friendly even if you're not their client.

name: Michael Townson
text: Bridget did very well on my 6 yr old daughter!

name: Ataya Vandiver
text: The woman that done my eyebrows didn't do a good job. I was a walk in.

resp.text: I’m sorry. Who was the woman that did your brows? We don’t have anyone on our schedule with your name.

name: Carolyn Denton
text: She was very nice the beauty shop was very pretty and clean and they offer everything from your nails to pedicure to a spa and face things if it really a nice day at a place to spend the day so and she's really I love my haircut did I just loved it she was really good thank you

name: Amy Hancock
text: This was one of the most relaxing massages I have ever had. Definitely recommend them to anyone.

name: Karin Snoddy
text: Good work, a nice little place to get ur hair done close to home

name: Molly Shelton
text: Love, love, love this place!! Great service and friendly faces. Ladies are super sweet and always make sure you are taken care of and happy!!

name: Tisha Marie
text: Very good nail salon I recommend!!

name: Mary Null
text: Jordan was my hair stylist a very nice, funny, friendly, and respectful worker. He did a very awesome job to my hair. LOVE IT.

name: amanda jones
text: Rick is the absolute best BAR NONE in Montgomery! Your airbrush spray  tan will look great and not look fake! He is very knowledgeable  and his friendly outgoing personality  will automatically  make you feel at ease and I promise you will  leave feeling like you have known  him forever!

name: Randy Montz
text: Always great to be here! Best staff and owners. Rick, Amy and the rest of the crew are always smiling and ready to serve!

name: Amy Knudsen
text: Olivia's has fabulous services such as nails, pedicures, massage, hair cuts & color with specialty services. You will not find a nicer more professional salon.  Their training & knowledge is superior & hard to find.

name: Madison Musgrave
text: First time going to this place and it is absolutely great! The staff is amazing. Jordin did such a great job on my hair. I would definitely give this place a 10/10.

resp.text: Thank you! So glad you came to see us.

name: alabama hashdog
text: Awesome spot for a massage, my wife and I did a couples massage and really got great service, and the staff are real friendly folks.

name: Cortney Powell
text: My stylist, Beth, was amazing and fit me in last minute.

name: Nicole Griffin
text: Love this salon!

name: Shellee Smith
text: Politeness, Cleanisess, Customer service, just delightful! Rick does amazing nails, Jordin does  amazing hair! LOVE those guys

name: Victoria Pope
text: Jordin is amazing. Very talented and makes it a fun experience!

name: Cat Honeycutt
text:
I got a same-day appointment in from out of town. The facility seemed like there was a lot of DIY work for upkeep - thick paint on cabinet doors so you could see the brush strokes, tiles with messy grout that looked dirty (and probably would no matter how you scrubbed), several different flooring styles as you walked through, visible command hooks used for hanging pictures. Finer finishes that made the salon look like it needed attention.

The haircut however was great. We had a consult where my stylist Tammy asked about my preferences, lifestyle, and schedule to make sure she could suggest appropriate styles that would look good at home. She was careful and thorough, and friendly but not overly talkative.

I will say, the services tab on google is not accurate for pricing, as a cut and style was more than listed on here. Still, it was a good service and I am satisfied with my results.

name: C Burgess
text: Heather is fabulous

name: Abigail Hipps
text: Jordin is amazing! I recommend him to everyone. I have a great experience every time.

name: Kay Adams
text: Jordan is always professional and does the best job with our hair.  He has us looking great and on our way quickly!

name: Carolyn Beck
text: Great hair color and a great cut! What more could I want!

name: Allison Jenkins
text: Awesome masseuse, with massage personalized and delivered just where you need it. Thank you Amy!

name: Marilyn Wright
text: Heather at Olivia's can work magic with your hair and make you feel special!

name: Mo Du
text:
Be ready for a lengthy review:
I was looking for a nail salon to become my regular spot.  Unfortunately, Olivia A. Salon is not the place for me.  I went in for an acrylic fill with gel on top and while everyone was friendly  I left unhappy with my nails.   The result was chunky, overly thick, and uneven.  It looked worse than press on nails glued and painted by a child.  The nail technician did NOT use a drimmel or motorized file but used a foam hand file to take off my existing and layer of acrylic.
At first this seemed nice but I was mistaken.  She was unable to file the smaller sectional of my nail bed and ended up filing skin which hurt.  My nails were embarrassing to look at as they appeared malformed and lumpy.  When she applied the gel she used 3 very thick coats of color that didn't dry under the light and were soft to the touch.  To be fair, I'm picky with my nails and when I saw the manicure going south I didn't say anything.  I should have.  Instead I left and went straight to another nail salon.  At the next salon they showed my Quasi-Modo nails around and laughed.
The salon itself is easy enough to find but the level of aesthetics is less than what I like.  They clearly want to be a high end salon but the quality is not quite there.  In addition, the prices were NOT worth it!  They charged $10 over what any other salon does.  The people were nice and they fit me in.  And I want to make it clear, I did not say anything to the lady.  But I'm not sure that she would have been able to fix them even if I had.

name: Kamaile Long
text: Went in for a haircut with Tammy and she did a great job. Very friendly and gave me the cut and style I wanted. Love it!

name: Devin Mendoza
text: Jordin Putnam is the absolute best , my faded hair style looked amazing for my quarterly  meeting in the Capitol .

name: Angela B
text: Had a very good hairdresser. Great job on my hair!

name: Amanda Taylor
text: Nicole gives the best hair cuts and is excellent with highlights. I highly recommend her!

name: Crystal Johnson
text: It looks cute on the outside and even in the front reception area but the rest of the place isn't well kept. I was receiving highlights and the cape the hairdresser put on me was filthy. I kept getting someone's cut hair on me and she hadn't started my hair yet. She was professional and very nice though. I only did a partial highlight and a trim which looked good blown out in her mirror. Then I got to my car and noticed that part of my eyebrow was bleached! She didn't use foils but some kind of paper and apparently when it was sitting on the front of my face it bleached through. Then the shampoo bowl had someone else's hair color left on the neck part of the bowl. Now that I have my hair pulled back I have parts that look like cheetah spots. I spent $150 for this! I will not go back or recommend this place to anyone.

name: Pam Lowe
text: I love Heather, she is talented and professional. I always walk out feeling beautiful.

name: Kelly Porter
text: Nice staff.  Great color and cut.  Ask for Tammie Bacon.

name: Rose Pendleton
text: Awesome and my hair is so smooth

name: Whitney Boutwell
text: Love jordan..he does a great job

name: Kim Hammonds
text: Love Heather she is the best so sweet

name: Mohamed Morshdy
text: Very bad service

name: mooon Alharbi
text: Great food

name: Lorelei Hobbie
text: Great

name: chandra mohan
text: Friendly staff

name: Angie Boatwright
text: Loved my experience here.😍 Ms. Lisa was the best! She noticed I was very nervous and did a great job easing my jitters. She talked to me through the whole process & it made the time go by so much quicker. I left with a little pep in my step.😊 Fast, friendly, & professional service 10/10 would recommend this place to anyone! Thank you Ms. Lisa.❤️

name: anna rose mabile
text: lauren is so professional and made me feel comfortable. 11/10 highly recommend! best sugaring i have ever had :)

resp.text: Thank you so much Anna for taking the time to leave such a great review!!

name: Sydney Smallwood
text: Amazing service. Lauren is the best. Been going to her for years.

name: Adrienne Barringer
text: Amazing experience and very friendly!

name: Natajah Amos
text: Used to go here all of the time but Lauren stopped being reliable. Whenever I tried to set appointments she would take over a week (or just stopped responding) to get back to me. For the years I went here, I thought it was crazy to just stop servicing me. But I plan on going to a new place and hopefully everything goes well. As for personality, Lauren was very sweet and made sure things went smoothly.

name: Jenn Anderson
text: Lauren was so personable, amazing, and accommodating! I had been looking for a new waxing place since we moved here a year ago and I'm so sad it took me this long to find this place! It was my first time sugar waxing and I loved it! For sure I will be a forever customer!

name: Jess Ask
text: Today was my first brizillian wax and I couldn’t have picked a better place. I booked Lauren and she could tell how nervous I was. She was so patient with me and encouraged me through the entire process. I was so insecure when we first started, but her kindness made me comfortable by the minute! I HIGHLY recommend this facility and I WILL be seeing Lauren in 4-6 weeks!

name: Tairian Nelson
text: Ellen is phenomenal! I started sugaring six (6) years ago only with Ellen. Never waxed before only sugared. I love it! Unfortunately, I moved to Michigan four (4) years ago and I only want to sugar. I found esthetician’s in Columbus OH, Birmingham MI, and Ann Arbor MI. No one is as amazing as Ellen. When I return home throughout the year to Montgomery AL, I book an appointment with Ellen. Ellen is the best ever!

name: Katie Jo Gossett
text: Very nice and well priced products

name: Crescent Licci
text:
IF YOU'RE LOOKING FOR A PLACE TO GET A WAX, LOOK NO FURTHER!!
I been going to Ellen for 2 years now, She is a wonderful person and does an amazing job. I would definitely recommend her.  She also has a number to text and a website if you want to make an appointment and responds quickly!

name: Shay
text: I was nervous at first, being that I am a Black woman and a plus size woman. However, when I walked in, Ms. Ellen made me feel so comfortable! She so kind and professional. Lauren is great, too! These are my go-to girls for all my sugaring needs. Lauren saved my life with a last minute service. They're great people and I wouldn't go anywhere else.

name: Cindy Howard
text: Jennifer Lambert is amazing! She was very helpful, professional, and did a fabulous job! I love the way my eyelashes look now, they went from barely there to luscious, I never want to be without extensions again. I would give her more than five stars if that was an option. LOVED HER!

name: Vernon Blake
text:
Love your new office!

Easy to find and access, plenty of free parking, nice waiting room, and very clean bathroom. Treatment room is clean, uncluttered, organized, private, and comfortable.

For anyone feeling a bit uncomfortable about any of the procedures or her facility, Ellen is very professional, has an excellent bedside manner, and will put your mind at ease.

Her expertise, experience, and passion for what she does is second-to-none!

resp.text: Thanks Vernon!! Everyone Loves my new location! Thanks you for your referral too!

name: Shelley Belly
text:
Thanks for the great Body Sugaring job you did, Ellen. I was a little nervous getting it ALL done but you really made me feel comfortable & I didn't feel nervous or embarrassed!  You are SO easy to talk to. Thanks for answering my million questions about hair removal. ;-).

PS:  your rooms are magnificent!  I felt like I was in a luxury spa (& I've been to a few!). I'll see you again soon. I have already recommended you to all my friends.

Thanks again - so much!

resp.text:
Hello Shelley!

Thank you for taking the time to visit my Google+ page and to leave this wonderful review.

I really enjoyed chatting with you - you were a lot of fun - and I appreciated all the questions you asked.

Intimate hair removal can be daunting for some, I know, so I'm glad that I put you at ease and that you felt comfortable, and are returning to continue with the process of hair removal.

I decorated my rooms myself, so thank you for the compliment!  I, like you, place hygiene and sanitation and cleanliness at the top of my list in my business.

I look forward to seeing you again soon.

Regards
Ellen

name: Lana Grier
text: I was c onfused regarding the various types of professional hair removal techniques. Ellen explained the differences between Electrolysis and Laser hair removal, as well as the advantages of Sugaring over traditional waxing. She was knowledgeable, friendly and patient, answering all of my questions so I could make an informed decision. Very much appreciated!

resp.text: Hi Lana, thank you for the kind review! I never get tired of discussing hair removal techniques. An educated client makes the best customer... it's a win-win! You're not alone regarding your confusion about electrolysis and laser hair removal treatments. I think most people are unaware they are two entirely different technologies, and one is MUCH better than the other... and yes... ELECTROLYSIS is the winner!!!

name: Taneshia Phomsavanh
text: Went here before and recieved amazing service.  Recently tried to book appt. And no one answered or called me back.  Maybe she went out of business.  Idk.

name: Taylor Reece
text: Thanks Ellen for the electrolysis you did on my neck and face. I highly recommend you to anyone. Love not having to shave my 5 o'clock shading constantly and no more razor burn.

resp.text:
Thank you, Taylor, for giving us the opportunity to assist you.  As you know, Electrolysis is the only FDA approved method of Permanent Hair Removal, and we thrilled that you're so pleased with the results.  Thank you, also, for taking the time to share your experience with others so that they too may benefit from professional hair removal.

Hide that razor!  :-)

name: Kimberly Holley
text: I can't rave enough about Lauren!  Super friendly...and super attentive!  I called last minute and she was able to work with my schedule -  although I am not a fan of the "pay by time"...because some people legs are longer than others...whenever I am in town I WILL ALWAYS run to Lauren!  BTW: Ellen is amazing too for electrolysis and sugaring for WOC! Dont say I didn't tell you...

name: Ginger Gams
text: This is the sugarwaxing Queen. I love Ellen. My husband calls her my Sugarmomma.

name: Lynn Daley
text: ""I thoroughly enjoy your hair removal articles about body sugaring and electrolysis. Also, I am now able to make an informed decision when choosing a permanent hair removal method. I look forward to visiting your new salon in Montgomery!"

resp.text:
Hi Lynn

I appreciate that you are visiting my Google+ page and reading my articles.  It's important to understand the types of hair removal methods offered and what they entail.

I look forward to hearing from you soon!

Ellen Dutton

name: Ellen D
text:
Thanks Vernon!!  Everyone Loves my new location!
Thanks you for your referral too!

resp.text: Hi Vernon, Thanks again for sending business our way... we're always happy to receive new clients and make new friends. I've been providing hair removal services in Montgomery for over 10 years now and it never gets old... :-)

name: Tricia Curry
text: Jessica is awesome. She made me feel so toally comfortable in what could have been a awkward situation.

name: Ayana Bell
text: No one answers the phone, I couldn’t even set up an appointment, went to their location and no one answered the door.

name: Destiny Caldwell
text: Great service.

name: Rebecca Brown
text: Called 4 times and left a message once. No one answered and no one called back. Gave them over a week to return my voice mail and nothing.

name: Sara Beasley
text: Lauren was awesome!!

name: Deb Bowers
text: Finally,  I found a great nail salon in Madison! I have real nails and am very picky with who and how my nails are done..  Nina does a wonderful job!  Staff is pleasant and well organized.  Great service at a great price.

resp.text: Thank you.

name: #P3tti3 N3ss
text: It was really quiet nail tech don’t really talk much but I was really comfortable and love the vibe credit card machine was not working had to leave my ID to go to ATM because they did not have any other way to take my payment also I love my tech he was perfect for my pedi  I just didnt like I didn’t have a square toe nail  but I will let it grow out for next time but my ladie tech was ready good with my nails

resp.text: Thank you.

name: ciara colbert
text: They always do an amazing job and they are very professional. They never have a problem fixing anything and they are so kind, I definitely recommend them.

name: Jai Neely
text: Friendly, courteous, and precise. My nail tech James was fabulous! Kind of quiet but he is a perfectionist. My toes and nails look splendid! Establishment was clean and extra safety measures taken for COVID-19.

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Cathy Sumner
text: I'm so glad I found this place! The ladies were so nice! My 4 year old daughter has had her nails and toes painted, but this was her first experience in a chair! She was a little nervous and scared, but the ladies couldn't have been nicer! They were so patient and tried very hard to make her comfortable. I appreciate their effort and the wonder job they did on our nails!

resp.text: Thank you Cathy.

name: Jill Bean
text: The best nail salon in town. I’ve gone other places and had nails break or bumpy nails. Beyond nail salon always does qualify work and they have the best prices.

name: Chantrea Sanford
text: I have been going to Beyond Nail Spa for about a year now and always have a good experience! I have had many different technicians there and they are all great, but I had my nails done by Kym the other day and she is by far the best! Extremely happy with my dip nails :)

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Holly Hopkins
text: My dip manicure was beautiful. My pedicure left my feet and heels were just as dry and calloused as when I arrived. I had never had a pedicure there and was very unimpressed. I will admit my gel toenails do look nice.

resp.text: Thank you Holly.

name: Shermayne Graham
text: Quick, friendly, not over price, clean and professional not to mention awesome nails and toes.

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Desi Finneyfrock
text: I went here because of all the amazing reviews but it was not a great experience. I showed her exactly what I wanted and she did ok. She hurried through the process and put white instead of the color I wanted, so she had to fix that. My polish didnt dry properly so there are dips, my thumbnail is crooked and she didn't bring over the acrylic nail over all the way but not too noticeable. My nails looked like it had chiclets placed on them. Honestly even though i had an appointment, felt like I was somehow a bother.  I personally won't be coming back to get my nails done.

name: Deanna Poignant
text: Very good experience! I had an appointment and I didn't have to wait to be seen. Pleasant atmosphere, very relaxing vibes, and my nails turned out exactly how I wanted. I would definitely come here again!

resp.text: Thank you Deanna.

name: Uzi Bahar
text: Came here with my daughter. It felt like they are trying to let us go fast. This is my first time here and I picked the $35 package. We were done in 15 minutes compared to other places where you get around 30 minutes. The staff were nice but I am not planning to come back.

resp.text: Hi Uzi, I am terribly sorry you and your daughter a bad experience. We never want our customers to be unhappy. Again, Please let me know if I can do anything further to help. Joe

name: Thankful & Blessed
text:
I’m very impressed with the excellent service that I received from Kim! They are all so nice and professional! I l felt extremely happy when I saw how nice my nails turned out, as this is my first time ever trying color tips, with a French manicure! I do recommend this place! I transitioned to Beyond Nail & Spa after leaving from a previous nail salon, in late 2019, that had terrible customer service!

At Beyond Nail & Spa, they provide quality work! I was so happy that I asked Kim to take a picture of my nails so that I could share her EXCELLENT work, this review! Take a look at these pictures for your self! My nails used to be in terrible shape but they have grown and these are my real nails! Come to this place, you won’t be disappointed! I drive all the way from South huntsville just to come here! Thank you Kim, I can’t wait to show off my nails! Kim and the whole staff are AMAZING!!!

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Whitney Martin
text: Very clean salon with friendly service. My nails looked perfect!

resp.text: Thank you Whitney.

name: Jill Hubbard
text: Always love my nails from this salon. Nice, efficient, and great quality nails!

resp.text: Thank you Jill.

name: Kaitlyn Harris
text: They are amazing at what they do and the prices are extremely reasonable.

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Tracy Millar
text: They are very friendly and professional. I was very happy. They have the dip powder and they do a fantastic job with it! Definitely recommend!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Samantha A
text: I visited yesterday for the first time. Although others came in after me and were serviced immediately, I had about a 15 minute wait. The nail tech started on my gel full set and I asked her "how long do my nails have to be to do the dipped nails?" She replied 40$.. so I re asked " Do my natural nails have to be long to get the dipped nails" she once again said 40$. Later, I was trying to make conversation and asked her if they were usually busy. All she did was laugh,  So by this time I realized she couldn't understand anything I was saying.  She was very rough on my nails. My cuticles are still bright red and I have a cut on my right pinky finger.  After my nails were done, I went to the front desk and told them I want my eyebrows waxed. They same nail Tech that did my nails also is the one that did my eyebrows. When she 1st put the wax on it was so hot I had to move my face away.  Even after she was done I still had to go home and pluck my eyebrows a bit. I will not return.

name: Haegi Oh
text: I have been here 3 times and their service is great for their price. They're quick and the gel mani I received lasted for 3 weeks without chipping. Prices are the best for this area!

resp.text: Thank you.

name: kayla P (kayPontheBEAT)
text: 10/10 would NOT recommend.

name: Abigail Ritch
text: I am giving this review for a couple reasons, but mainly to save you some time and pick another place. First, just like everyone else, I didn’t get my nails done for months due to Covid. I was so excited to finally get to go and treat myself! However, that was quickly ruined thanks to the staff. They acted like they didn’t want to be there. They charge you the same price for not even half the service or experience. Second, I haven’t even had these nails for a week and the side are coming up! I can’t even wash my hair without catching it on the ends. I get it, it’s very scary times. However, you are a place of service, don’t forget that! If you don’t want to be open... well then don’t be open.

resp.text: Hi Abigail, I am terribly sorry you had a bad experience. I was not there that day and so can you please tell me who did your service that day so I can talk to and make thing better. We never want our customers to be unhappy. Again, Please let me know if I can do anything further to help. Joe

name: Megan H
text: I love this salon!  They are friendly and do great work!  Seeing that the staff are taking all the COVID precautions made me feel at ease.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Cassie Hill
text: My mom and I drove over an hour to get our nails done and we were both very impressed! It was very busy but we were offered bottled water and the male employee continued to make us feel welcome and keep us posted on when it would be our turn. They have a 100 health score and are friendly and efficient!! I got the dip nails (no acrylic).

resp.text: Thanks Cassie for the feedback. You can book appointment via our FB or Google page prior to the visit so you don’t have to wait long. Thanks and Happy New Year.

name: Shandie Tucker
text: I want to say that I have been going to this nail shop for at least the past year and half. Everyone is super friendly. They do an excellent, consistent job on my nails. I usually get a pedicure and a manicure (I do not get artificial nails). I have been getting my nails done since I was very young and they truly do an excellent job. They also have a military discount if you are looking for one.

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Lyann Goncalves
text: They take appointments but never hold to them so don't even bother. I've been here several times and they don't really seem to care to attempt to know you or recognize you when you come on a regular basis. Came here with a friend cause it's close to her house, both of us had appointments and I have been waiting over 30 mins cause what I wanted only 2 people can do. Didn't ask if I wanted something else or if I wanted to wait they just assumed. She's basically done and it's not worth making her wait cause then we would be here for almost 2 hours. Go when you have time to kill.

resp.text: Hi Lyann, I am terribly sorry you did not get the service that you come for. We never want our customers to be unhappy. Again, Please let me know if I can do anything further to help. Joe

name: Courtney Clarke
text: First time there and I absolutely loved it, my nails look perfect. By far the best place I’ve ever been.

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Ivy
text: Very family friendly place. Quick walk in service. Got our kids toes done plus mine and a wax. Very fast and efficient. Definitely recommend if your short on time!

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Christine West
text: I have been coming to this nail salon for almost four months now and I always have a wonderful and relaxing experience here.  The owners and their staff are always polite, courteous and very professional. They go out of their way to make sure you are happy and satisfied with their services. I have recommended others to this nail salon and they too have enjoyed their experience.

resp.text: Thanks Christine!

name: Jessica Uribe
text: I had an appointment made for right when the Salon opened for acrylics and it took about 45 minutes for them to get to me. The nails were alright but started to lift off my nail in about a week. I would go back to try something different just probably not for acrylics.

resp.text: Thanks for the feedback Jessica. Try our SNS dipping powder next time. It is one of best products we have in house.

name: Deborah Henry
text: Visiting from California - stopped in for a quick pedicure. What a treat! Loved the service and attention to detail!

resp.text: Thanks Deborah. Hope you and your friend have a great time in Hunt/Madison.

name: Latasha Leonard
text: As far as getting just plain ole acrylics this place does a really good job. But if you are wanting something a little more advanced that requires a design on the nail do not go here. All I wanted was a couple dots and they couldn't even do that correctly. But again great place to go for simple one color nails.

resp.text: Hi Latasha, we are sorry that you did not happy with the service. Usually, it is hard to do the same nails art design of other shop but we try our best to accommodate that. Thank you.

name: Kelly
text: Started making this my regular go to nail salon for my gel manicure. It's the best in the area. Very peaceful atmosphere and friendly staff.

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Adrienne St Clair
text: FINALLY found my nail salon since moving to the area. It took 3 different shops to find this one. I love how I can schedule online and I always have a quick response and confirmation. They work work fast and precise which is a bonus for me. I’m a routine SNS client and they last 2.5 weeks.

resp.text: Thank you for your review Adrienne!

name: DarlingDeAlisa
text: The both staff and the atmosphere at Beyond Nail Spa are amazing! Truly great individuals that take pride in what they do and pride in quality customer service!

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Shelley Cox
text: Always a great experience!

resp.text: Thank you Shelley.

name: Henry Rodriguez-Gonzalez
text: Really awesome place, so welcoming and friendly here. People are so nice and willing to give you the best customer service as possible. Highly suggest to go get their mani and pedi there all the time

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Maranatha Hill
text: I love going there! Every time I get excellent service! I don't mind spending my money there!

resp.text: Thank you Maranatha for your business.

name: JessaB
text: Busy so be ready to wait. Totally worth it!

resp.text: Thank you.

name: WannaWaveTV
text: This is one of the best nail salons in Madison. The staff are always considerate and they do great work. I drive from Decatur just to get my nails done from here!

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Rhonda Atkinson
text: Excellent service! Health score 100. Very friendly staff. Great work at reasonable prices!

resp.text: Thank you Rhonda for your feedback.

name: Maria Nolen
text: They are very professional and clean

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Jc
text: Wife really liked this place. Staff was friendly and did a great job on her nails.

resp.text: Thank you Jc.

name: Tiffany Cope
text: First time here, will definitely be back. They did a great job!

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Tarah Shenay
text: This place makes your nails look pretty but I've never had to go to a place as often as i have here on just nail repair. I've had to get at least 3 nails repaired for one acrylic full set. I figured I got them too long. Now I have a second shorter set and one has already cracked. it's only been a week. Not sure I can keep paying money or sit so many times for these recurring problems.

name: M&L Treasures
text: Beware! I like going here to get my nails done BUT be careful to check expiration dates on gift certificates your money pays upfront for. My children bought a gift certificate for me for Mother's Day 2018. I went in for SNS nails a few days ago, tried to use the certificate (prepaid, given as a gift), Beyond Nails would not honor it because it expired 12 days prior to my appointment. As a result, $22 was lost on a prepaid gift certificate (money paid upfront). Expiration dates should not be placed on certificates you pay for, this doesn't make sense. That's why I gave 3 stars, bad policy.

name: Heidi Casteel
text: They did a really good job. The lady who did my nails fixed up my nails for me and I will continue to go here from now on.

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Ana Kozlowski
text: Perfect nails from a great place.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Jodi Johnson
text: I am here in Alabama on business and I Google some nail spas for this area, I seen great reviews at Beyond Nail Spa and decided to try them. Immediately upon arrival I was greeted with no wait. The environment was so relaxing and peaceful. Kim was an excited nail tech. She explained to me everything she was doing to my nails. I enjoyed my experience at Beyond Nail Spa and will definitely come back when in the area.

resp.text: Thank you Jodi. Hope you had a great business trip and looking forward to see you again when you are in town.

name: Janelle McCann
text: Long wait, and once we were seated for our pedicures, it took them another 10 minutes just to turn on the water to soak our feet. The lady doing my friend's pedicure couldn't understand us, or chose to ignore us, but the guy doing mine was friendlier. Clean facility, and our nails turned out well, but customer service could be better. Probably won't be back.

name: Denice Middleton Rice
text: The service was good. But there is a sign on the door which states 10% off for Military , but when you go to ost and show your Military ID, they show you a sin inside which states Active duty only. The sign should be taken off the door, or specify Active Duty only.

resp.text: Thank you.

name: K Staten
text: Love this place!

resp.text: Thank you K.

name: Julianne Lindsey
text: New favorite nail salon! So sweet and truly did an amazing job. :)

resp.text: Thanks Julianne!

name: Abigail Scott
text: Absolutely amazing service! I came in for acrylics after having a “meh” experience at Kim’s down the road. I showed them a picture on Instagram of what I wanted and they went above and beyond! I know it’s more difficult working with short natural nails, but I was very pleased with the effort they put in to make sure they were near perfect. They also included a hand massage! I was kind of shocked bc at the other place I went they didn’t file and refile to ensure the shape was what I wanted and that the nails looked clean. My fiancé was with me and he received a pedicure, and his opinion is the same. Best place I’ve been to so far. I paid more than I had before but it was honestly worth every penny. Would recommend 10/10

resp.text: Thank you.

name: ml ml
text: Beyond Nails is such a great nail salon to go to for several reasons. First, the atmosphere is very calm and relaxing. I typically go during the day when it is not crowded. I usually do not have to wait very long. I went on a Friday afternoon when a wedding party was present. I had to wait for an hour. The wait was not an issue at all, because I was able to read or surf the web. Even with the wedding party, it was still a relaxing and calm environment. Secondly, the salon is very clean and spacious. Thirdly, the customer service is great. Kim and the other staff members are very friendly and chatty. Finally, they do such a great job on my nails. I am always presently surprised. I have had my nails done by Li, Kim, and Mia. I will return to this nail spa for future nail appointments and will recommend it to friends, family members, and co-workers.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback and happy to provide you service.

name: Allison V
text: Beyond Nail Spa is by far the best nail place I have been to in Madison, AL. The entire staff is amazing and talented. They make sure to go above and beyond to take care of every client's needs. On top of that, they do a great job of keeping the place clean and all the tools sterilized (which is a must!). Also, you will not break the bank, they are competitively priced. I love going to Beyond Nail Spa because I know my nails are going to look incredible! I have never had a bad experience there, I have been going once a week for 3 months and will continue to do so.

resp.text: Thank you Allison for a beautiful review. We are very happy to serve you!!!

name: Theodore Church-Reeves
text: Great service and prompt as well. Was able to go in for a quick manicure on my lunch break. Affordable too.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback!

name: Cassie Reid
text: Very clean facility. I've gone in on different days and times, and they usually are pretty busy. They do nice work. The main reason I gave 3 stars is because everytime I go in for a basic manicure, I get asked if I want gel or acrylic nails done. As soon as I tell them "No thank you, just a basic manicure" I have to spend the rest of the time listening to the nail tech asking why I don't want gel or acrylic.  I just want to go relax while getting my nails done, not be hounded to spend more money on a service I don't  want.

resp.text: Hi Cassie, we sorry for what happened. In order for us to improve our service we would like to know which staff did this so we can address the issue so it wont happen again. Our policy is fully respect client decision when they come to the shop and do not pressure or talk client into service that they don't want. Our shop is located on 97 Hughes rd, Madison and in the past customer thought we are Nails Beyond at 2590 Sparkman Dr, Huntsville. Thank you for sharing your experience. Joe Mai

name: Jim Terry
text: Pretty decent place. I go every year with my wife every year. Clean and reasonable.

resp.text: Thanks Jim.

name: Lourdes Roman
text: Highly Skilled, expert level technicians, extremely clean, amazing service and great atmosphere!  I found a picture online of a custom nail design and showed it to them and they did exactly what was on the picture I brought if not better! I am extremely pleased and impressed with the technician's acrylic design skills. She pays close attention to detail and makes sure you get exactly what you wanted. The staff is very friendly and accommodating. If you are tired of going from nail salon to nail salon looking for the right one, search no more, Beyond Nails Spa will be your last stop.

resp.text: Thank you Lourdes for sharing your experience!

name: Catherine Woods
text: Wonderful attention to detail. Great colors and service. Best nail salon I have been to. Very clean. Relaxing.

resp.text: Thank you for your review Catherine.

name: Chelseay Blades
text: I absolutely love every experience I've ever had at Beyond Nail Spa! I always feel very welcome, comfortable, and well taken care of. I won't go to any other nail spot in town and would recommend Beyond Nail Spa to everyone I know. They exceed my expectations consistently on customer care/service, sanitation/cleanliness, and quality results.

resp.text: Thank you Chelseay for sharing your experience.

name: Christine Nguyen
text: I've been coming here regularly for over 6 months - they are excellent. Clean store, lots of color options, excellent service, fantastic employees. Would highly recommend to anyone.

resp.text: Thanks Christine for your nice review!

name: Tree Flan
text:
Clean salon, very friendly staff😊
The latest service was not so good.  The tech did a speed job on me and my nail polish is already peeling off.  Not happy.

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Robin Stilwell
text: The cleanliness, calmness, attention to detail on each individual, the friendliness, and the knowledge of their craft is just a few of the assets we experienced. This was an excellent experience for my mom and I, and we have definitely found our nail spa. I recommend this spa to everyone. Thank you Kim and Joe for the best experience we've encountered here.  You strive for excellence. We'll be back!

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your review and recommending to other customers.

name: kheidenreich13
text: Great salon. I walked in on Saturday morning and they took me right away. I got a gel french manicure and with every step the tech checked to make sure everything looked ok to me. Salon was very clean and they have individual tools that are sterilized and in closed packages for each person. To get an idea on pricing a french gel manicure was $35. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your nice review.

name: Shilana Mcdaniel
text: Impressed! I've been going to the same nail tech for years but had to switch due to wait time and customer service. I found Beyond Nail Spa and they are great. The whole staff was patient and friendly! Kim did a great job on my nails. I will definitely come back, just booked my next appt. Also.......I went in an 4:35 and was out by 6--Full set and pedicure! A+

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback and we are happy to provide you service.

name: Kamala S
text:
I work in a warehouse type of environment and I love seeing Kym and her staff bring back my femininity after a couple of tough weeks.
Anything you wish for, can dream up, want to copy.. they can recreate.
Friendly, Professional, and Clean!
Plus a wonderful hand massage and rewarding punch card. I highly recommend you make an appointment to spoil yourself. I won't go anywhere else!

resp.text: Thank you so much Kamala for your kind words.

name: Delaina Foust
text: My favorite place to go. Kim & her staff are always great at taking care of everyone and creating the best relaxing experience at a very reasonable price. I love the rewards program they have in place. They have a loyal customer in me!

resp.text: Thank you Delaina.

name: kathryn witek
text: Great staff. Prices are comparable to other salons in the area. They do excellent work.

resp.text: Thank you Kathryn for your feedback!

name: Katrina Baecker
text: Awesome service and very competent nail techs. Friendly staff, no wait time. This will be my salon!! :-)

resp.text: Thank you Katrina for sharing your experience! We are appreciated your business.

name: Linda Elkins-Herring
text: Although it was an expensive day, what with dip nails, pedis, and eyebrows for my dauughter and me, we both got exactly what we needed and wanted. I got good guidance on my sad fingernails, and how best to help them, friendly and polite services. We will be back!

resp.text: Thank you

name: Jennifer Laxson
text: They did not clean under our nails, rushed us to pick colors, shortest, fastest hand massage ever, never offered any nail design, uneven, lumpy nails, and to top it all off, my daughter asked for a full set of acrylics and they chopped off her beautiful, long nails and added no tips, just the powder and charged me for a "full set" of acrylics. The lady in charge said it was a misunderstanding and offered a $20 Gift Card, but it doesn't help the bad experience we had. We will not be back and just offer the gift certificate to someone else.

resp.text: We're sorry to hear this was your experience. Jennifer, as you know no nail salon around here that offer any hand massage for full-set or Dip powder full-set services. We are the only nail salon that offer this Extra services. And If you are a regular nail client you should know about this different. About your daughter experience, she has no idea or clue of what she want or about nails. She can stop the staff that doing her nail at anytime during the process and request what she wants for nails. We have professional staff and they do a good job. Clients are very happy and appreciated our services. Again, we are sorry that you did not enjoyed your visit. Please give me a call at 256-325-3203 if you have any other concerns. Thank you. Joe

text: This place is really modern, they have free water and a friendly check in person. I've had a hard time finding a nail tech since moving to Huntsville. I tried this place out a total of 3 times. The first time was good, but the second and third time my nail polish started chipping after 2 days. The nails were thin also. I won't let them fool me a 4th time. I took my business elsewhere and I am very happy with my current nail tech.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback and we are sorry for what happened with your nails. You are the first client that had this kind of problem and we are aware of that. We will take a look at it and make correction if we see anything is wrong in our process.  Thank you.

name: Kesha Audacity
text: They staff  were very nice! However, I received French pedicure and the polish did not last but two days which was a disappointment.  I went back so they could fix it, and they fixed it by just pactching it up instead of actually removing the polish and starting over! As result of that the polish just chipped off again the very next day!!! I'm use to my polish lasting at least two or three weeks!!

resp.text: Thank you Kesha for coming to our salon last week for pedicure and we are very sorry for what happened. As you know that regular polish need a longer time to dry ("cure") before you can put the shoes back on.  That is why most clients bring their own flip flop sandals, or we offer our disposable flip flop slippers when come for pedicure.  When you came back, we looked at the messed up toe and decide the best way to do is to remove part of messed up polish and applied new polish in that area only because it needed to match the rest of the toe nails.  We fixed that messed up toe nail, and we applied a new top coat for all your toe nails to make your toe nails look fresh and pretty.  We chatted with you and we were so glad you were happy when you left our shop.  As you know we take our work and reputation very seriously and are happy to fix an issue if a client has problem with their toe or nails. Thank you so much for your honest feedback and giving us the opportunity to make it 'all better'.  We hope you take a moment to revise your review to show that we were happy to fix the problem and make you a happy client.  Thank you and we hope to see you soon.  The Beyond Nail Spa Team.

resp.text: Thank you Catherine for your feedback. Lee was working for Summit Nails in Huntsville for 5 years prior she joins  us two months ago and clients were very pleased with her works. name: Marina Didyk
text: Five of us made an appointment for meni/pedi, we were running late 8 minutes, and informed the salon of this. Upon arrival we were greeted but were not informed of the wait time. Half an hour later, the salon employees were all still working with customers and we were not given updates. We informed the lady that greeted us but she did not appear apologetic. Unfortunately, this was unacceptable as the appointment was  made for a wedding. Customer service should have been better.

resp.text: Hi Marina, We are sorry that we could not provide the service for your group that day. As you know we are taking both appointment and walk-in clients and we are trying our best to preserve the right for appointment clients first. If the appointment does not show up in time then we have to give that right to the walk-ins clients who are already in the shop. In your case, you made appointment for 5 people and we cannot let our staff wait for your group to come while other clients were waiting for service. When you called I told you that you have to wait because you were late for your appointment. I hope you understand the business running process. Thank you.

text: I visited this shop for the first time because I was looking for a shop that does SNS Nails.  I loved the quality of work done but not the end result.  They take great care of your skin and ensure a great  experience,  but I didn't like how thick my SNS Nails were or how the filing was done.

resp.text: I apologized that you did not like your nails and that is not a problem. You can always asked whoever do your nails to make them thinner but it does not last as good as when we have to use  a sheer layer to protect them. To make the nails thinner the way you want, it is easy for us to do but we can't guarantee the quality of it. You can come back and we can make it thinner for you. Thank you.

name: Natalie Báez lópez
text: Great customer service!

resp.text: Hi Natalie, we are so sorry for your bad experience. if you don’t mind to come in and we are happy to redo it for free of charge. Thank you.

name: Katie Schmidt
text: The absolute best in HSV!

resp.text: Thanks Katie.

name: Sylyndar Owens
text:
After waiting for about 30-45 min I was told to sit in the chair for a pedicure . The guy didn’t run any water or anything. He then begins to work on two people that came in AFTER me. So I asked can I at least soak? And he says “in a min” and continues to work on the person that came in AFTER me. I walked out and went right around the corner to another salon where I was immediately told to sit in a pedicure chair WITH WATER! I will never try this salon again. And please don’t comment saying that they had an appointment. One lady admitted she was extremely LATE for her appointment therefore her appointment should have been void and the other lady said she couldn’t get anyone to answer the phone in order for her to make an appointment so she decided to “pop in.” She “popped in” after me and was serviced BEFORE me just because she was a regular I guess.

RESPONSE TO OWNER - First of all I don't care about people in the shop shaking their heads. Those people shaking their heads probably didn't know that you just skipped over me!! I was there waaaaay before the clients that you started working on. You said you were letting them soak and was getting them ready for your staff huh? Well why didn't you start my water to get me "ready for your staff " BEFORE the people that came in AFTER me (Answer because you intentionally skipped over me because they were regulars) They probably didn't know that when you told me to sit down in the chair you didn't bother to give me a menu or anything! They probably didn't know that you clearly treat your regular customers waaaaay better than new customers. Your conversation was so dry with me but as soon as one of your regulars entered they got waaaaay better treatment (FYI you need to watch how you do that because you never know..a NEW customer could be trying to become a REGULAR. ) I didn't misunderstand a thing. I was in that chair for more than 5 min so stop with the BS. Once again no thanks to the offer for being a client. I will spend my money at a shop where I am treated fairly.  Have a nice day!!!

resp.text: Sylyndar, We are disappointed to learn of this situation you have described. We always want to deliver a five-star experience for our customers. You misunderstood why I worked on clients that came after you, I was only help them to soak off their SNS nails to get ready for my staff. But I already had you sit on spa chair before I worked on other client and I told you that you will get the service next from one of our staff. You sat on pedicure chair not even 5 minutes and you asked for water to soak your feet and I asked you nicely to give me a few minutes because I was working on a client to wrap her nails. You immediately got up and left and your action made everyone in the shop wonder and shake their head. We would love to have you as our client but we also want to provide service to client who appreciated our service and to be serve. Thank you. Joe

name: theresa B
text: Went here for the first time because they had the highest stars out and most reviews on Google. Im happy we ended up here. I rarely get my nails done so I had no clue where to go. Any way, my husband and I went together. He wanted a manicure and 2 acrylic nails put on. He's a guitar player and has heard of many great players doing this so it's something he wanted to try out. I think there was some confusion at first because I had scheduled for 2 manicures but when we got there they were setting up the pedicure stations. Like I said I've gotten my nails done maybe 5 times in my life and most or those times were when I was very young, in ohio, with my mom, at a place where cosmology students did it. So I thought maybe a foot soak was part of the pampering. Im happy we ended up doing the pedicures though! My feet look great and my husband was a riot. He was laughing so hard while they messed with his feet that he had everyone else laughing too. They did a great job on hands and feet and the staff was very kind. We were in and out pretty quickly too which was great because I had to get to work. (Took almost an hour to have mani-pedi) cost for both services was $40/person plus a little extra for his acrylic nails, plus we tipped each girl $10.  If I had known I was doing a pedicure I would have picked a different nail color. The one I picked for my hands was very boring because we aren't supposed to wear fun nail colors at work but I love having bright colors on my toes. It makes them look so cute! That's my own fault for not speaking up though. There is a slight language barrier with a couple of the girls but in the end they figure it out. We had fun there and would go back for sure.

resp.text: Thank you for a great review! We glad you and your husband had a great time.

name: Serenity Gryzik
text: The people were very nice

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Sophia Carter-Ingram
text: Excellent service, clean establishment, patient and all around wonderful staff.

text: They take their time and are great at what they do.
