text: Top notch massage!!! This salon knows how to do the job!!! Thumbs up for a job well done Terra( sorry if I spelled it wrong). Overall this will be my spot for a relaxing professional massage.. Way to go ladies!!!

name: Amanda Sweeney
text: The staff is very friendly and it is a very clean place. However, I came in to get my eyebrows done and left VERY disappointed in the results. I had to keep myself from crying after I left. I was asked to begin with if I wanted them to be thinned or if I just wanted them cleaned up and I told her that I did not want them thin. Well, they are now extremely thin and they look terrible. I didn’t complain in person, because there was really nothing that could be done. I will definitely not be back though.

name: Abbie Lane
text: I'm  regular with Manon. She's so fast, and does a great job! I've never had a bad experience! I would not go anywhere else. Customer service is GREAT!!!!

name: Emily Daleo
text: I received a certificate for a massage for Christmas and decided to go ahead and schedule the massage. They made the appointment for 3:00 on a Friday. On Wednesday, they called to tell me that they had double booked my appointment, and ask me to come in at a different time on Friday. I was not able to come in at that time, so I had them schedule an appointment for the next Friday at 3:00. When I walked into the spa, I was told that I was not on the schedule. They don't send confirmations of your appointment, and they don't call to remind you of your appointment. Apparently, they really just have trouble booking your appointment at all. Not exactly the kind of experience I want from a spa, and I won't be trying to reschedule again.

resp.text: This was an unfortunate event that we took very seriously. We issued a complete refund of the gift certificate and offered a free 90 minute massage. All clients who are on our schedule receive either a text message or phone call the day before their appointment. We take pride in giving the very best customer service.

name: Valentina Muzaric
text: Colleen is absolutely great. She is putting a lot of thoughts in how to get desired outcome without damaging your hair. She is the one to go to. Everybody is really nice and outgoing.

name: Brandi Wilson
text: Everyone was very nice. I got a Brazilian wax and she made me feel very comfortable, with such a uncomfortable waxing. 😊

name: Alex Woods
text: love all the staff ! Everyone here is very nice , helpful , and professional . 10/10 would recommend !!!

name: Teresa Butler
text: I went to see Matt because of my neck and shoulder pain. He was able to me to be able to move my neck. I always go see him when my hip acts up. Matt is very professional and listens to your concerns. Thanks Matt for great service!

name: Elizabeth Bailey Matson
text: I went to have a trial of my hair and make up and it took 2 hrs for my hair alone and I was not happy with the outcome. I had scheduled to have my hair and make up done, but they had to rush the make up and would have cancelled the trial if I hadn't persisted that I wanted to see the whole picture before my wedding. They hadn't booked enough time from the beginning. I wanted natural looking makeup, but it is caked on and not flattering. I went here after I saw all the positive reviews, but I did not have a positive experience! I'm so glad I tried before my wedding day as the whole thing stressed me out and it's not even the big day!

resp.text: At Ambiance it's our goal to make every Bride feel and look beautiful on her wedding day! During the consultation we strive to find the best hair and make up style with the client for her Big Day. The trial run is very important to us and sometimes it takes longer than anticipated because we want the client to be happy. Therefore, we offer a second complementary trial run! We regret you were not satisfied and we hope you will come back for your complementary trial run to perfect your look.

name: Marina Schroeder
text: I went in for a wax, the facility gives an outward appearance of being very clean and calming, and the employees are all very pleasant, however they double dip the wax! By this I mean they put the same stick that they've put on your body back into the wax (which is not hot enough to kill bacteria that resides on your skin), and unless they change the wax every time a new customer comes in (unlikely, and very expensive), you're getting everyone else's microorganisms on your body, yuck! Not only is this extremely unhygienic and disgusting, it's also illegal. Will not be returning here.

resp.text: Here at Ambiance Spalon we are committed to offering you the cleanest experience in town. We sanitize every room and every utensil after every service. Double dipping is a No No! When you come to Ambiance we guarantee a safe environment for all our customers.

name: Crazy Christy
text: Very nice service very nice salon keep up the good work

name: Jasmine Williams
text: My first time ever getting a Brazilian wax this is where I decide to go; however I waited until I’d gone a few more times before writing this review. They use a special “wax” called Nufree-Finipil which you can research on your own. The facility is very relaxing & clean. Ms. Manon is EXCELLENT! She’s very friendly & will talk to you throughout the wax to keep you distracted. No bumps, no burns from the wax, & no regrowth for at least 2 weeks! Could not have asked for a better experience!!

name: david baker
text: Ive been getting my hair cut by Matthew since I was about 6 years old. Im 24 now and he's the only person I let cut my hair. My cut is called "the usual?". Hand shakes coming and going and always a smile with a good story to follow. All in all, its a quick, enjoyable and quite relaxing experience everytime I go.

name: Kassie Mink
text: Manon is absolutely wonderful!! She made waxing a relaxing and pain free experience.

name: Jade Dawson
text: Manon is the best! I was so nervous and afraid waxing was going to hurt. She put me at ease and it did not hurt at all. I highly recommend her to everyone!

name: Melissa and Steve Blackmon
text: Always the best experience with the best customer service!

name: Claude Fortin
text: Awesome organization, very well managed, very nice facility and great people, hairdressers and massage therapists.

name: Savannah Turner
text: This place is amazing! The atmosphere is always so relaxing and professional!

name: T Vines
text: The wax is painful but VERY WORTH IT! The staff is Awesome!

name: Lauren Coker
text: Ambiance is the best place to go for a one stop shop! You can get a massage, facials, waxing, a new hairstyle and a mani/pedi all in one place! I had never had a wax before in my life, and Manon was so great! I've also had my hair done by a couple of the girls in the salon and everyone is awesome! i can't wait to try out everything else Ambiance has to offer!

name: Jeff McKelvey (JMedia)
text: My daughter really likes this place. The people there are really nice and they did a great job on her make up for the prom last year.

name: Marnie Juster
text: I went to Ambiance Spalon for the first time this afternoon and had an excellent experience. I had an appointment with Manon, who was incredibly sweet and helpful! I would definitely recommend them and plan on returning!

name: Sharon Sparks
text: I made an appointment on Valentines Day, Feb 14, 2013. I had never been to Ambiance Spalon before. However, Laura Beth that is a hair & color stylist had done my hair for 8 years when I lived in Rome, Ga from 2003-2011. I was moving to Charleston, Sc and she was moving to Auburn, Al. Although I was excited to be moving to Charleston I wasn't excited about having to find a new hair stylist. Every time she would do my hair when I would get home my husband would always say your hair looks nice. When she was No longer doing my hair it looked nice but I never got the compliments that I use to get when Laura Beth was doing my hair. Every time I would go get my hair done I would think I sure wish Laura Beth was still doing my hair i missed her. My husband started looking for a new job and we found out we were moving to Newnan,Ga. I started thinking, I wonder how far she is from where I was moving to. I got on Mapquest and it was 76 miles. I didn't care, it was worth every mile I drove for her to be doing my hair again. Ambiance is a very nice place and everyone there is very friendly. I met the owners that day and they are really nice. You won't regret going to Ambiance and getting Laura Beth to do your hair. Best decision I ever made to drive 76 miles to get my hair done. Worth every mile.

name: Lisa Ballew
text: Chassity Bullard is the best hair dresser in town. I have been using her for YEARS. She's worth the 2.5 hour drive from north Alabama!! Thanks girl!! <3

name: nadia Brundage
text: Ambiance Salon is the absolute best place to go for hair, nails, and awesome body massages.

name: Melanie Mitchell
text: Very professional and clean. Monan did a great job on my waxing services!

name: Patricia Knight, LME
text: Ambiance Spalon is definitely a place to be pampered! The staff is very friendly and professional. I will definitely be going back!!!!! Thank you, Ambiance!!!

name: Bill Kazmaier
text: I got my wife a Spa Package for Valentine's day! She absolutly loved it! She enjoyed a relaxing massage and facial and loved her pedicure and manicure! Before she left the girls did her hair and make up so she felt and looked amazing on our Valentine's date! Thanks Ambiance spalon!

name: Tamara Thompson
text: The staff at Ambiance is Fabulous!!   It is very easy to schedule an appointment, the spa is relaxing and the staff is knowledgeable about the products and services offered.

name: Anne Penney
text: I love Manon!  She gives the best shellac manis and spa pedis.  So very accomodating and they always look perfect!  The first time I went I knew I had found a great "home".

name: Farren Harrelson
text: I received a gift certificate for Christmas and went for a massage and mani/pedi recently.  This was a devine experience.  The staff is so professional and caring.  I absolutely loved it!!!  I will be going back frequently.

name: Jan Griffin
text: I have been coming to Chassity for 7 years and have always leave feeling like a rockstar. I have Puerto Rican hair and very thick hard to manage hair and she always takes the time to make me beautiful! I have been to multiple salons over the years and each time I felt like my hair looked worse coming out than going in until I met her! I will follow her where ever she goes and absolutely love Ambiance Spalon. It is a great place to visit and love the staff and atmosphere. I have and always will recommend Chassity for all your haircutting, coloring and waxing needs. Ambiance also offers other services such as massage, facials, pedicures, and manicures. Making it the perfect one stop shop salon.

name: Gracie Barnes
text: This is gracie.. im chats cousin and she's been doing my hair and eyebrows forever and I'd never go anywhere else honestly she does such an amazing job!

name: Christina Knight
text: I made an appt. today and everyone was very nice!  I will be back.  Thanks!!!

name: Angie LaBerge
text:
I'm researched hair salons for a month when I moved here and decided to try Ambiance! Wow,, Colleen is amazing!! I love the care, advice and the time she gives to me & more importantly, to my hair. And before you walk out the door you'll feel like you've been her friend for years. She's an amazing stylists and has an awesome personality!!  Unless she relocates,,,Im a client 4ever!!!
I also get brazillian wax & eyebrows! Super job! Everyone is very friendly & I feel comfortable & relaxed everytime I go in for my appts.

name: Shawn Reaves
text:
WORST SPA EXPERIENCE OR LACK THEREOF THAT I HAVE EVER HAD!!!

I made an appointment for a brazilian wax Friday morning because they had a great web special going for $39, upon which I specifically asked the owner did they do guys and was it ok. The owner said not a problem and let the receptionist make the appointment for Tuesday of the following week. On Monday I get a call around noon and informed they do not do guys and that she was "sorry"....Why did she make the appointment in the first place?

Now I tried to call around Auburn but no one has any appointments open for the the next day on such short notice. Now their policy is to deduct half the price of your service if you give them less than 24 hours notice, yet what do I get when they give me less than 24 hours notice....nothing!!! The point is I counted on them to provide a service that they said they would and now Im left having to travel out of town possible to get waxed.

A word of advice to Ambiance Spalon...if your going to advertise you might want to say no guys or girls only on your ad so in the future this doesnt happen!! And how about reimbursing me for the extra money I had to pay someone else for waxing because I relied on your business.

name: ELIZABETH TUCKER
text: KELLY WALLS IS AWESOME!!! GO SEE HER

text: My daughter bought me a hundred dollar gift card for Christmas. Turns out it is only good for services. She bought me the card to be used for anything that I would like. They did not tell her that you could not purchase products. What kind of business sells gift cards and then proceeds to tell you how you can use it. No, thanks. I won’t be back.

name: Holland Jo
text:
Posting this for someone else.

Do not give these people your business. They will charge you more than advertised and their staff is incompetent. They are deceptive, purposely or not, about what they're actually doing to your hair. They won't give you the right color if you're getting it dyed. They use products that will ruin your hair. Some workers will literally rip some of your hair out trying to brush it. Just woefully incompetent and a terrible business overall. I can't speak for their massages but based on this absolutely terrible experience, these people deserve to go out of business.

name: Randy Latner
text: I always have a great experience with everyone that works the front desk and with my massage therapist Barbara.  I highly recommend getting massage here even if it's only for 30 mins.

name: Bethany Adams

name: Elizabeth Beeker
text: Great spa treatments, wide selection of products and friendly service!  It is always a pleasure and I highly recommend going to Nancy Taylor!

text: Kevin gives WONDERFUL massages.  I have done the 'whole day spa' experience before too and it was great.  I would recommend to other people

name: T Reed
text: This place was great for a manicure, but I went to get my eyebrows waxed last week and my eyebrows look the exact same as they did when I first got there. Very Disappointed. Didn't even look like she did anything to them. 🙁👎

name: Cynthia C Pasadeos
text: I purchased an $80 gift certificate for my husband and he chose to have a manicure and pedicure.  I was extremely disappointed by the results... not only were his hand and toe nails not filed smoothly, there was still dirt under his toe nails!  What kind of manicure/pedicure is THAT??  I would not recommend these services from this spa.

name: Quintina Thomas
text: It is the best place to go. Very friendly staff. Clean rooms and lounge area. The services are awesome and reasonable. Need to relax then stop by you won't regret it.

name: Christy Faulkner
text: The faculty is top notch.  Customer service are always very polite and helpful and Callie Gregory is WONDERFUL.

name: Katie Grass
text: The couple's massage is wonderful. They have really great customer service, and everything is clean. They're health rating is 100.

name: Imani Manley
text: This spa does not have great business practices. I had a last minute emergency and I tried to reschedule my appointment (I understand a fee for last minute cancellations) but they tried to charge me the entire amount of my massage. I really wanted to move the massage to a later date and they were not helpful whatsoever, all they wanted was the money. So they just lost a customer. I wish I could review the place but I can't because of their greedy business practices. From now on I'm going to spa belle la vie, they won't charge you if you have an emergency or have to cancel last minute. I really can't with this place

name: Morgan Batze
text: Terrible customer service, no one knows what they’re doing and things are very disorganized. Will not recommend to friends or be returning.

text: Very nice experience!

name: Faith Rakestraw Grill
text: Love Nancy Taylor Day Spa!!

name: Kimberly Bivins
text: Give Whittney a call!

name: Sandra Fritts
text: The salon is always clean and the stylists are professional.  Every appointment starts late; however, I always LOVE my hair style and the prices are competitive.

name: Samantha Palmer
text: Brought my son (18 months) in for a haircut with Jordan.  She gave him a really cute fade, and she was really good with him. He's had several haircuts before and screamed through all of them, and he cried at first but was fine by the end. She let me hold him,  was super gentle with her clippers, and was just generally understanding that he was nervous. We arrived about 15 minutes early, and she got us in a chair pretty much right away .We were out the door in 15 minutes with a good haircut.  We will definitely be back!

name: Tony Lombardo
text: I don't like salons.  I feel really uncomfortable at the ones I've visited, but Triple Platinum it an exception.  Triple Platinum is a comfortable place where I feel right at home.  Liz Maske, the salon's owner, is responsible for that atmosphere.  She's a great person who you'll want to visit just for the conversation.  You'll get a great haircut too.  Hey, if she can make me look good, she clearly has skills.

name: Audrey Moore
text: I had a wonderful experience at triple platinum and I will be going back to Whittney regularly. I was early for my appointment and got into the chair right away, received a wash, cut,and dry within about 30 minutes. This was not because she was rushing but because she was efficient and awesome. I have a very busy schedule and rarely get haircuts because it takes too long and usually a quick haircut has bad results but this was not the case with Whittney. I love my cut and I am glad I found a stylist I can stick with while I’m in Birmingham.

resp.text: I'm so glad you had a good experience & we'll look forward to seeing you again!

name: Kitty Barrow
text:
When we moved from Mobile 11 years ago, I was worried that I wouldn't find a hair dresser as great as my guy. Luckily Triple Platinum was the first place I was referred to. Not only does Liz do an excellent cut and color every single time, I actually like her cut better than my Mobile guy.

I especially love being able to schedule my appointment online. Super convenient!

I highly recommend all of the hair dressers at Triple Platinum.

name: Amelia Bennett
text: I've never had a haircut I didn't like from Triple Platinum (even when I had to have it cut short due to working at a pool and teaching swim lessons everyday. I was sad to see my long hair go, but Liz worked her magic!) My mom and grandmother recommended I go see Liz. I thought for sure the stylists would make comments about how bad the chlorine and Alabama summer sun had fried my hair. Nope! Liz and Whitney answered my questions and gave the best advice to get my hair healthy again. Triple Platinum does not rush through clients like other salons. I won't go anywhere else! We consider Liz a friend, and I recommend everyone to Triple Platinum!

name: The Pink Sheep
text: I truly loved my haircut with Liz Maske, she worked with me the whole time and balanced taking charge and making sure I knew what she was planning for my cut. She was late to the appointment (the building was closed and locked when I arrived at 10am and my appointment did not actually get started until about 15 after BUT I was still out of there with a shampoo, cut and blow dry within the hour), or I would have given her a score of excellent. Good prices, I just wish they carried Bumble and bumble.

name: Della Clark
text: Had an appt. Talked to Whitney beforehand on the phone about previous color on my hair. Uber'ed to the salon for her to tell me she "didn't want to get into it" and that she "didn't want to make it worse." Incredibly insulted and would never go back.

name: Jim Schwegman
text: The owner and staff has always bent over backwards to make sure I was happy with any products and or service I needed or wanted.

name: Pat Bucy

resp.text: Hi Jazmine. Thanks for reaching out! We are thrilled to hear that you had a great experience with Emily and Claire. Have a great day!

text: Perfect from start to finish. Cory was easy to check in with and explained the packages well. Claire was very personable and explained the process for me. They were both very professional and the whole place is very clean. The time management is fantastic! Will definitely be back!

Tiani was such a professional & very knowledgeable about the services!
Jessica was an absolute pro. It was such a pleasant experience considering I was getting a wax! Very professional and knowledgeable even down to the aftercare products!

text: Literally the kindest people ever! Throughout my entire waxing experience (I was a first timer!) Hailey and I had a nice conversation and I felt entirely comfortable.

resp.text: Hi there. Thanks for reaching out! We are thrilled to hear that you had a great experience with Hailey. Have a great day!

name: Providence Beautie
text: I will never buy a razor ever again. It was the best thing ever. And so quick and Jessica was amazing. Talked me through the whole session and I will forever appreciate her. If you’re interested please go now. You will not regret it. Tiani the best! I mean she really sale the company, I like that. She has very friendly professional customer service. Y’all please visit the now.

resp.text: Hi there. Thanks for reaching out! We are thrilled to hear that you had a great experience with Tiani and Jessica. Have a great day!

name: Maygan Page
text: Jessica is the absolute best!! After spending years going to different salons getting mediocre results I tried this one out and I haven’t been disappointed yet with my results. I have had some not so great experiences with the ladies at the front counter but I think that stems from my very first visit with them not setting clear expectations. In the beginning I was told that walk ins are welcomed but appointments are recommended. The 2 times I have had to do a walk in I’ve been turned down. Today I had a 11 o’clock appointment and came in at 9 hoping to get in early because I had to go out of town. I was willing to wait and it was a quick wax (less than 10 mins)  so I was disappointed to hear that it wasn’t possible when I come every 2 weeks at minimal. So I canceled my appointment I had for 11. After thinking it over Jessica is the reason I decided to come back. I would really like to get the wax passes which saves alot of money but I’m afraid how the customer service will be after purchasing. I don’t want to feel like I’m stuck if I decided to take my business elsewhere.

resp.text: Hi there. We’re very sorry for your experience. Please send us the details on what happened guestservices@waxcenter.com if you would like to be contacted further about your experience.

name: Kat Cota-Robles
text: I got a wax from Jessica and she was fantastic. Got me in and out quickly and it was painless. Definitely coming back to see her! Emily at the front desk was also great, extremely helpful getting me set up for my next appointment and telling me about the wax pass they offer. So glad European Wax Center has come to Madison!

resp.text: Hi there. Thanks for reaching out! We are thrilled to hear that you had a great experience with Jessica and Emily. Have a great day!

name: Riss
text: Clean, professional, seamless service. I love getting waxed by Hailey and I’ve always had great experiences at this location. Front desk is always kind and efficient. I have spoke with Cory quite a few times and he has really brought so much energy to the center .. I can’t wait to go back!

resp.text: Hi there. Thanks for reaching out! We are thrilled to hear that you had a great experience with Hailey and Cory. Have a great day!

name: Melody Kernan
text: I love this center! EWC is always my go-to when it comes to waxing and this center is no different! Cory was a great help at explaining the wax pass perks to me so much that I bought one! He made it the perfect experience and I can't wait to go back next month.

resp.text: Hi Melody. Thanks for reaching out! We are thrilled to hear that you had a great experience with Cory. Have a great day!

name: Christy Vickers
text: I received my wax from Hailey and she did a great job. She made me feel comfortable and relaxed. It was quick and painless. Cory at the front desk was great in explaining how everything including the wax pass. Go check them out.

resp.text: Hi Christy! Thank you for taking the time to leave us feedback. We love having you at our center and are happy to hear that you had a great experience. I will let the team know about your kind words. Have a great day!

text:

text:
Let me start off by saying that I was extremely happy when I found out that EWC was coming to Madison! I moved from PA a year ago and was sad when I found out it wasn’t here initially.
I’m a stickler on customer service and let me tell you that these ladies did not disappoint!!!!
Miya is a doll! She was so pleasant and professional and I could hear her smile in her voice. She explained the wax passes thoroughly and made sure I got the best deal. She greeted me as soon as I walked thru the door which is also a big plus for me. She checked me in quickly and before I could even sit down, Hailey was calling my name to come back (talk about being on time!!!!) This was the quickest and most thorough wax I’ve had since moving here a year ago! In that short amount of time, we talked about everything under the sun, and I felt like I had been knowing her for years. She is officially my new waxer! I’m already booked for my next appointment and I will be sure to send other customers your way! Thank you ladies!!!

resp.text: Hi Audrey. Thanks for reaching out! We are thrilled to hear that you had a great experience with Miya and Hailey. Have a great day!

text: She was so very personable and talked you through everything. She was gentle and this was my second time ever getting a wax and it was quite the difference than my first wax, she was amazing. Her place is clean and she offers free water, coffee, and tea. She is also very sanitary. Each time she uses a stick to dip the wax out she discard it after each use which makes me feel so good as a germaphobe. She also wipes down her table and pulls a new roll of paper for each customer. She will definitely be my go to waxer!

Had my first full leg yesterday and it was amazing. Minimal pain, not patchy, and super efficient. It was my first time not hopping off a waxing table covered in sweat from the pain response. I will be back for more services and I will be telling everyone who asks for a waxing recommendation about Esthetic Infusions!

name: Quikdraw 72
text:
I actually found this place by accident in Tuscaloosa mall.
I was trying to get a haircut at another salon on the other end of the mall and they hadn't opened yet so I went looking for possibly another and happened to end up here. I didn't have a appointment, but a stylist by the name Mallory took me anyway and actually did a very satisfactory job. As you would probably prefer, she was friendly and very outgoing and held a good conversation to make the time pass quickly, which was far better than a boring ole' straight to business haircut. And for the record, yes everyone wore masks, the place was absolutely spotless clean and disinfected, and health safety was definitely practiced. I drove 60 miles trying to find a place to get a haircut on short notice, but for once I was satisfied all the way around and would say I'd go back regardless of the drive.

text: Get Jordan Terry to cut your hair

name: Ashley Delahanty
text: Nmxnxx New York

name: Regina
text: Very pleased with my SNS manicure. I’m from out of town, visiting my mom and she recommended Paradise Nails. I made an appointment and did not have to wait. They had a good selection of colors to choose from and the lady that did my nails was very efficient and did an excellent job! Will definitely come here again next time I’m in town.

name: myriah dishong
text:
UPDATE: my nails are already cracking after 12 hrs of having them!!!! 🤬
I got SNS and a pedicure here today and i am NOT pleased at all. My nails have scruffs all over them. The lady that was doing them was in a rush and you could tell she was rushing. I still have dry skin on my feet. Took my mother in law with me and she still has skin on her feet too!!! Only thing that looks good is the polish on our toes. Don’t go here unless you want to walk out with the same crusty feet you had when you walked in and bumps on your finger nails. DO NOT RECOMMEND AT ALL.

name: L Murr
text: Was very disappointed in my mother/daughter Mother's Day mani/pedi.  My pedicure was fine.  I asked for a manicure with just clear on my natural nails.  Normally you would get your cuticles pushed back, cleaning under the nails, skin trimmed, etc.  The lady doing mine was in such a hurry and the shape of my nails was horrible.  My daughter asked for different color on each toe and was charged xtra.  Won't be back that's for sure.  There is a reason there wasn't a line of people on the Saturday before Mother's Day.

name: Kimberly Brown
text: Very clean salon and nice staff they do great work

name: Mary Knight
text: It was very clean, very neat. It was quiet. Would have liked some music or something, but my main was great, and my boyfriend said it was the best pedicure hes had.

name: Sandi Cushway
text: Great service at a great price. Super nice employees.

name: Brittany Hussey
text:
Best Nail Salon I’ve been to so far.
I moved here 2 years ago and have been to several Nail salons. This is the first one that I actually like. The owner was SO nice! AND she appreciates your business!

name: Tiffany Bentley
text: My nails look horrible. I asked for BLACK and Grey and got dark purple with sparkles... not to mention the quality of the nail work done is seriously lacking...

name: Sharon Weeks
text: Beautiful relaxing and so CLEAN. Best pedicure I've ever had! This is my new favorite nail salon.

name: Angela A
text: Great service. Nice staff.

name: Jennifer Watts
text: My go to place  hardly any wait! Love how thin Sns nails are

name: Whitney Cruthird
text: I went in for sns and sat there with my nails soaking for an hour. The lady who did my nails did a horrible job that the next day they started chipping and cracking. I literally sat there for over 2 hours, which should have been a warning sign. I will not go back and I do not recommend.

name: Geri Genovese
text: Awful. Buyers beware.

resp.text: Very vague review. All readers would like to know why you think it is "awful". From reading other reviews on this site as well as other media, your review is an outlier, far from the vast majority of reviews. I suggest you return and file a review with details that merit a professional review status. Paradise Nails strives to provide a good experience for our clients; even earning a top 5 finish in the local prestigious Lagniappe Awards.

name: Sandi Cushway
text: Have had a range of experiences here. Lately great service and excellent pedicure 👍👍👌

text: Really disappointed with my experience here. Not confident that their equipment is sanitary either. The place is new, but I didn’t see any cleaning or opening new tools. My feet peeled so bad after going here

name: Susan Berent
text: Love this place. Peaceful, no tv! Soothing music. All the manicurist are friendly. Frenda is my personal choice. Her attention to detail is second to none.

name: Merrell Havens
text: First place I chose because of high rating and reviews but info was deceiving. Hot, hot, hot inside. Staff was very unfriendly and place was old looking and not so clean. Glad I changed my mind and went to Bellagio Nails up the street. Pedi was the bomb!!!

resp.text: A very inaccurate review. The Salon was very new at the time of review, exceptionally clean with a 100% health and safety rating from the AL Board of Cosmetology. Obviously the reviewer was not from this area as the temperatures are very hot even in mid-October. Reviewer needs to return for an accurate review.

text: I am not a local so I had to do some research on which salon to use before my wedding. I found Reflexions and they seemed well organized. I went in on my wedding day for a style and no other services. The stylist was able to complete what I was asking for for the most part and I was pleased. The stylists were not very friendly they didn’t say much except “sit here” and the obvious asking what you want questions. The stylist didn’t give any feedback, suggestions, nothing. I definitely felt like “just another tourist dollar.” Ultimately for the price, experience,  and simplicity of the hair style I would not recommend my friends and family to this salon.

resp.text: Hello Megan, Although this is a great review I don't believe it was meant for us. We do not have a Jasmine. This is Reflexions Hair Salon in Orange Beach Alabama.

text: Fantastic service and very accommodating. Eric and Ellen did a great job on my highlights and were very kind. I wanted to go a little darker with my highlights after the first round and were completely cool helping me with my request :) I highly recommend them!

text: My daughter and I love Reflexions Hair Salon! Heather B has been our go to for color, highlights, and cuts since we moved to Orange Beach in 2017. If you want the perfect colorist, go see her! Fabulous staff!

name: Hope Roberts
text: I called while on vacation because my roots were really bad, and they were able to book me an appointment for a few days later. I saw Cassie for a full foil of highlights. I was a little nervous because I’m a natural brunette who was been bleaching my hair for many years, but it turned out amazing!!I was also worried about the COVID situation, but the salon handled everything really well. They moved all the seats far apart, all the employees were wearing masks and they did check out from each individual station to minimize contact. Cassie was super sweet and professional, and I paid half of what I would have paid for the same service at my salon back home in Savannah. Super pleased and would definitely stop in again when I’m in the area!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! We hope to see you again if you are ever in the area!

name: Cindy Williams
text: Reflexions is a great salon with a professional atmosphere that is welcoming at the same time.   Everyone there is super friendly.  They recently did hair and makeup for my daughters wedding.  Everyone looked beautiful!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review!

name: Donald Benner
text: Just had my hair cut by Hewe and she did an amazing job. She cut and styled my hair exactly how I wanted her too. I have kinky coily natural hair but prefer to wear it straight and it's been challenging to find a stylist who could get it right. Definitely recommend!

resp.text: Thank you for your review.

name: Deborah Phillips
text: I drive from Foley for Karen to cut my hair! She’s always made my “crazy” hair look good.  Everyone is abiding by the rules, masks and sanitizing, and I feel very safe there.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review Deborah!

name: Anne Carswell
text: Cassie was great with my 9 year old. She asked questions, offered advice and gave her a great cut! They got us in quickly as well.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review Anne! Hope to see ya'll again soon.

name: Micheal Lyons
text: I got a digital perm done by Mina and her assistant Hyun Ji and I love the way it came out! Very natural looking waves and because I got the combo conditioning package, it didn't damage my hair. What I appreciated most was how accommodating Hyun Ji was about my needing to pump as a nursing mom. I had just asked her to grab my big black bag and when I was about to head into the restroom she asked me if I needed to nurse (we had talked about how I had a baby at home). She said that I didn't have to go to the restroom to do that and led me to a comfy "beauty room" where I was able to pump. Very perceptive and considerate of her! I will definitely be coming back to get my hair done! Very satisfied customer - thank you!!

resp.text:
Micheal Lyons
Thank you for leaving this wonderful review, however, I want to assure credit for this beautiful experience is given properly. The Reflexions Hair Salon you left your review for is located in Orange Beach, AL. We do not have on staff  Mina as a service provider. I am not sure how we are getting our actual guest reviews and another salon company reviews mixed up as Google seems to have a process when this happens and does not want to remove and place where credited, I am in the process of trying to sort this out so credit is given properly to service providers.
Where is the Reflexions Company you visited and wish to leave this review? I would like to send them their amazing reviews and make sure they are aware of this mix up.
I am glad you had a wonderful experience at the salon company you visited.
- Reflexions Hair Salon
Orange Beach, AL.

name: Jimmy McGinnis
text: I booked an appointment with this location at 7:30 am for 10:45am. I received 3 confirmations. I made arrangements at my place of work to leave early for lunch in order to make the confirmed  appointment. 15 min before I was leaving I start to print my copy to carry with me. I open my mail and they just canceled my booking. I called and the response was sorry problem with third party booking. I have no clue who they use for booking and I don't care. I care that the attitude was lacking any empathy. No attempt to fix the problem.  No offer of anything. Just a voice of let me get you off the phone ASAP. I will never come back. My Family will never come back. Anyone I can convince will never come back. I make this review knowing fully that they don't care. I only hope that anyone who reads this will save themselves the frustration of trying to deal with them. I end this rant with a question. When did customer service die in America?

text: I have followed Davina from all her salons. SHE IS THE BEST STYLIST I’VE USED EVER!!!! Would recommend her to everyone!!!!

text: Davina has colored my hair for several years and I have been beyond satisfied every time. She recently took me from a washed out brown to a gorgeous blonde and I am so happy with it!! She is proffessional and brilliant at what she does!!

name: Britney Jowers
text: Linsey did so good on my hair today! She added perfect highlights that looked so natural; it was exactly how I wanted it!! She sanitized everything before and after and kept her mask on. She was very professional!

name: Angie Strawn
text: Great convenient location!  Very clean and all the hairdressers wore mask and thoroughly cleaned their station after each client. Went in with a head full of mess and came out all shiny and manageable!  Thanks Davina you are the color queen and hair goddess!

name: Brandi Odell
text: Davina Hamilton did an excellent job in caressing the right balance of highlights and low lights. My hair looks fantastic.

name: Makala Smith
text: All around wonderful experience here f you go there ask for cherry she was excellent I walked out of there feeling very confident honestly my hair had never looked better !!!!!

name: Christine Watson
text: We practice social.distance, please  wait 2 weeks to book an appointment if you have been sick or traveled! We wear face masks an require any guests to wear them also. You can not bring anything in the salon when you come or anyone! We love our guests an we are doing these precautions for you! Please be safe an remember to be kind to your stylists!

name: Jennifer Harrold
text: Very Clean and Great place to go for your Hair...

name: Kimberly Barnes
text: I came in with a disaster head full of knots and Kristine, I hope that's spelt right, she fixed me up and gave me the most confidence I've had in a while! she didnt judge me one bit, she was super sweet and did the exact hair cut I wanted all while dealing with the mess in my head! I'm loving this new me and it's all thanks to you!! highly recommend!

text: I highly recommend Smart Style and my stylist  Davina. I had hair coloring and styling the same day with professional experience and great quality.

text: Christine Watson has always took VERY GOOD CARE of the Cut, Style and Highlights of my Hair. I live in New Hope and drive to Gadsden a 54 mile trip to have my hair done. Christine is worth every mile. Very Professional, Personable and Caring about your Needs and Desires of what you want your Hair to look like as you exit Smart Style. Enjoy every minute there. Thank you so Much Christine.

name: Kasandra Quinn
text: The stylist we use - Linsey Quinn,is very professional, and precise. She listens to what we want done and she does exactly that! She has fit us in numerous times, total life saver... don't know what we'd do without her.

name: Tanner Strawn
text: Finally after 3 different hairdressers Davina gave me what I wanted!  Love my hair and I’ll be back!

text: Cynthia is AMAZING!!! She is so sweet and wonderful with everyone. My youngest actually asks to go see Ms. Cynthia (even when he doesn't need a haircut). Cynthia is super patient with even the pickiest about their hair in our family and always does a great job no matter what hair type. Cynthia is the best!

name: Cathy Brandon
text: I was very pleased as always, Christine Watson is very talented and professional. She always makes you feel comfortable and you always enjoy your time there. Very good at listening what you want and offers  suggestion what  products  that would  work best you.  Christine Watson Represents Smart Style  in a Classy Manner from Her Hair, Clothing down to her Shoes.

name: Brittany Pendergrass
text: Go here and ask for Cynthia! She is the only person I have ever in my life hunted down to cut my hair over and over. She is just good at what she does! People go to school and learn the steps to cut hair... but they can't teach naturally being good at knowing how to make a certain type of hair look great, and she has that talent! She's also a lovely person and just makes you feel good to be around her, which makes getting a haircut a pleasant experience for me, which has never been the case until I found her! Go see her!!!

name: Kelsey Davis

I said my son is not staying in the car. My son was made to feel bad. I have been going to this shop to many different stylist. If my son had had an appointment to have his hair cut.. would I have been told to leave.? After all I am his mom and I would have had to pay for his cut.i am very upset. I know things changed but what was said to me was very rude.

Friendly environment from not only her but her coworkers as well. I highly recommend!

text: I've been waiting outside for over 2 hours now during their posted hours of operation. The only consolation is a sign saying closed for lunch, but it's now past 2:00 P.M. To make it worse, somebody (owner or employee) is inside and they saw me standing outside waiting but have not come to speak to me, nor have they answered the phone in the past 3 hours (I called before coming, left after seeing the lunch sign, then came back and waited 2 hours).

name: Jaiden Pokoski
text:
Richard at Supercuts gives amazing haircuts. However I returned a few weeks ago when he was not there and got the absolute worst haircut of my life. My sideburns were cut to different lengths and were off by over half an inch. Also on the back of my head I found a chunk of hair that was completely untouched and was 2-3
Inches longer than the rest of my hair. I’m not sure how that can go unnoticed. I’ve never taken the time to write a business review but this haircut is so bad I decided it needed to be said. Even after going and getting it fixed I’m still stuck with a bad haircut that I must let grow back out before I can get another good one to fix it completely. Don’t go.

name: Mica Taylor
text: Arian is AMAZING! She got me in on a short notice and she did a great job!! She was so kind, proficient and all in all a joy to be around.

name: Meagan Franklin
text: This is the only place I will take my six year old son, as well as myself! Arian is my go-to, and she never ceases to bring my visions to life! She is thorough, patient with kids, knowledgeable, and honest about what it will take to achieve your expectations. I never have any issues, but I know that if I did- Arian and Joann would find a quick solution! They are so friendly, and I overall love the environment.

name: Wake Allen
text: Returned to this establishment to get a haircut. After the first time I went and got one of the best haircuts I’ve ever had. When I went back I got the worst haircut of my life. They had no attention to detail, and completely ruined my hair. I’m having to go somewhere else to get my hair fixed now...

name: Ashton Heuer
text: Absolutely love coming here to get my hair done! I’ve been a client here for about a year and Joann always does a fantastic job! ☺️ Very energetic and fun atmosphere! My boyfriend and his family have both been here as well and loved the outcome of their haircut styles. Always recommend to friends and family! Joann is the best!

name: Michele McQuiston
text: I love my new haircut. I went in there after an awful haircut a few months back and this is amazing. Joanna helped me. 💖

name: landon campbell
text: Awesome staff! I have been coming here the past 3 years and don’t want to go anywhere else!

name: austin price
text: This place is one of the best places in Tuscaloosa to get a haircut. By far some of the best stylists in town, and I always leave there with a great haircut. The price is actually decent given what all they do, unlike other places in town that charge ridiculous amounts of money for the same services (aka sports clips)

name: Kassidy Giles
text: I got my hair cut by Stephanie. She did a phenomenal job and gave me exactly what I wanted, and she was the sweetest!!

name: Roll Tide Timmy
text: JoAnn is absolutely awesome! Very friendly and does an awesome job!

name: Jennifer Hudson
text: I booked a recent appointment for my husband and my son there the last Saturday of August at 3 pm. My husband went first and got a decent cut. Midway thru his cut the other stylist came and got my son. His cut took her less than 10 minutes and was the worst hack job I ever saw. I don't know know how to even begin to cut hair and even I could have done better. I was in the car trying to quarantine but my husband said she spent the whole time talking to the next family in the lobby. Even though my husband's cut started first, my son's was "done" before his was even half over. So I took my son back inside to get it fixed. They grudgingly chopped some more on the front but still left the back a mess. It sticks up on its own and is so uneven you can make out gaps.The woman who did the original hack job mentioned that we needed to update his note in his file to reflect how we wanted it cut. We have been customers at this store for years with the same notes and never have we had a problem before. I walked out then without telling her to not bother because it will be a cold day in hell before I bring my family back. Shame really since we have been repeat customers for at least a year and more.

name: Robert Holland
text: I go here regularly. The staff is always polite even when they get over booked because of walk-ins. I always come away with a great haircut and feeling refreshed by the tea tree experience. Also if you haven’t had a straight razor line up on the back highly recommended gets as close to the skin as possible and seems the hair doesn’t grow back quite as fast keeping yourself hair line in the back looking good.

name: John Burroughs
text: Great place to get a super cut. Richard always does a "super" job!

name: Ben Golden
text: Fast and very professional...in and out..BOOM

name: Darrell W. Redding
text: They got me in quickly, very helpful and friendly staff, and exercising correct protocols for customer safety! 5 stars!

text: The statement from the owner read "come to this location for a quality cut at a moment's notice." I took a trip, but there was a sign on the door that read "BOOKED FOR THE DAY"

text: Fast service and friendly staff. The barber I had didn't get the haircut I showed him on my phone right. It was awful. Despite offered the discount price I just play it cool, paid, and left to another place to get the cut i wanted done from another shop nearby. I would like to point out that this isn't a bad place for Ladies' cut, but the men's cut experience was awful both visits!

text: Friendly service, quick, good haircuts. Located in a very central location. Can't recommend enough if you need to get a quick haircut.

name: Brooks B
text:
Supercuts, unlike other "retail" haircutterz, has never let me down. They've always been really nice and never given me a hack wacky haircut. The worst thing about Supercuts is that they advertise a happy ending (with a hot towel, get your mind out of the gutter) but sometimes forget. As disappointing as that sounds, they still get 5 stars from me. The stylist today worked around my 'covid mask' (required for now) with great skill and precision.
Last but not least, I USUALLY get a different stylist every time--yes I live on the edge--and always come out looking 'muy guapo!' Thanks Supercuts. Y'all rock!

name: Rhonda Bigham
text: Great place love my stylist jojo

name: Murali Rao
text: Poor quality haircut.

name: Lisa Bailey
text: Check in is really good now. I love being able to to check in on line. You can also just go in and get a hair cut without to much wait. They ask questions to make sure you get the right haircut for you. I can't say everyone is happy to be there, but for the most part our experience was good.

name: Crystal Gaddy
text: very friendly staff. love me some Mira. she is the one who always does my color and highlights. never disappointed with her.

name: M. Belle Hester
text: Delayed 30 minutes after appt, but Jo Ann gave great advice for hair.

name: Amanda Savage
text: My son got his hair cut here recently. Nice people, affordable, clean. He really liked his haircut. Probably wouldn't go here if you wanted a more trendy super stylized cut but great family and clean cuts.

name: Andrew Sartor
text: The staff here is friendly, but their quality of service definitely isn't great, especially at the price point. I went here because I was in a rush one day, and my usual barbershop was closed. The staff greeted me and got to me relatively quickly, especially considering the high volume of customers when I entered. After going home and looking at my new haircut, I realized why the service was so quick. They cut corners here and don't take the time to make sure you receive a high quality hair cut. My sideburns were uneven and there were multiple spots in my hair that they missed (especially around the ears). I couldn't justify returning here, especially at the cost. For less than this, you could go support a local barbershop over in Northport and receive a much better haircut.

name: Zack York
text: Amazing service! I came in on Labor Day to see Taylor for a color correction. Taylor did an amazing job at toning my hair and getting it exactly how I wanted it! She didn't stop until I was happy with it. I would highly recommend Taylor, and Supercuts for any cut or color!

name: Sam Wight
text: Great place to get a haircut! Dude who cut my hair was super friendly and gave me a really good haircut very quickly. Wait times can be high if you go on a Sunday.

name: Madaca 99
text: Went on a Thursday, only two girls there and they were both good. My son and I both got haircuts. The manager cut mine and she was a pro. The guy before me got a great looking modern cut. I just wanted mine cut short. This lady was doing a great job and I told her quit trying to do such a good cut and just chop it off. I only get my hair cut once about every 4 months and I spoiled this professional cut. She was great! She appreciated the humor and saw the practicality and still insisted on giving me a better cut that I wanted. What can you do?

text: Great service. Reasonably priced. Check in online to cut down your wait.

text:
Waited an hour for a trim. What we did not know, if you get an appointment on their app you can just WALK in at time and those who just "walked-in" get pushed down the list. Unfair in some ways...just do not get bumped because of not being informed like we were.
FYI----make an appt on the app then delete the dang thing until you need it again.
Military also get a discount but they do not advertise it.

text: Taylor did an awesome job. It's always tricky when you don't live in the area, and don't know where to go. I would definitely recommend going in, and ask for Taylor.

name: Chloediane00
text: I decided to get my hair cut here and immediately after walking in I got a bad vibe. The stylist upfront yelled at the stylist in the back to come do my hair. The entire time my hairstylist was doing my hair her and the other stylist were talking and joking around NOT being professional at all. At one point the other stylist came up behind my hairstylist and said something about what she was doing. My hair stylist replied with “Shut you’re mouth!”. She showed me my hair when she was done and the layers were very choppy. I asked her to blend them and she “did”. I left with uneven choppy layers and my hair being nothing like the picture I showed her. I am going to another hair salon to see if they can fix it.

name: Irvine Montebello-Alvarez
text: Taylor was my stylist and she was great! Did exactly what I wanted! Would definitely return!

name: Qiang Huang
text:
In case the store owner checks review, I get to the point here. The personality and communication skills of Arian do not qualify her a job in service sector. Definitely not a manager, if she is one right now as she self claimed.

I have been going to this place despite of a bad experience 2 years ago with a stylist before. At that time,  I averaged my rating at 2 star. But now, I wish I could give 0 or negative rating, and will not go there anymore despite of the convenient location.

I believe this place can still survive only because its location is very convenient for students. I went there in a morning in March, I was told they didn't take walk in. Understandable in covid. I made an appointment at 2 , then I went back at 1:50, and waited for 40 minutes, and finally sit on the chair at 2:30, and got the 10 minutes hair cut. Then I apparently complained to the stylist that the so called appointment didn't work.

However, I forgot all these, until I was reminded by the same stylist yesterday in May.  When I saw she didn't have mask on yesterday, I asked if she had vaccine.. she said no. Then I asked why she didn't have mask on if she didn't have vaccine. Then, she told me she refused to serve me anymore because I complained last time as well. I didn't even know what is the last time and who she is, then she showed me the ticket, which shows her name ARIAN for my last visit. And told me what happened last time. I wanted to talk to the manager, she self claimed to be the manager while wagging her head and proudly laughing at me.

Okay, she won. I walked out and went to another place and fixed my half done hair.

Isn't it part of managers job to handle customers complaint? I know many of us at our jobs need to pretend to like our boss.  But since when it becomes a responsibility for a customer to pretend to like the service even if they don't? Ok, I have been there for 15 times as the ticket showed.  Out of 15, I do remember 2 bad experiences including yesterday. Plenty of okay and good ones. But this Arian experience ruined all and I don't believe her personality and communication skills qualify her for a job in service sector, not mentioning a manager. I promise I won't go back anymore.

text: Hours are not updated!!!

I left with highlights that looks like I have had them for 2 months they are over a inch from the scalp plus its orange! I'm disgusted! Not to mention I paid 120 and left with half way dry hair and no style. I will NEVER go back. If I could post pictures I would !

text: I have had great experiences with my 2 year old and 9 years old boy haircuts. Cuts looked very good.  Price was 12.00 and we were in and out quickly.

name: Leslee Burns
text: Always cut and style just right.

name: Jeri Jernigan
text:
Crystal is a phenomenal beautician! Both friendly and professional. Very affordable!!

We have a family of 6 - 2 males and 4 females. She not only cuts everyone’s hair; she also colors my hair and it’s never turned out any way other than what I’ve requested. She is always patient with all of us indecisive females.

Another thing ( among many ) that I absolutely LOVE about her is that she isn’t one of those beauticians that will take on something that she’s not completely comfortable/confident doing. She will point you to another professional co-worker.

Crystal never makes us feel anything other than confident and beautiful/handsome. We love the work she does and her company as she does it; so much so we have always driven from Huntsville to her.  She’s just amazing.

name: Leslie Roden
text: Stylist Barbara Medlock is the bomb, she's cut all of my boys hair(5 and under) and is very patient and treats them well, and the haircut is always up to date.  She also does mine and I'm super picky, while she is doing the hair she also give you advice on how to treat your hair and what to do and not to do. The Colors she puts in mine always turns out better than expected, and the cut is beyond amazing I have super curly and frizzy hair and she know exactly what needs to be done before I sit in her chair! Her personality is super amazing! Great to talk to while your getting your makeover done!!

name: Autumn Woods
text: I got highlights and a hair cute by Crystal. My hair has never looked so good. She’s super sweet and friendly. She provided asome service in every way she could. I definitely recommend!!!

name: Calethea Martin
text: I use Barbra and she is awesome. I won’t use anyone else to do my hair. I love being able to just run in and get my hair done and get out . They are really friendly and great girls.

name: Melissa Clark
text: Barbara Medlock is a outstanding stylist, she is great with my Two year old I only let her and Jennifer cut mine and my son's hair. They are both amazing. Next time you go ask for Barbara or Jennifer

text: Went in curly and came out straight! Love the smart styles crew!!

text:
I had someone cutting my grandson hair, she is good and works there. Last 3 visits I have been done wrong. I called they said sure you dont need appointment so I went and they had 3 more customers with appointments ahead and could6do that day.
Next time I made appointment  got there and still had to wait greater then 1 hr.
Next time made appointment  and they were taking  people ahead who had appointment at same time

Upon arrival to my bathroom mirror, i find that i have 0.5 inch of hair in the front middle, covered by 1.5 inches (like i wanted), 2.5 inches on the right and 1 inch on the left. I have a sink full of hair from around my ears and the back is gaped up all to hell. I almost want to stand in front of the door with my hair all jacked up and tell people that walk in that this is what $15.50 will get you. I am so mad right now that i will never even get a gallon of milk at that place, not an rx, not anything and am going to tell anyone that asked me the same thing. name: Eric Luffman
text: I am huge on surprises! So I purchased a very expensive perfect package for my girl as a surprise Valentine's day present at this location bc ive sent her here once before and she seemed to enjoy it. Well the lady at the desk inquired on who it was for and apparently submitted the information under her name where as MY email confirmation went directly to my girl, where she called me informing me she knew my plans for her, spoiling the surprise!!! That should have never happened! I then called and explained my irritation and informed them I was coming for a refund. They called me back like it was no biggy like cool we can just refund this over the phone for you rather than saying hey i'm sorry is there any way we can make this right for you! I'm a funny, chill laid back dude, but if you ruin a surprise, that is my one and only immediate heartbreak bc that ruins the joy of spending lots of money to be able to see the expression on your womans face of how happy she is. Presents are for the givers and for the receivers bc we both enjoy feeling the happiness of THE SURPRISE!! Please resolve this issue, bc i'm a man of morality bc now my woman is upset with me bc I refunded the package but I simply can NOT do business with folks that aren't in it for the satisfaction of those spending their hard earned money! So now, I had Valentine's all planned out perfect to the T, I no longer have the "kaboom" gift available, and now there is all this negative energy between me and my woman bc I know she still wants the package but I can not allow it bc the surprise was so important to me i absolutely had to have my money back so that this place would know and preferably remember that they ruined something for two special people! I wouldn't dare ask for something free, I would feel bad for taking anything not earned, but as a man that runs  a business, I make free offers every day to ensure customer satisfaction and that they come back!! Moral of my story, do what is right, and right what you wronged!

text: I had a fantastic experience at Lavish! Jennifer did an amazing job on my highlights. Then I booked my daughter an appointment to have a keratin treatment and Jennifer did an amazing job. My daughter LOVED how her hair turned out. Great place!

text: Go see Jennifer Easter at Lavish! I took my two daughters to Lavish for "back to school" haircuts. I had originally booked just one appointment with Jennifer using the online system because only my youngest daughter wanted a cut. The morning of the appointment came, and my oldest daughter decided she wanted her hair done as well. I was afraid they wouldn't be able to squeeze both girls in since it was Saturday. Jennifer and Morgan were very accommodating, and both of my girls got haircuts. They were so kind to my girls! I was so impressed with Lavish that I went back a week later to get my hair cut. Jennifer actually listens to what I want then shapes my hair into that style. I've had my hair cut twice by Jennifer since July. I have been very pleased with each cut and with the level of customer service that Jennifer and Lavish provide. And, bonus points for the ability to schedule appointments online!

name: Artisan Assemblage (GeishaGearHart)
text:
My daughter has been using henna for four years and wanted a change.  She wanted to go lighter.  Allie agreed to try and see if that was possible.  Henna is very unpredictable in how it responds.  The fact that she even agreed to try was awesome.

Unfortunately the bleach started having a strange reaction so she washed it out to prevent damage.  Plan B was to just dye it brown and wait for the henna to grow out for a year.

Allie suggested a cut and violet color that turned out perfect.  My daughter loves her hair so much.  Allie worked on her for over 3 hours.  I can not thank her enough for her patience and care.

text: Abbi is phenomenal.   She was able to fit me in last minute and gave me a BEAUTIFUL cut and style.  I won't go anywhere else.

I’m a hard gal to please and have been a hard client to keep at other salons but 10/10 I definitely recommend!!

Michelle

name: Lysee Baughman
text: Myself and a friend went today for our first visit trying to find a nail salon in town that we liked in our area outside of our regular place that has become so popular it’s stays booked weeks in advanced. We did our research and saw it had a 4.7 star rating so we decided to check it out. Upon entering they were very friendly and the building was very nice and clean. I just needed a fill in for my pink and white and my friend needed a whole new set. Things were great at first but the lady upset my friend a little when she told her she wanted short stiletto nails and she said no they are long I can show you and my friend said I understand but I have had them that short before and she said there going to be ugly that short and so my friend was like ok can you just do square then because she felt as if the lady was trying her best to discourage what she as the customer wanted done. The lady moves to my seat to work on my pink and white fill in and I have been to several salons enough to know how I want them done and how I expect them to be done so instead of starting with shaping the pink power first then working to the white so the white powder could have a rounded shape like I want instead of a straight across shape I started to get a little upset and my friend spoke up for me and said I’m sorry but I thought normally you use the silver tool to shape in the round form of the white and the lady said you can do it that way but we do it this way so finally I got the courage to speak up and point out that the nails she had done looked nothing like that he nails I already had and I wanted them like I had my originals and I didn’t scream or yell at her my voice got a little high tense because at this point I was getting very stressed out and she just stood up and said you need to just leave your to picky I will just charge you a small fee so it will be cheaper and her husband was working on my friends nails and he said yeah that’s best you made her feel bad and I think you need to leave and I was like what I already asked her if she could just quit and paint them a color so your going to charge me for something that’s half done and not even finish the job and he said yes you need to just leave so my friend was my ride and she obviously wasn’t going to make me wait while she finished hers so she told him that she would have to leave also because she was my ride and he said ok that’s fine y’all can both go and don’t worry about paying just don’t ever come back because y’all are obviously to picky for us. WE HAVE NEVER been treated this way before we always leave a nice tip and never been told we were too picky but when you are PAYING for a service you get what you asked for and you let them know what you want. Needless to say they don’t have to worry about us coming back anyways so we went to PERFECT NAILS on south parkway and when we went in we told them a short story about how we were made to leave a nail salon for being to picky and they wouldn’t finish our nails and as soon as we sat down the most awesome girl ever Linda sat down and was like ok let me see and soon as she saw them she said “omg what happened to your nails” she had to totally reshape them because the lady at revive had them all different lengths and shapes. I encourage anyone thinking about coming to this place BEWARE THEY DO NOT LIKE PEOPLE WHO ARE TO PICKY ABOUT THE SERVICE THEY ARE PAYING FOR. But I do recommend with a 5 star rating LINDA AT PERFECT NAILS on south parkway.

resp.text: We are sorry you were never satisfied when we try many ways to meet your likings and we were sure you were not going to be pleased when we finish with your nails. Plus you can't treat people ugly and raise your voice for not getting the same exact matching work of your other salon. We didn't charge you and your friend on what we spend almost close to complete service. We are glad you find someone that meet your needs.

name: Marie E
text: After a horrible experience at another place that does sugaring, I came here. Thank God for L.A. Bikini! They completely redeemed my sugaring experience! This place is clean, they are very timely, and their employees are very professional and knowledgeable about the services. The woman who did my sugaring had something like 10 or more years doing it, and it was evident! The whole thing was comfortable, hygienic, and hardly painful. I highly recommend them! P.S. - Sugaring > waxing!

name: Katie Beaman
text:
I went in for my first Brazilian sugaring after having tried wax a few times. From the moment I walked in the door, the staff was incredibly kind, professional, and friendly while helping me fill out their questionnaire and confirming my appointment time. The waiting area was very clean. I brought my cardiac alert dog in with me, and the staff was so courteous and understanding! Usually when trying new places, I’ll have to field some access issues - but not here! They were welcoming to both me and my service dog.

When it was time for my appointment, Elizabeth came to escort me to a room and was very attentive and friendly. She mentioned giving me some extra time to get my dog situated (he was in a down-stay out of the way for the whole appointment). Little things like that make the experience for me!

She made sure I was decent before opening the door to come in, and then began by answering any lingering questions I had about sugaring. We talked about the differences between wax and sugaring, and she walked me through how it would feel before beginning. She was so professional and welcoming - at no point did I ever feel any judgement or anything! She made me feel so comfortable and kept the conversation very light and it really felt like I was catching up with a friend. She made sure I liked the results and offered to tweak the triangle I preferred she leave to straighten it a bit more, then offered me some wipes to get any left over sugar if I felt it while redressing.

At the front, they helped sign me up for the membership - which was a fantastic deal! Instead of being around $60, I could pay $70 and have unlimited bikini sugaring for the month plus discounted other services. I’m currently scheduled for my second appointment and can’t wait! Not only did the staff make me feel more welcomed than I have ever felt in a beauty salon, but the sugaring itself was much less painful and I like how I only need to wait two weeks for touch ups.

Will absolutely be returning!!

name: Kayla Tucker
text: Great experience! Staff was super friendly! Great quality work, clean, on time. Would highly recommend this location!

name: marcy mcclain
text: First experience today and will be returning every two weeks, they are awesome! They put up with my first ever Brazilian and my reactions were a little louder than I hoped. It was all me, she was amazing and very professional, polite and understanding. Thank y’all!

name: Aarika Boggs
text: Purchased an account good for six months and showed up, on time, to all of my appointments in that frame. Called on the evening of my very last appointment in that six month period to say I was on my way but would be a few minutes late. Was told that if I showed up more than five minutes late, I would not be seen and would be charged for not showing. As a dentist, I understand the frustration and need for consequence for clients who show up notably late, consistently. However, to send away and charge a reliable, compliant client is absolutely asinine. Do not use them.

resp.text:
Hi Aarika,
We are sorry to hear about your recent experience at our location. It can be stressful and inconvenient to be charged for an appointment due to being late, especially when you make a call in advance. We try our best to get all clients in, however we do have a cancellation policy of 5 minutes due to having our appointments booked back to back. We do understand your frustration and want to help make things right. Please give us a call at (205) 637-1128 and ask to talk to a manager.
Sincerely,
L.A. Bikini

text: Horrible place do not recommend anybody to go.  (KAY )The lady who butchered my hair. Popped a ingrown hair on my neck. It was done before I could even say no. Worst haircut I've ever gotten in my life. I would not let my dog get a haircut here. Didn't realize how bad it was until I got home and saw the damage. This is the salon I always use, but will not use it again.

name: A Google User
text: Enjoyed my visit.  My nails were beautiful

name: A Google User
text:
Sadly, I've had to reflect for a while on whether I wanted to leave this review but felt it was only fair. I hadn't had my hair cut in well over a year and was really looking forward to feeling pretty for a day. Maybe this made my mediocre experience all the more devastating.

The stylist was very rough with my head, to the point that my boyfriend found scratch marks on the nape of my neck and ears. The hair cut wasn't bad, but it wasn't at all what I asked for. On top of that, I was promised a discount that I didn't receive. I left feeling pretty dejected.

I don't know if this is a common experience, maybe my stylist was just having an off day, but sadly I spent $60+ to not look and feel the way I wanted.

resp.text: Anna, I apologize that I have not seen this until now. Please know that we value our guests and want to to have the best experience we can possibly provide. Saying that,  I appreciate this feedback. If there is an issue that needs to be addressed,  I cannot begin to own it OR fix it. My main concern is that you did not have a good experience. Obviously, there were some communication breakdowns. I would like to invite you back to the salon by offering you a complimentary Aveda Shine Treatment and a Blowout. Please give us another opportunity to give you an amazing experience. Please call me at 205-200-3881.

name: A Google User
text:
The owner is absolutely adorable. I instantly loved her as soon as I walked in. The location is perfect and the color selection is great! The pedicure chair is private and away from everyone so introverts like me can actually relax. It was a great experience.

Conversely, no one was wearing a mask besides my own nail technician and me. I had a feeling it was because I expressed that it was important to me. The owner said she could not require anyone to wear a mask and that it is our own decision, which is untrue as she owns a private business and Birmingham does have a mask ordinance for that very reason. But I digress. Everyone that was within a few feet of me wore a mask and was respectful of me and that's all I could ask for, really.

I was left in the pedicure chair for about 35 minutes which was actually really nice for 20-25 but then my toes started to shrivel and it got a bit uncomfortable.

All in all a GREAT experience.

resp.text: Thank you for your review!! Our manicure and pedicure areas are more private and I do not rush anyone. I like to take my time, allow you to soak and soften. I am so sorry that you might have been a bit uncomfortable, that we not my intention.  Since your last visit we have implemented more safety guidelines for ALL that enter our salon. We want everyone to know that safety is key. Again, thank you for your feedback and we hope to see you in the future!

name: A Google User

resp.text: BARRY! WE LOVE YOU! Thank you for your great review. It is always a great day when you walk in our door!

For $240 this wasn't worth it..the stylist was ok, but definitely for $240 I'd expect much more ..NEVER GOING HERE AGAIN ..FALSE ADVERTISING.

She replied of course and began my manicure. Without applying any cuticle cream or softener she began digging in my cuticles while chatting up all the employees and barely paying attention to what was going on. She continuously had to keep picking at my cuticles after applying the gel and all of the polish looks uneven with streaks and lumps. Finally she did all she could to fix my manicure and started on the pedicure. After she applied the polish and I got up my jaw dropped to see bright red on my toes and salmon on my fingers. She quickly began attending to another client without much else to say to me. I checked out at the front and even tipped 20% of the pre discount amount bc I believe in paying for a service but I definitely will never be returning and will be warning everyone I can contact to stay away from this salon. resp.text: We are so sorry to hear that your experience wasn’t to your standards. The paper work that you signed at the beginning of your service, explains that if you are unsatisfied with your hair, your stylist will be more than happy to come up with an arrangement to get your hair where you would like it to be. We truly wish you would have come to us first so we could evaluate your hair and make it right for you without the additional costs of another salon. We have offered for you to come in and have us take a look at your hair to evaluate the situation, and we are sorry that you did not want to come in to work this out. Unfortunately, due to the time your stylist spent with you, product used, and not having the opportunity to evaluate your hair in person, we are unable to refund you for this service. Upon reviewing your paper work, your stylist noted that your hair would need more than one service to achieve the end results that you were wanting. This is due to the fact that your hair was already previously lightened at home before your visit to us. We are always striving for what's best for our clients. In this circumstance, your hair wouldn't be able to handle any further lightening in one visit. It is our understanding that in order to protect the integrity of your hair, you and your stylist decided to go with a darker blonde until your next service. We aren't quite sure what happened between the time you left the salon and now, but after your service you told us that you loved your hair and even booked your future reservation with us. We deeply value you as a customer of ours and we are sorry to see you go. We appreciate your review and we hope you have a wonderful day.

Shelby's influence and education for the staff helps to ensure that all team members provide the very best and consistent results.
